Jesus-anem rernem atyekelew, “Ingkart akwentay! Kwatyel anenhantherrenh ilwerl-athenewerr!” Rap akwentenhey-alpew, atayel innga angkew rwarrew-then kwatyew-then. Ingkerrap arternperreyelpew.
Ran angkew ikwer-rnem, “Ater-anemarl arrantherr irreyel? Ilekew atyeng awelhey-angenh? Arrantherr ayenh iterl-aremer! Nthakenharl athan arrenhantherrenh iwerl-alhey-angenh!” Rernem apatemel atererrew, rernemap angkerrew, “Pwertay! Artwa ilek-apenyarlap nhenhan? Rwarrel-then kwatyel-then renh awem!”
Ikwer-penh Jesus kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem-akert alhew rtnwa ikwerel kwaty alay anthenayn-ampeny-warl. Rernemap kwaty alay-angkwarr artarnpenhew apmer Galilee-they, aremerrey-alhew tawen Gerasa ikwer-itwew-anem.
Rernem rtnwethey atwarrew, kwaty impalthel-anem rtnenh. Artwa arwengkan apmer ikwer-areny Jesus-warl arnekerrey-ayntew. Ranap arrenty-akert, arnkwewenyarl intem alhenh, apmer ikwerenh-rnem-itwel aney-angenh, arrangkw. Rap intey-angketyarrel anenh, ipmernemarl akwernenh-itwew.
Apmer ikwer-areny-rnemel renh arertnenh tyeynel itep-atherr ingkety-atherr-then. Arrentyarl angkep ikwer-warl aylpeyam-alpenh rlterrkelenh, rap tyeyn-rnem akalthenh, arleng-anem anterremel. Arrentyel rwew-alhenh, ra arleng ament alhaynteyew. Jesus-elan renh arew, rap arrenty-anem iltew, “Arrenty apmway! Tyerrelha ikwer-they!” Artwa ra arlkenty iwew atayel, rap kwenerrey-alhew, Jesus-arl rtnenh-itwew. “Jesus-ay! Nga Alerikw Akngey-wenh! Nthakenh ileyew ntwa ayenh? Ayengan irrepern apmwa. Ayenh irrwampenh-anthey-angenh!”
<range>
Jesus-el ayernew, “Itnan ilek nga?” Arrenty akngerran ikwer-itwew anenh. Ra tyernew, “Itna ayeng ‘Akngerr’.”
Arrenty-rnemel renh ayernenh akngerr-inger, “Irrentey-angenh anenhantherr arrenty apmwernem antwerrkeyel-warl, aleth-antey tyarlewey-angenh-warl!”
Pikepik akngerran arlkwew-arlkwenh arrer-antey apwertel. Arrenty rernem ayernew, “Irrenta anenhantherr pikepik yanh-rnem-warl!” Ra renh-rnem irrentew, rernemarl ayernew-angkwarr-antey.
Rernem artwethey tyerrelhew, anamerl-antey aylpew pikepik-rnem-warl. Pikepik-rnemap arwengkerrew, anterrew arlperrty-anem. Rernem anterrew kwenel-athek, kwaty alay-warl aylpew, ilwenherrew-anem.
Pikepikew-artey-rnemel arew, rernemap tawen Gerasa-warl anterrew, apmer akely-rnem-warl-then. Rernem ingkerrenh ilew, “Pikepik-rnem arwengk-arwengk kwaty-warl aylpewaw!” Rernemap apmer akely-areny-rnem-then ilew.
Akngerrel angka awew, rernem anterrerrew areyew, nthakenh irrenhan. Rernemap Jesus arey-alhew, artwa arwengk-penh ikwer-itwew mwerr-anem arnkwakert anenh. Akwerrng arraty-anem anenh, arrenty-weny-anem. Rernemap Jesus-wetyan atererrew.
Ingwer-rnemel rernemarl arewel, rernemap ingkerrew ilew, artwarl arrenty-akert-penh mwerrerrew.
Tawen Gerasa-areny-rnem artewentyel atererrew, rernemap Jesus ilew, “Nga alpemer apmer nhenh-they apmer ingwer-warl.” Jesus kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem-akert nganerl-alhew rtnwewarl, rernemap anperl-alheyew-alenty alerl-antey rtnenherrenh.
Artwa arwengk-penh ra angkew ikwer, “Atyetyartay! Mwerrang ayeng alpem ngkweng-angkwarr?” Ra tyernew,
“Nthekwern ntwa ayenh apentey-angenh. Ngkwenh-rnem-warl alpa. Iley-alpa, Akngeyarl ngkweng amperrngerrew, rarl ngenh mwerrelew.” Ra kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem-akert anperl-alhew, artwa ran alpew apmer ikwerenh-warl. Rap akngerr ilerl-apenh alakenh, “Jesus-el arwengk-penh ayenh mwerrelew!”
Ikwer-penh Jesus kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem-akert apey-alpew kwaty alay Galilee anthenayn-ampeny-they. Akngerrel renh arnarenh, rernemap ikwer arnekerrey-ayntew kwaty alay impalth-itwew.
Artwa anyent itnan Jairus anenh, artwa rltwarlap ran tyaty Jew-rnem-wenh-itwew. Anyentant ikwerenh kwey alerikwan, ranap 12-arl. Arntety inngap ra ayntenh, ilweyew-anemel. Jairus rap apetyew, ampwethel arrernelhew, Jesus-arl rtnenh-itwew. Rap ayernew artnemel, “Mwerrang apetyem apmer atyenh-warl?” Jesus rap alhew Jairus-el-arleng. Ingwer-rnemel renh-atherr apenteynenh, tyet inngitwew ingkerrenh-antey alperlewenh.
<range>
Arelh anyent ingwerarl alpenh ikwer-rnemel-arleng, ranap arelh-rnem-wenh arntety-akertarl aherrety 12-ew-atety. Ngangker-rnemew ra apwert akngerr antheynenh, apwertanap ywerrew-anem. Ngangker-rnemel nthekwern renh mwerreley-angenh, arrangkw. Rap arntety intem-antey anenh.
Rap Jesus-warl apetyew ingkern-angkwarr, arnkwa Jesus-wenh arnerlewew. Anamerl-antey arntety ywerrenhew.
Jesus-el renh-rnem ayernew, “Angwenhel ayenh arnerlewew?” Rernem ingkerrenh angkew, “Rwengk!” Peter ikwer angkew, “Ingkartay, akngerr nhenhan tyetel alperleweyel!”
Jesus angkew, “Innga wenh! Ingwerentyel ayenh arnew! Atha iterl-areyel, arawerrngarl tyerrelherl-alhew atyeng-they!”
Arelh rarl arnewan alakenh iterrenh, “Pwertay! Ayeng iterrew anyelkel arneyew-arrpantey. Jesus-el ran ayenh iterl-areyelarl. Ayeng nthakenh irrtyert aylpey-angenh.” Rap atererrew, kwenerrey-alhew arrewemel, Jesus-arl rtnenh-itwew. Ingwer-rnemel renh arenh, rap angkew ikwer-rnem, “Ayeng wenh! Ayeng arntety aherrety 12-ew-atety anenh. Atharl arnkwa Jesus-wenh arnerlewew, anamerl-antey-anem ayeng mwerrerrenhew.”
Jesus ikwer athamerrew artewentyel, rap angkew, “Arelhampway! Nga mwerrerrew, ngarl atyeng rlterrk iterrew. Apmer-warl alpanem, nyerrerrey-angenh alhewer-anem.”
Jesus angkenh-antey arelh ikwerel-arleng, artwanem apetyew angkakert Jairus-wenh apmer-they. Jairus ran rtnenh-antey Jesus-el-arleng. Artwa ra angkew Jairus-ew, “Arrangkw wenh! Alerengkw ngkwenh atnengkanerrew. Arrangkwel-anem Ingkart akngetyey-angenh, menty-anem.”
Jesus-el awew, rap angkew Jairus-ew, “Artewenty iterrey-angenh. Nga atyeng awelhenty, alerengkw ngkwenh mwerrerrem.”
Rernemarl ingkerrenh arternp-antey alperlewenh, rernemap aremerrey-alhew Jairus-wenh apmerel-anem. Jesus arrngert angkew ingwer-rnemewan, kwen aylpenhewerran. Rap ilew, irrpetyapant aylpenheyew ikwerel-arleng; Peter, awayenheng-atherr James-then John-then, kwey-wenh aynikw-then amikw-then-akerr.
Ingwer-rnem kwen arrwekel-antey aylpew, rernemap artnalhelerrenh kwey ipma ikwer. Ra ikwer-rnem angkew, “Artnalhelerrey-angenhaw! Kwey nhenhan ilwey-angenh, ankwarl aynteyel!”
Ingkerrel awew, rarl angkew, rernemap irrpeltherremel atherrew ikwer, rernemarl iterl-arew, kwey rarl ipma ayntenh.
Ra kwey itep-they antwerrkew, angkew-anem, “Kwey akwenta!”
Anamerl-antey rwarr ikwer-warl apey-alpew, kwey rap iteth-anem akwentenhey-alpew. Aynelikw-then amelikw-then arew, ratherrap apateyelpew. Jesus ikwer-atherr angkew, “Amern anthenh-atherr ikwer. Ingwerentyak iley-angenh, atharl kwey renh itethelew ipmepenh.”
<range>
Ikwer-penh Jesus-el kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem 12 akarrelew ikwer-warl. Renh-rnem ra rlterrkeleyew, rernem arrenty-rnem irrent-aynteyew, arntety-rnem-then mwerrel-aynteyew.
Rap renh-rnem ilew, “Arrantherr apmer arrpanenh-warl alhayntenh-arey. Ingwer-rnem ilerl-apayntenh-arey, Akngeyan atyetyart ilkwa ingkerrenhew apmer arrpanenh-arenyew. Arntety-rnem-then mwerrelerl-apayntenh-arey.
Ilengem akngeyney-angenh; irrertety-weny, yakweth-weny, amern-weny, apwert-weny, arnkwa ingwer-weny, arrangkw. Arwa alhenh-arey.
Arrantherr apmer ingwerel aremerrey-alhem, ingwerentyel apek ilem warl ikwerenhel aneyew. Kel mwerr, anenh-arey ikwerel-arleng, akalty-anthenty-penhant alperl-alhemel.
Arrantherrarl apmer ingwerel aremerrey-alhem, ingwerentyel iley-angenh apek, warl ikwerenhel aneyew. Irrentewerr apek apmer yanh-areny-rnemel, awelhey-angenh apek arrewantherr. Menty aney, alpemelant ikwer-rnem-wety. Pwet atherr lhelenh-arey, ahern apmer yanh-wety irrarlkemel anewantherrenh-angkwarr. Alakenh-anyem rernem iterl-areyew, Akngeyan ahelerreyel ikwer-rnem.” Alakenh Jesus-el renh-rnem ilanthew.
Kel kwertengerl-rnem anperlarr-alhew, rernemap apmer arrpanenh-warl alhenh, angka mwerr-angker Akngey-wenh ilerl-apenh, arntety-rnem-then mwerrelerl-apenh.
Angka Jesus-akert ingweram-angkwarr arlpimperrew. Ingwer-rnem angkerrenh, ran John Baptise-emeley-angker apek, itetherrenty-arrpantey ipmepenh. Renharlap Herod-el awank ipmew atwew. Ingwer-rneman angkerrenh, ran Elijah apek, angkakert Akngey-wenh awank anenharl-arrpantey. Ingwer-rneman angkerrenh, ran angkakert Akngey-wenh ingwer arrwekeleny apek, itetherrenty-arrpantey ipmepenh. Herod-el angka Jesus-akert awew, rap ilpertelelhemel iterrew, “Atha artwa atyenh-rnem ilanthew, John akapwert akeyew. Artwa angwenh ran nhenhey, alakenh arnwarnerl-apeyel? Atha renh rlwateyew.”
<range>
<range>
Angka mwerr-angker Akngey-wenh ilerl-apenh-penh, kwertengerl Jesus-wenh-rnem apey-alpew ikwer-warl. Rernem ilelhey-alpew ikwer, rernemarl mpwarerl-apenh. Ra renh-rnem atnwenheynew akngerr-wety tawen ingwer-warl Bethsaida-warl.
Akngerrel awew, rarl alpew apmer ikwer-warl, rernemap renh apenteynew. Ra renh-rnem arnarew apetyenharl, rap arnekerrey-ayntew ikwer-rnem. Ra ikwer-rnem angka ilew, Akngey atyetyart ingkerrew anem. Arntety-rnem-then ra mwerrelenh arrpemarl.
Jesus warrkerrenh-antey ingkeny aylpeyew-atety. Kwertengerl-rnem 12 angkew ikwer, “Anantherr apmer arlpaw-itwew aneyel amern-weny. Ntwa renh-rnem apmer ikwer-rnem-wenh-warl thwenemer, rernem amern ineyew, ankwethen aynteyew.”
Ra tyernew, “Arrantherran anthenh-arey amern ikwer-rnem!” Artwernem 5,000 anew-anenh, arelh-rnem-then ampernem-akert; akngerr inngey. Kwertengerl-rnem angkew Jesus-ew, “Anantherr amern akelyant atnyeneyel, amern rtamp-rnem 5, aker aylperr atherr-then. Anantherr nthakenh alhey-angenh, amern akngerrew ineyew.” Ra kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew angkew, “Ilenh-arey renh-rnem, rernem arlwarey-arlwarey arrernelheyew, ingwer-rnem 50, ingwer-rnem 50 arrpemarl.”
<range>
Kwertengerl-rnemel renh-rnem ilew, rernem arrernelheyneyew alakenh.
Ra inew amern rtamp-rnem aker aylperr atherr-then, irrwerl-warl-athek aremel, “Akngeyay, anantherr inkwerelhem, ntwarl amern-then aker-then anthew anewantherr.” Rap rlweth-akeynew amern-then aker-then akelyarl-akely, antheynemel kwertengerl-rnemew-anem. Rernem antheynenheng-arey, amern-then aker-then akngerrerrew. Rernem antherl-apenh, akngerrel arlkweyew.
Ingkerrel atnerteng irreyew-atety arlkwew. Rernemarl arlkwew-penh, kwertengerl-rnemel amern ampeny-ampeny akwetyerl-apenh, rtnwernem 12-warl arrernerl-apenh arriwew-atety.
Ingwer-ingwer Jesus ament alhew, Akngey-warl-athek angkaynteyew. Kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem ikwerel-arleng aneyarr-alhew. Rap renh-rnem ayernew, “Ilek ingwer-rnemelan ayenh ilem?”
Rernem tyernew, “Ingwerentyelan ngenh ileyel John Baptise-emeley-angker-arrpantey. Ingwerentyel ngenh ileyel Elijah-arrpantey. Ingwerentyelan ngenh ileyel angkakert Akngey-wenh-arrpantey, awank-akerrarl anenh, ipmepenh itetherrenty-arrpantey.”
Jesus angkew, “Arrantherr-alew? Ilekarl arrantherr ayenh ileyel?” Peter-el tyernew, “Ngan artwa renh, Akngeyarl awank-akerr angkew, ra ahern nhenh-warl thweneyew.”
Jesus arrngert angkew ikwer-rnem alakenh, “Innga wenh! Arrantherrap ingwerentyak iley-angenh, Akngeyelarl ayenh thwenew ahern nhenh-warl.”
“Ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh. Ingwer-ingwer apmwel-ayeth-anem atyeng aynteyenh. Arlka ayeng irrwampeyenh, ayengap apmwa awelheyenh. Akngerr atyeng-wety arlkarerreyenh; atyetyart-rnem Jew-rnem-wenh, artwa rltwernem tyaty ilkwareny-rnem-then, artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty anthey-angker-rnem-akerr. Ingwer-rnemel ayenh atweyenh ipmewarl. Ingwa atherr-penhan ayeng angkeparl itetherreyenh ipmepenh.” Alakenh-anyem ra ilelhew kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew.
Jesus angkew akngerrew, ikwerel-arlengarl anenh-rnemew, “Ingwerenty ayenharl apenteyew, ra nthakenh ikwerenharrp-angkwarr alhey-angenh, arrangkw. Ingwer-rnemel renh irrwampenh-anthem, ayenh apententy. Ran ipmelhey-angenh, ayenh apent-aynteyew intem-anteyarl.
Ra iterreyel apek ament, mwanty iteth-antey arntarnt-arelh-aynteyew. Alakenhan apmwel-ayetharl iterreyel. Rap atnengkanerrem arrpemarl, nthakenh Akngey-itwel intem-antey aney-alpey-angenh, arrangkw. Alakenh apek ingweran iterreyel, ‘Ayeng apek ilwenty, atharl Jesus apenteyel, kel mwerrarl.’ Rap Akngey-itwel intem-antey aney-alpem.
Ingwerentyel apek ilek-ilek mwerr-angker inaynteyew ikwer. Apwert-then ra inaynteyew, amern-then inaynteyew, arnkwethen akngerr inaynteyew. Ampwal yanh-rnem-akert ra nthekwern Akngey-itwel aney-alpey-angenh, arrangkw! Ra ayenh apentey-angenh, rap ilwemarl, nthekwern Akngey-itwel aney-alpey-angenh, arrangkw.
Ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh. Ingwer-ingweran ayeng apey-alpeyenh irrwerl-they antyerl akngerr-akert. Anantherrap arrtyernenhey-alpeyenh itwernel-apeny, rlterrk Akngey-wenh-akertel. Arrantherr apek nyerrerrem, ayenh apentewerr angka atyenh-wety-then, ayengap arrantherr-wety nyerrerrem arrpemarl.
Ayengan arraty angkeyel arrewantherr. Ingwerenty apmer nhelarl rlengk anew-aneyel-rnem, rernem Akngey anngel areyenh. Rernem ilweyew-alenty, rernem areyenh, Akngeyarl atyetyart ilkwa aneyenh ingkerrew.”
Wik anyent-penh Jesus alhew apwert irrwerl-warl, Akngey-warl-athek angkaynteyew-anem. Rap kwertengerl-rnem irrpety atnwenhew, Peter awayenheng-atherr James-then John-then.
Jesus-arl angkenh Akngeyew, inngerran ingwer-lkwererrew, arnkwa arlter innga irrew, amparrkew-anem.
Arwapeny artwa atherr-anem ikwerel-arleng rtneyelpew, angkey-alhew ikwer, ratherranap Moses-then Elijah-then.
Rernemap ingkerrenh amparrkenh. Artwa ratherr angkew Jesus-ew, “Rlengk-anteyap nga ilwey-alhem Jerusalem-itwew, Akngeyelarl awank ilew-angkwarr.”
Jesus-arl angkenh artwa ingwer-atherrew, Peter artwa ikwer apelty atherr-then ankwa apelp ayntenh. Rernem ankwethey akwentenhey-alpew, rernemap arew, Jesus artwa ingwer-atherr-then ingkerrenh rernem amparrkenh.
Artwa ingwer-atherr alpeyew-alenty rtnenh, Peter angkew, “Ingkartay! Mwerr anantherr mpwelhenh-antey! Anantherr lywenty-rnem irrpety mpwareyew; ngkwengarl anyentan, ingweran Moses-ewarl, ingweran Elijah-ewarl!” Ran iterl-arey-angenh, ranap apmwel-ayeth angkenh. Ra iterrenh, artwa atherrang anenty-arrpantey ahern nhenh-itwew alerl.
Peter angkenh-antey, kwenpayel-anem renh-rnem ingkerrenh artew, kwertengerl-rneman atererrew.
Rernemap awew, Akngey rarl angkew kwenpay-they alakenh-anyem, “Nhanyem Alerey atyenh-antey, atharl awank ilew, renh thweneyew ahern-warl. Awelhenh-arey ikwer, rarl angkeyelewan arrewantherr!”
Akngey angkenh-penh, rap ywerrerl-alhew, kwertengerl-rnemel arew, Jesus-arl ament-anem rtnenh. Rernemap iterl-arew, mwerr-angker rernem arew. Rernem ingwer-rnemew iley-angenh-antey. Ingwer-ingwerantap rernem ilerl-arrernew ingwer-rnemewan.
Ingwepenh ingwerel Jesus kwertengerl-rnem irrpety-akert atwarreynenh apwert irrwerl-they. Ingwer-rnemel arew, rernemarl atwarrenhey-alpenh, akngerr innga ikwer-rnem arnekerrew.
Artwa anyentan arlkew, “Atyetyartay! Amperrngerra alerey atyenh anyentew! Akngemang atha renh ngkweng-warl, raw mwerrerreyew?
Arrentyan aylpem ikwer-warl angkepelarreng, awey rap arlkenty iwem. Arrewelheleyam-alpem renh angkepelarreng, iwem renh ahern-warl-then. Iylkerretyan thelelhem arrakert-they. Arrenty ran antelhem ikwer-itwel intem-antey. Rap angkep apeyam-aylpem ikwer-warl, renh irrwampenh-anthem intem-antey, awey rap ilweyew irrem.
Atha kwertengerl ngkwenh-rnem ayernew, arrenty irrenteyew ikwer-they. Rernemap arrangkwarl, irrentey-angenharl.”
Jesus angkew ikwer-rnemew ingkerrew, “Arrantherran atyeng awelhey-angenh arrangkw-antey! Arrantherran apmwel-ayetharl iterreyel. Ayengan arlkarewelheyel, arrenhantherrenh akalty-antheyel angkepelarreng! Ayeng nthakenh arrewantherrel-arleng aney-angenh arleng-alenty!” Rap artwa ikwer angkew, “Akngetya alerengkw ngkwenh atyeng-warl.”
Aynelikw awey renh akngetyenh, arrentyel renh ilatwew ahern-warl arrewelhelemel. Jesus-el arrenty irrentew awey ikwer-they, renhap atnwenhew-anem aynikw-warl.
Ingwer-rnemarl rtnenherrenh, rernemap apatew. Rernem angkew, “Inngangay! Akngeyel arnwarnem arawerrng-akertel!” Ingkerrenh angkerrenh-antey, Jesus nakenh. Rap angkew kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew,
“Awelhenh-arey arternp atyeng! Ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh. Ingwerentyel ayenh ahayiweyenh artwa apmwernem-warl, rernem ayenh atweyew ipmew-antey.”
Kwertengerl-rnemel nthakenh iterl-arey-angenh, rarl ilelhenh ikwer-rnem. Akngey ikwer-rnem arrngert angkew, rernem iterl-arewerr. Rernem apatenh, renh ayerneyew, angka ikwer-rnem anaynteleyew.
Ikwer-penh kwertengerl-rnem angkerrenh, rernemap ilterrenh alakenh, “Angwenharlap ilkwa inngan anewantherr-they?”
Jesus-el nthakenh renh-rnem awey-angenh. Kel ra renh-rnem iterl-arenhan, rernemarl alakenh iterrenhan. Ra ilew, ampa akely apetyeyew, rtneyew ikwerel-arleng.
Ra angkew kwertengerl-rnemew, “Nga ampew mwerr anem, ngap atyeng mwerr anem arrpemarl. Ngan atyeng mwerr anem, ngap Akngeyewarl mwerr anem arrpemarl. Akngey ranap ayenharl thwenew. Ngarl akely antwelhem, ngap ilkwarl Akngey-angkwarr.” Alakenh Jesus angkenh ikwer-rnem.
John-an angkew, “Ingkartay! Anwernantherr arew, artwa anyentel arrenty-rnem irrentenharl, itna ngkwenhel itnewemel. Anwernantherr renh iltew, anewantherr-areny-wenyarlap ran.”
Jesus angkew, “Arrngert angkey-angenh. Ran anewantherr tyel-angkey-angenh, ranap anewantherr-apeny.”
Kel Jesus-el iterl-arenh, rarl Jerusalem-itwew ilweyenh, irrwerl-anem alpeyenh angkep. Ra iterrew, Jerusalem-warl alheyew-antey, rap anperl-alhew-anem.
Galilee-they ra alheyew akwerterrp-antey Samaria-ampeny-angkwarr Judea-warl. Rap angkakert-rnem thwenew arrwekel Samaria-warl, apmer ikwer-rnem alaleweyew.
Apmer ikwer-areny-rnemel awew, Jesus-arl alpenh Jerusalem-warl, rernemap angkew, “Arrangkw! Nthakenh ra nhel ayntey-angenh! Jew-rneman arrantherran apmer arrewantherrenhel ayntemer!”
Angkakert-rnem angkep alpew, Jesus ileyew, Samaria-areny-rnemarl angkew. James-then John-thenel awew, ratherrap ahelerrew angkew-anem, “Ingkartay! Ayla ayernem Akngey, rwa thweneyew irrwerl-they, renh-rnem ilwerl-atheneyew?”
Ra arrngert angkew.
Rernem anper-antey apmer ikwer-angkwarr alhew, apmer ingwerel-anem ayntey-alhew.
Rernem iwerrel-antey alperlewenh Jerusalem-warl, artwa anyent rernem arey-alhew. Artwa rap angkew Jesus-ew, “Atha ngenh apenteyew, ingweram-angkwarr nga alhenty.”
Jesus-el tyernew, “Arengk artnwer inteyel ayntem ntywetyarl. Thip akerrkan atharlkwel ayntem ntywetyarl. Artwa Innga Akngey-wenh athan apmer atnyeney-angenhan.”
Jesus angkew artwa ingwerew, “Apenta ayenh!” Artwel tyernew, “Ingkartay! Akngey atyenh ilweyew-aneyel. Ayeng angkep alpeyew, renh arntarnt-arey-alpeyew. Renh akwernenty-penh, atha ngenh apenteyenh-anem.”
Jesus angkew ikwer, “Inweng Akngey-wenh atnyeney-angenh-rnem menty rernem akwernerl-ayntey. Nga alhemer, ingwer-rnemarl ilerl-apaynteyew, Akngeyan ikwer-rnem atyetyart anaynteyew, renh-rnem arntarnt-araynteyew.”
Artwa ingweran angkew arrpemarl, “Ingkartay! Atha ngenh apenteyew. Ayeng-tangkwel apmer-warl alpeyew arrwekel, atyenh-rnem atha iley-alpeyew, ayengan alpeyel ngkwengel-arleng.”
Jesus-el tyernew, “Arrangkw. Ntwa ayenh apententy, nthekwern nga angkeperrey-angenh. Ngan iterreyel angkeperreyew, nthekwern ntwa angka Akngey-wenh iley-angenh, rarl atyetyart ingkerrew aneyel, arrangkw.”
Ikwer-penh Jesus-el rlwanew 72 ingwer-rnem-anem. Ra renh-rnem atherrarl-atherrarl thweneyew, rap angkew ikwer-rnem, “Apmer ingkerr-warl alhayntenh-arey, ingwer-rnem ilerl-apayntenh-arey, ayengan ingkern-theyarl alheyenh.
Akngerr ingwer-rnem aneyel apmer arrpanenhel. Rernem mpwelheyel, angka mwerr-angker Akngey-wenh awaynteyew. Athanap warrkenh-rnem irrpetyapant atnyeneyel, ingwer-rnem akalty-anthaynteyewan. Arrantherr ayernemer alakenh, ‘Akngeyay, ntwa warrkenh ingwer-rnem rlwana, akngerr ingwer-rnem awelheyew ngkweng.’
Kel-anem alhenh-arey. Mwanty-antey alhenh-arey, rlterrk inngarl arrewantherr aynteyenh-wety! Arrantherran anik, yep-yep-apenyarl. Ingwer-rneman ahelengkw, artnwer-apenyarl.
Ampwal-rnem akngeyney-angenh; yakweth-weny, apwert-weny, pwet anyentant. Arrantherr ingwer iwerr-itwew rlwatenty, aleth angkey-angenh, kel anperl-alhemel arrpemarl.
Arrantherr apmer anyent-itwew aremerrey-alhem, warl anyent-warl-tangkwel alhenh-arey. Arrantherr aylpenheyew-alenty warl ikwer-warl, angkenh-arey artwa warlew-artey ikwer alakenh, ‘Akngeyel ngenh arnep-arnem ngkwenh-rnem-then, mwanty arntarnt-arem intem-antey.’
Artwa yanh apekan ahelengkw, Akngeyelap renh arnep-arney-angenh. Artwa ahelengkw-weny apek ra, Akngeyelap renh arnep-arnem ikwerenh-rnem-then.
Arrantherr warl ikwer-itwewant anenh-arey, warl ingwerel ayntey-angenh. Amern-then aker-then arlkwenh-arey, warl ikwer-areny-rnemelarl antheman. Kwaty-then antywenh-arey, rernemarl antheman. Rernem arntarnt-arem arrenhantherrenh, pay-apeny anthemel, arrantherrarl atyeng warrkerreyelan.
Arrantherr apek anperl-alhenty apmer ingwer-warl. Apmer ikwer-areny-rnem inkwerelhemel arnekerrem apek arrewantherr. Warl ikwer-rnem-wenh-warl apek arrenhantherrenh atnwenheynem, anthemel amern ilek-ilek. Kel arrantherrap inkwerelhemel arlkwenh-arey ikwer-rnem-itwew.
Mwerrelenh-arey arntety-rnem apmer ikwer-areny. Renh-rnem ilenh-arey, arltarl arrer-anem irreyel-wety, Akngeyarl ingkerrenhew atyetyart aneyenh, arntarnt-areyenh renh-rnem.
Arrantherr alhenty apmer ingwer-warl apek. Apmer yanh-areny-rnem arlkarerrem arrewantherr-wety, rernemap awelhey-angenh arrewantherr. Kel ampererremel alhenh-arey apmer ikwer-angkwarr, alakenh angkemel,
‘Arenh-arey nhanyeman! Anantherr arrewantherrety pwet-they ahern nhenh-areny lertnem. Awelhenh-arey! Arltan arrer-anemerreyel, Akngeyarl ingkerrenhew atyetyart aneyenh, renh-rnem arntarnt-areyenh. Arrantherranap Akngey-wetyan arlkarerreyelarl!’ Alakenh-anyem arrantherr ilerl-apemer apmer ikwer-itwew.
Arlta anyentel, ingkerrenh-antey ywerreyelpeyenhel, Akngeyelan akarrelenhey-alpeyenh apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem ikwer-warl. Ra renh-rnem ayerneyew, nthakenh rernem anenharl. Rap apmwerneman irrwampenh-antheyenh, mwerr-rnemantarl ra arntarnt-areyenhan. Arrantherr apek iterl-areyel angka tawen Sodom-akert? Awank-akerr Akngeyel irrwampenh-anthew ingkerrenh apmer ikwer-itwew, rernemarl apmwel-ayeth anenh. Ran ikwer-rnemew ahelerrew. Kel arlta anyentel, ingkerrenharl ywerreyelpeyenhel, ra irrwampenh-antheyenh alyepel Sodom-areny-rnem. Ingwer-rnem arrewantherr awelhey-angenh-rnem, Akngey rap artewentyel renh-rnem irrwampenh-antheyenh.” Alakenh-anyem Jesus angkew artwernem 72 ikwer-rnem.
Jesus angkew ingkerrew, “Tawen Korazin-areny-rnem Akngeyel renh-rnem irrwampenh-antheyenh artewentyel innga. Rernem atyeng awelheyangan. Alakenh irrkaty arrpemarl aynteyenh ingwer-rnemewan tawen Bethsaida-arenyewan. Rernem ayenh arew, atharl akngerr mwerrelenh, rernemap atyeng-wety arlkarerrewarl. Ayeng tawen Tyre-warl tawen Sidon-warl-then alheyew-anew, mwerrelerl-aneyew-anew renh-rnem, rernem atyeng awelhemerarl. Rernemap nyerrerrem, apmwa ikwer-rnem-wenh-wety angkeperrem. Rernemap arnkwa apmwamwamel rernem aylpem anewantherrenh-angkwarr, inmenthel-then apernelhemel. Alakenh-anyem ingwer-rnemel renh-rnem areyew, rernemarl apmwewety angkeperrew.
Arlta anyentel, ingkerrenh ywerreyelpeyenhel, Akngeyel tawen Tyre-areny-rnem-then tawen Sidon-areny-rnem-then irrwampenh-antheyenh alyepelant. Rap tawen Korazin-areny-rnem-then tawen Bethsaida-areny-rnem-then irrwampenh-antheyenh artewentyel innga.
Tawen Capernaum-areny-rnem-alew? Rerneman apmwel-ayeth iterreyel alakenh, ‘Akngeyel anwernantherrenh irrwerl akngeyneyenh, ikwer-itwel aney-alpeyew. Jesus anenh apmer anwernewantherrenh-itwew, rap ilek-ilek mwerr-angker mpwarenh.’ Alakenhap rernem iterreyelan. Rernem atyeng awelhey-angenh-anteyarl. Akngey rap renh-rnem arleng ikwer-wety iweyenhan.”
Jesus angkew artwernem 72 ikwer-rnem, “Ingwerenty arrewantherr awelhem, rap atyengan awelhem arrpemarl. Ingwerenty arrewantherrety arlkarerrem, atyeng-wety ra arlkarerrem arrpemarl. Ingwerenty atyeng-wetyan arlkarerrem, rap Akngey-wetyan arlkarerrem arrpemarl. Akngey rarlap ayenh thwenew ahern nhenh-warl.” Alakenh-anyem Jesus-an angkew artwa 72 ikwer-rnemewan. Rernemap anperl-alhew apmer arrpanenh-warl-anem.
Ikwer-penh ingwer-ingwer artwa 72 weth-rnem, Jesus-elarl thwenew-rnem, rernem inkwerelhemel apey-alpew Jesus-warl. Rernemap ilelhew, “Ingkartay! Innga wenh! Anwernantherr arrenty-rnem ilterl-apenh, itna ngkwenh itnewemel, rernemap awelhew anwernewantherr! Anwernantherr irrentew arntety-rnem-they, rernemap ywerrerl-alhew!”
Jesus ikwer-rnem angkew, “Atha arew, arrenty alkenh Satan-wenh arawerrng akelyarl-akelyarl irrenhey-alpenh. Ran rlterrk-weny-anem.
Arrantherr atyeng awelhenh-arey! Atha arrewantherr rlterrk anthem, athap arrenhantherrenh arntarnt-arayntem. Arrantherr rtnwem ahelengkw-rnem lthwerl-apayntem arnperrk-rnem-then, arrantherrap alethel alhayntem arntety-weny. Arrantherrap Satan-angkwarr-anem rlterrkarl. Nthekwern ra irrwampenh-anthey-angenh, arntety-then anthey-angenh, arrangkw.
Arrantherrap inkwerelhemel angkeyel, ‘Innga wenh! Arrenty-rnem anwernenhantherr iylparethel aweyel!’ Mwerr-angkwarr arrantherr inkwerelhemel angkem, ‘Akngeyel anenhantherr iterl-areyel, rarl anenhantherr itna ingkwernew pip ikwerenh-warl.’”
Jesus-arl angkenh artwernem 72 ikwer-rnem, Inweng Mwerr-angkerel renh irrngerney-anthew. Ra angkew alakenh Aynikw ikwerenhew, “Akngeyay, ngan atyetyart alkenh ingkerrew ahern nhenhew-then alkerew-then. Atha ngenh nakem. Ntwa angka ngkwenh ilew akwerrp-rnem-warl. Ntwa angka ngkwenh iley-angenharl akalty-rnem-warl. Ya, Akngey, ntwa alakenh arnwarnew, ngarl ilkelhew-angkwarr.” Alakenh Jesus angkew Aynikw ikwerenhew.
Jesus artwernem 72 ikwer-rnem angkew arrpemarl, “Akngeyel ilek-ilek ikwerenh atyeng anthew. Ayengan Alerikw ikwerenh. Rant anyentel ayenh iterl-arem innga. Athant anyentel renh iterl-arem innga arrpemarl. Atha rlwanew-rnemel rernemarl Akngeyan iterl-arem arrpemarl, atharl renh lwewarrernem ikwer-rnem.”
Jesus-el artepang arenhey-alpew, ra angkew kwertengerl-rnem 12 ikwer-rnemant, “Arrantherr inkwerelheyel-anem, aleyan arrantherrarl anngel areyel ilek-ilek mwerr-angker-rnem. Aleyant Akngeyel lwewarrernew alakenh.
Angkakert Akngey-wenh arrwekeleny-rnemel Atyetyart ilkwernemel-then rernem ilek-ilek mwerr-angker areyew, aley arrantherrarl areyel-apeny. Rernem aweyew, aley arrantherrarl aweyel-apeny. Arrangkw. Alakenh-anyem atha arrenhantherrenh ilem inkwerelhenty.”
Artwa akalty anyent anenh, ranap angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angkerarl. Rap Jesus arrkerneyew rtnerl-alhew. “Atyetyartay! Nthakenh irrem ayeng, Akngey-itwel intem-antey aney-alpeyewan?”
Jesus-el tyernew, “Ntwa kel angka Moses-wenh iterl-areyel. Ilek angka nhenhelan aynteyel?”
Artwa akalty angkew, “Alakenh angka Moses-wenhel aynteyel: ‘Artewentyel ilkelh-aynta Akngeyewan, ikwer anthelhemel, ikwerant iterremel, ikwer warrkerremel.’ Alakenh-then ra aynteyel: ‘Ngarl arntarnt-arelhem-apeny mwanty, ntwap ingwer-rnem arntarnt-araynta arrpemarl.’”
Jesus-an angkew ikwer, “Arraty nga angkeyel. Nga alakenh irrenty, ngap alpem Akngey-itwel, aney-alpeyew intem-antey.”
Artwa akalty ra ilkelhew, Jesus-el renh nakeyew, rap ayernew, “Angwenharlap atha arntarnt-areman?”
Jesus-el angkanem ilew artwa ikwer. “Artwa Jew anyent anenh Jerusalem-itwew. Rap iterrew, alheyew tawen ingwer-warl Jericho-warl, rap anperl-alhew-anem. Artwa irrtyert-awarr-rnem irrtyert-aylpew arrwekel iwerrel, rernemap renh apetyenharl arnarew. Rernemap renh antwerrkemel apwert rakew. Renhap arnkwa lhelemel atwew, iwerlelpemel ahern-itwew ayntaynteyew, rap kelepenh ilweyew-anew.
Ikwer-penh artwa rltwa tyaty Jew-rnem-wenh-areny alhew iwerr irrkaty ikwerel. Ra arenhew, artwarl ayntenh, rap anper-antey alhew ikwer-angkwarr.
Artwa warrkenh tyaty Jew-rnem-wenh-areny iwerr ikwerel arrpemarl alhenh, ranap Levi-wenh-antey. Arrer innga arntety ikwer-angkwarr alhew, rap iterrew, ‘Ayeng arlarl.’ Arenhemel anper-antey ra alhewan.
Artwa ingwer-anem tangkey-akert alhenh iwerr ikwerel arrpemarl, ranap Samaria-arenyarl. Ra arey-alhew, artwa arntetyarl ayntenh, rap amperrngerrew ikwer.
Rap alhew ikwer-warl, ngkwarl wayn thelew artwa tywen-rnem-warl, anterel apernemel arertnew-anem. Rap artwa renh tangkey-warl tywenerl-alhew, akngeynew warl anyent-warl-anem. Rap renh athenew panty-warl, ankwakel-anem renh arntarnt-arenh.
Ingwepenhan artwa Samaria-areny ra apwert-anem anthew artwa apmerew-arteyew. Rap angkew, ‘Ayengarl alpeyel-wety-anem, atha ngkweng apwert nhanyem anthem. Ntwa artwa arntety nhanyem arntarnt-araynta. Ingwer-ingwer ayeng apey-alpentyan, athap ngenh apwert anthem, artwa ran arternp mwerrerr-aynteyew.’”
Jesus-elarl angka ilenh-penh, ra artwa akalty-anem ayernew, “Nthakenh ngan iterreyel angka nhenhew? Artwa nthenh-apenyel arntarnt-arenh artwa arntety mwantyel?”
Artwa akaltyan angkew, “Artwa wethaw Samaria-areny, renharl alpemelew!” Jesus-an angkew ikwer, “Ya, arraty. Anantherr iterl-areyel, Jew-rnem ilkelhey-angenh Samaria-areny-rnemewan. Artwa Samaria-areny ranap arntarnt-arenh artwa Jew ikwer. Alakenh-anyem nga alhemer, ingwer-rnemew mpwareyew mwerr-angker. Ngkwenh-rnemewant iterrey-angenh. Jew-rnemewant iterrey-angenh. Ntwa mwerr mpwaraynta ilkelhey-angenh-rnemew-then.”
Jesus kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem-akert iwerrel-antey alhenh Jerusalem-warl, rernemap aremerrey-alhew apmer ingwerel. Arelh itna Martha anenh apmer ikwer-itwel, rap renh-rnem ilew, amern arlkweyew apmer ikwerenh-itwew.
Rernem kwen aylpenhew warl ikwer-warl, aney-alhew-anem. Martha-wenh ayteyikw Mary anenh Jesus-itwel. Jesus-el renh akalty-anthenh. Mary ran awelhenh ikwer.
Martha warrkerrenh artewenty innga, amern akngerr ampernemel. Rap alhengkerrerrew, rap alhew, Jesus ayerneyew, “Ingkartay, ayek ntwan areyel? Mary-el ayenh iwerl-alhew. Ayengant ament warrkerreyel. Ntwa renh ilemer, ayenh alpemeleyew!”
Rap renh tyernew athamerremel, “Martha-ay! Ilekew nga ahelerreyel Mary-ewan? Ilekew nga arralty-aneyel, amern akngerr ampern-aynteyewan?
Mwerr-angkwarr iterra, Mary-arl iterreyel-angkwarr. Nthakenh ayeng ikwer arrngert angkey-angenh.”
Arlta ingwer-ingwerelan Jesus anenh, Aynikw ikwerenhew-anem angkemel. Rarl angkenh-penh, kwertengerl anyent apetyew ikwer-warl, angkey-alhew ikwer, “Ingkartay! Akalty-antha anenhantherr, arraty angkaynteyew Akngeyew, John-elarl kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem akalty-anthenh-apeny. Ntwa apek akalty-anthem anenhantherr alakenh?”
Jesus-an angkew ikwer-rnem, “Alakenh angkayntenh-arey: ‘Akngeyay, ingkerrelarl ngenh iterl-aremer, nakemel angkerl-anemer. Ngan Atyetyart ingkerrew. Anantherr ingkerrenh ngkweng awelhem.
Intem anthaynta amern-then aker-then anewantherr arlta arrpanenhel.
Ingwer-rnemel apmwel-ayeth anewantherr mpwarenty, menty-anem anantherr renh-rnem ipmemel tyarlewem iylpelerremel. Anantherr apmwelhelenty, anantherr ngenh ayerneyew, apmwa irrarlkeyew anewantherr-wety. Anenhantherr awakelhey-angenh, angkep atweyewan. Intem arntarnt-araynta anenhantherr, arrkernewerr anenhantherr ingwerentyel, apmwel-ayeth anaynteyew.’ Alakenh angkeman arrantherr Akngeyewan.”
Jesus-an angkew ikwer-rnem, “Nhanyem atha arrewantherr angka ilem. Nga apek alhem ampepenyel warl ngkwenh-rnem-wenh-warl, amernew aparelheyew. Ntwa apek ayernem alakenh, ‘Apmarleyay! Amern atyeng antha,
atyenharl apetyewew arleng-they. Ayengan apateyel, nthakenh atha ilem. Ayengan arrangkw, ilekel atha wantey-angenh.’
Warl ikwer-arenyan kwen-they-antey apek angkem, ‘Atyekeley-angenh! Ipma anenhantherr! Ayengan atyenh-rnem-akert aynteyel, arriwan atha akentew-anem. Nthakenh akwentey-angenh, amern ngenh antheyew, arrangkw.’
Ra apek alakenh ngkweng angkem aynterl-anemel, arrangkw nthakenh ngenh anthey-angenh. Nga apek iterrem ngkwenh-wenyarl. Ntwa renh ayernem alhewer-antey, rap akwentenhey-alpemarl. Rap amern-anem nyerrerremel ngkweng anthem, ingwer-rnemel renh awewerr, rarl iylpelant aweyel.
Arternp awelhenh-arey arrantherr! Ntwa ayerna Akngey, ranap ngkweng anthemarl. Nga nthwa, ranap ngkweng lwewarrernemarl. Ntwa arriw rltar-atwa, ranap ngkweng altywerelemarl.
Inngarlap ran! Ntwa Akngey ayernenty, ranap nthakenh iylpelant awey-angenharl. Nga nthwenty, ranap nthakenh irrtyert-aylpey-angenharl. Ntwa arriw rltar-atwenty, Akngey ranap ngkweng altywerelemarl, ngap aylpenhem-anem.
Alerengkwel ngenh aker aylperrew apek ayernem. Ntwa rtnwem ahelengkw ikwer anthey-angenharl, arrangkw! Ntwa aylperrant anthem arlkweyewan.
Ampengkwel ngenh aker kwartew apek ayernem. Ntwa atneth-akert ikwer anthey-angenh, arrangkw!
Arrantherran apmwangkwarr aneyel, arrantherrap iterl-areyelarl, ilek-ilek mwerr-angker anthaynteyewan ampa arrewantherrenhewan. Akngey irrwerl-arenyan arrantherr-apeny-wenyarl. Ra mwerr-angker inngarl anthem. Ra arrantherr-apeny-wenyarl. Ra anthem Inweng Mwerr-angkerarl arrewantherr, arrantherr renh ayernentyan.”
Arlta ingwerelan Jesus-el artwa arrenty-akert arey-alhew. Arrentyel artwa renh angkey-angenhelenh. Jesus-el arrenty irrentew ikwer-they, artwa rap angkenh-anem. Akngerrelan apatemel arew.
Ingwer-rneman angkerrenh, “Atyetyart arrenty-rnem-wenhel Jesus yanhan rlterrkelew, ra arrenty-rnem irrent-aynteyew.”
Ingwer-rneman iterrew, Jesus arrkerneyew, rernemap ayernew, “Mwerr-angker mwanty mpwaraynta arawerrng-akertel! Alakenh anantherr areyew, Akngeyelanang inngarl ngenh thwenew.”
Jesus-elan kanper-antey iterl-arew, rernemarl iterrenh, rap angkanem ikwer-rnem ilew. “Artwa ilkwa apek atyetyart anem apmer anyentew. Akngerr apmer ikwer-areny-rnem apek amentew-amenterrem, intem-antey rernem atwerrerl-anenty. Nthakenh rerneman anyent-antey aney-angenh, rernemap ingkerrenh arlperrty alhem. Apmer ikwer-rnem-wenh-itwew irrpetyapant-anem aneyelpem. Artwa ilkwa ran atyetyart irrpetyapew-anem anem. Akngerr-rneman altyernem-then atwerrem apek intem. Nthakenh rerneman anyent-antey aney-angenh, rernemap ingkerrenh arlperrty alhem. Apmer ikwer-rnem-wenh-itwew irrpetyapant-anem aneyelpem.
Arrantherran iterreyel, atyetyart arrenty-rnem-wenhel ayenh rlterrkelerl-anenty-arrpantey. Arrangkwarl yanhey! Ran atyetyart atyeng aney-angenharl. Ran atyetyart arrenty-rnemewantarl aneyel. Nthekwern ra arrenty-rnem irrentey-angenh, ra atyetyart arrenty-rnem irrpetyapew aneyelpewerr. Nthekwern atyetyart arrenty-rnem-wenhel ikwerenh-rnem irrentey-angenh, arrangkw.
Arrantherr iterreyel, rarl ayenh rlterrkelerl-anenty-arrpantey, arrenty-rnem irrent-aynteyew. Iterrenh-arey arrpemarl arrantherr! Arrewantherrenh-rnem-alew, rernemarl arrenty-rnem irrentey-angker arrpemarl? Arrenty Satan-elang renh-rnem rlterrkeley-angenh, arrangkw! Nga alakenh angkenty, rernemap ngkweng ahelerrem, rernemarl ilem, ‘Rlterrk Akngey-wenhelant arrenty irrentey-angker.’
Akngey atyetyart ilkwanem ingkerrew anem. Arawerrng ikwerenh-akertel athan arrenty-rnem irrentey-angker inngarl. Anngel arrantherr aley areyel.”
Jesus-el angka ingwer-anem ilenh, arawerrng Akngey-wenhan rlterrk Satan-wenh-angkwarr. “Artwa rlterrk ilkwel warl ikwerenh arntarnt-arem. Rarl alakenh arntarnt-arem, ilek-ilek ikwerenh mwanty ayntem warl kwenel. Ingwerentyakel nthakenh irrtyert-iney-angenh.
Artwa ingwer rlterrk innga ikwer-angkwarr apetyenty, renhap athenemel atwem. Rap inem ilek-ilek warlelarl aynteyel-rnem, rap arlperrtyelemel anthem ikwerenh-rnemew-anem.”
Jesus angkew, “Ingwerenty atyeng ilkelhey-angenh, atyenh-wenyarl ra. Ran ingwer-rnem atyeng-warl akngetyey-angenh, ranap renh-rnem atyeng-wety thweneyelarl arleng.”
Jesus angkew ikwer-rnem, “Arrenty-wenh-angkwarrarl alakenh-anyeman. Ra artwa anyentel-arleng-tangkwel anem, ingwerentyelap renh irrentem-anem ikwer-they. Ra artwa renh iwerl-alhem-anem, rap alhem-anem, arlpaw-ampeny-warl-anem ywarn-antey nthwem, artwa ingwerew arternperreyew. Ran ament angkem, ‘Ayengan angkep artwa ikwer-warl alpem, ayengarl awank anenh-warl.’
Rap angkep alpem, artwa renh mwerr-anem arey-alpem. Ranap arrenty atnyeney-angenh-anem. Inweng Akngey-wenh rap atnyeney-angenh arrpemarl, rarl warl aternng-weny arey-alpem-apeny, iylpwanem.
Arrenty rarl arem-penh, ra alpem, apmwa innga 7 ingwer-rneman ingwerl-alpeyew, rernemap ingkerrenh artwa ikwer-warl aylpey-alpem-anem. Artwa irrepern ra arrenty anyent-tangkwel atnyenenh. Aleyan ra anem apmwa innganem, arrenty akngerr-akert. Angka atyenhew awelhemer apenterl-anemel, alakenh ikwer apmwa ayntewerr arrpemarl.”
Jesus-arl angkenh-antey, arelh anyent arlkew, “Amengkw rarl ngenh alkenhelew ra inkwerelheyel!”
Jesus-el tyernew, “Arrangkwarl. Ingwer-rnem angka Akngey-wenhewarl awelheyel-rnem, rernemarl inkwerelheyel inngan.”
Akngerr-anem akngerr-anem akarrerrenh Jesus-warl, rap angkew ikwer-rnem. “Arrantherran apmwarl! Arrantherran intemarl ayerneyel, ‘Mwerr-angker mwanty mpwara Akngey-wenh arawerrng-akertel!’ Nthakenh atha alakenh-anyem mpwarey-angenh arrewantherr. Athan angka Jonah-akertant ilem. Ranap angkakert Akngey-wenh awank-akerrarl anenh.
Arrantherr angka weth iterl-areyel. Aylperr ilkwel renh kwertnew, ingwa atherrel ra ayntenh aylperr-itwel kwen. Akngeyel aylperr iylarnew, Jonah renh iteth-antey rlkwethel iwenhey-alpeyew aketh-warl kwaty impalth-warl. Ikwer-penhan rap tawen ilkwewarl Nineveh-warl alhew-anem, ra apmer ikwer-areny-rnem ileyew, apmwewety angkeperreyew Akngey-warl-athek. Ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh, ayengap arrewantherr katy ilweyenh, awenngel ingwa atherrel aynteyenh, Jonah-arl aylperr-itwel ingwa atherrew ayntew-apeny. Ayengap angkep itetherreyenhan ipmepenh, arrantherraw Akngey-warl-athek angkeperreyew.
Nineveh-areny-rnem Jonah-ew awelhew, rarl angka Akngey-wenh ilenhew. Rernemap nyerrerrew-anem, apmwewetyan angkeperrew. Akngeyel apmwa irrarlkew ikwer-rnem-wety, rap ikwer-rnem awakelhey-angenharl, angkep renh-rnem atweyewan, arrangkwarl. Kel ayengan ilkwa inngarl Jonah-angkwarr. Arlta anyentel, Akngeyel ingkerrenh-antey rnkerneyenh, renh-rnem ayernemel, iylpareth rernem awelhenty. Arlta ikwerel-antey, Nineveh-areny-rnemel arrenhantherrenh apmwa antweyenh, arrantherr atyeng awelhey-angenharl, apmwewety angkeperrey-angenh. Arrantherr angka iterl-areyel arelh atyetyart Sheba-areny-akert. Ra awew, atyetyart Solomon akalty innga. Rap alhew antekerr-they arleng innga, Solomon renh aweyew, akalty innga angkenh. Ayengan akalty inngarl Solomon-angkwarr. Arlta anyentel, Akngeyel ingkerrenh-antey rnkerneyenh, renh-rnem ayernemel, iylpareth rernem awelhenty. Arlta ikwerel-antey, arelh atyetyart Sheba-arenyel arrenhantherrenh apmwa antweyenh, arrantherr atyeng awelhey-angenharl, apmwewety angkeperrey-angenh.”
<range>
Jesus-el angka ingwer-anem ilenh. “Kwenyel anantherr lyenenty arrtyem. Anantherr nthakenh arlengarrel artey-angenh, nthakenh pantyel artey-angenh, arrangkw. Anantherr irrwerl tywenem, ingwerentyel anaynt arenhey-alhem warl-itwew, rernemap aylpenhey-alhemarl.
Alakenh-anyem anngelan iwerr anewantherr lwewarrernem, anantherrap anaynt-anem arem. Anngel mwerr arem, mwerran anantherr anem lyenentyel-apeny. Annga apmwa, anantherr anem atemwengkel-apeny.
Mwanty anaynta, lyenenty ngkwenh ilwewerr, aparrngerrewerr nga!
Nga intem anem lyenenty Akngey-wenhel, renh apentemel, ntwa renh iterl-arem inngarl. Nthakenh ngenh atemwengkel artey-angenh. Nthakenh ngan apal aney-angenh, iylpelant renh awey-angenh.”
Ikwer-penh Jesus-elarl akalty-anthenh-penh, artwa Pharisee anyentel renh ilew, amern arlkweyew warl ikwerenh-itwew. Jesus alhew ikwerel-arleng, amern arlkweyew.
Artwa Pharisee-el renh arew, rap apatew. Rap iterrew, “Ay! Artwa nhenh iltya atherr irrarlkelhey-angenh Moses-wenh-angkwarr, amern arlkweyew-alentyan.”
Jesus ikwer angkew, “Arrantherr Pharisee-rnem tyampet aketh-ampeny aleth irrarlkeyel. Arrantherr apmwel-ayeth iterreyel. Aketh-ampeny arrantherr mwerr-arrpantey, kwenan apmwarl. Arrantherr apmwernemarl rnter-then.
Arrantherr arraty iterrey-angenharl. Akngeyelan arrenhantherrenh arnwarnew, iterl-areyel arrenhantherrenh kanper.
Arrantherr arraty anemer. Amern-rnem akngerr arrantherr atnyeneyel. Kel ingwer-rnem anthenherr-arey arrangkwarl aneyel-rnem. Alakenh Akngeyan inkwerelheyenharl arrewantherr, rap inngarl arrenhantherrenh apmwewety irrarlkeyenhan.
Arrantherr artwa Pharisee-rnemay! Akngeyelan arrenhantherrenh artewentyel irrwampenh-antheyenh! Arrantherrarl lyapelheleyel-apeny amern atherrk akely-rnem akep-akalthemel, akelyarl-akely anthem Akngeyewan, Moses-elarl akalty-anthenh-angkwarr. Mwerr-angker. Ingwer-rnem-alew? Arrantherr mwerr ingwer-rnemew arnwarney-angenh, arrangkw. Arrantherr Akngeyew artewentyel ilkelhey-angenh, arrangkw. Arrantherr artewentyel ilkelhemer Akngeyew ingwer-rnemew-then. Alakenh-anyem arrantherr Moses-angkwarr apentemer.
Arrantherr artwa Pharisee-rnemay! Akngeyelan arrenhantherrenh artewentyel irrwampenh-antheyenh! Arrantherr alhenty tyaty Jew-rnem-wenh-warl, arrwekel intem aney-alhem, ingwer-rnemel arrenhantherrenh araynteyew-awaty. Arrantherr inkwerelhem, ingwer-rnemarl arrewantherr kwenerrey-alhem, atyetyart ilkwa antwem.
Arrantherr artwa Pharisee-rnemay! Akngeyelan arrenhantherrenh artewentyel irrwampenh-antheyenh! Ingwer-rnemel arrenhantherrenh arem, rernemap iterrem, arrantherran mwerr-arrpantey. Arrantherran anenty apmwel-ayeth, ingwer-rnemel apentem, rernemap apmwel-ayeth arrpemarl irrem. Akngeyan arrewantherr awakelheyenh, rap atweyenh arrpemarl!” Alakenh-anyem Jesus angkew artwa Pharisee-rnemew.
Artwa akalty anyent awelhenh, ranap artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angkerarl. Rap angkew Jesus-ew, “Atyetyartay! Ntwarl artwa Pharisee-rnem alakenh iltem, ntwap anwernantherrenhan iltem arrpemarl!”
Jesus-el tyernew, “Yew-yew! Arrantherr angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnemay! Akngeyelan arrenhantherrenh artewentyel irrwampenh-antheyenh arrpemarl! Arrantherr akalty-anthem arrewantherrenh-angkwarr. Arrantherr akngerr pwerep-anthem, angka ingkerr Moses-wenhew awelheyew. Alakenh ingwerentyel artwa pwerep-anthem, ilengem awerr akngaynteyew-apeny. Pwerep-antheyel arrantherr alakenh wenh, arrantherranap renh-rnem alpemeley-angenh, arrangkw.
Akngeyelan arrenhantherrenh inngarl artewentyel irrwampenh-antheyenh! Angkakert Akngey-wenh arrwekeleny-rnem awenng-rnem-itwew aynteyneyel. Arrantherr awenng-rnem inngelhelemel intem aperneyel. Arreng arrewantherrenh-rnemel angkakert-rnem atwenharl awank-akerr. Rernemap awelhey-angenh angka Akngey-wenhew, arrangkw.
Arrantherranap awenng-rnem inngelhelemel intem aperneyel! Arrantherran alakenh mpwarem, arrantherrap apmwel-ayeth ileyel, arreng arrewantherrenh-rnem arraty anenty-arrpantey, rernemarl angkakert-rnem atwenh awank-akerr.
Arrwekel-antey Akngeyel iterl-arenh alakenh. Rap angkew, ‘Atha angkakert-rnem ingwer-rnem-then Jew-rnem-warl thweneyew. Rernemarl ingwer-rnem atwem ipmew, ingwer-rneman alhengkerr anthemantarl.’
Cain-el ayteyikw Abel-tangkwel atwew. Ingwer-rnemel-anem atwenh angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnem. Artwa anyent Zechariah rernem atwew arrpemarl, rarl rtnenh tyaty ilkwa Jew-rnem-wenhel kwen, ampwal rwew-arelh arrerenty. Yew-yew, atha arrenhantherrenh arraty ileyel. Akngeyan ahelerreyel arrewantherr. Ra arrenhantherrenh ayntarrp-ileyenh, arreng arrewantherrenh-rnemelarl angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnem atwenh awank-they.
<range>
Yew-yew! Arrantherr angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnemay! Akngeyelan arrenhantherrenh inngarl artewentyel irrwampenh-antheyenh! Arrantherr angka Akngey-wenh arraty akalty-anthemer, akngerr ingwer-rnem akaltyerreyew, ikwerenh-angkwarr anaynteyew. Arrangkwaw! Rerneman angka ikwerenh iterl-arey-angenh, arrantherr-apeny!”
Ikwer-penh Jesus anperl-alhew apmer ikwer-they. Artwa Pharisee-rnem-then artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnem-then rernem renh apenteynenh intem. Rernem ahel ikwer angkerrenh, renhap intem ayerneynenh.
Rernemap ikwer arrkernelhenh, ra apek apmwel-ayeth angkentyew, rernem ayntarrp-ileyew renharl.
Akngerr-anem akngerr-anem akarrerrenh Jesus-warl, interrenty rtnenherrenh ankertewerrenhanap. Rap kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew-tangkwel angkenh. “Mwanty anayntenh-arey, artwa Pharisee-rnem-apeny irrewerr. Rernem aney-angenh, rernemarl angkem-angkwarr.
Rernem nthakenh irrtyertel apmwel-ayeth mpwarey-angenh, Akngeyelarl arem-wety. Ra arem, rap apmwan anayntelenhey-alpem angkeparl, akngerrel iterl-areyewan. Arrantherran nthakenh irrtyertel apmwel-ayeth mpwarey-angenh arrpemarl.
Kel mwanty angkayntenh-arey. Arrantherr apek ingwerew irrtyertel ingwel angkem. Ingwerentyakel awemarl, rap ingwepenh akngerrew iley-ayntem. Arrantherr apek warl kwen-itwew arreytemel angkem. Ingwerentyakel awemarl, rap atayel angka arrewantherrenh ilem, akngerrel aweyew.”
Jesus angkew kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew, “Arrantherr atyeng apelty-rnem, athan arrenhantherrenh arraty ileyel. Atererrey-angenh artwa ahelengkw-rnem-wety. Rerneman arrenhantherrenh ipmew atwey-angker. Ipmew atwenty-penhan rernem nthakenh arrenhantherrenh irrwampenh-anthey-angenh-anem, arrangkw-anemarl.
Arrantherr Akngey anyent-wetyant atererremer. Ilkelhentyelan rap arrenhantherrenh-tangkwel atwewerr, rap iwewerr rwa ilkwewarl-anem, aletharl ampeyel-warl. Ikwer-wety arrantherr atererremeran.
Nyengk yanh-rnemew iterrenh-arey. Anantherran iterrem, nyengkew-rnem apmwewathen. Akngeyanap ikwer-rnem athamerrem, iylpelerlewey-angenh renh-rnem.
Arrewantherr Akngeyan athamerrem inngarl. Arrantherr akngerr innga alperr-apeny. Ranap kanper ingkerrenh anyentarl-anyentarl iterl-arem. Rarl thip-rnem arntarnt-arem-apeny, rap arrenhantherrenh mwanty inngarl arntarnt-arem.”
Jesus kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew angkew, “Ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh. Ayengan arraty arrewantherr angkeyel. Arrantherr ingwer-rnem ilenty, alhewer angkemel, ‘Athan Jesus apenteyel’, ayeng arrewantherr inkwerelhemarl. Athap ilem antyerl Akngey-wenh-rnem, ‘Inngarl rernem ayenh apenteyel!’
Arrantherr apek ingwer-rnem ilem, ‘Athan Jesus-arl iterl-arey-angenh’, ayengap arrewantherr-wety intwemelerremarl. Athap ilem antyerl Akngey-wenh-rnem, ‘Renh-rnem atha iterl-arey-angenhaw!’
Arrantherr apek atyeng apmwel-ayeth angkem, Artwa Akngey-wenh Innga ikwer. Arrantherrap Akngey-warl alakenh angkem, ‘Akngeyay! Apmwa atyeng-wety irrarlka.’ Rap apmwa renh irrarlkem arrewantherr-wety. Rap arrewantherr awakelhey-angenharl, arrenhantherrenh angkep atweyewan, arrangkwarl. Arrantherr apek apmwel-ayeth angkem Inweng Mwerr-angker Akngey-wenh ikwer. Akngeyelanap nthakenh apmwa renh irrarlkey-angenharl arrewantherr-wety, arrangkwarl. Arrantherrap apmwa ikwer-akert-antey anayntem intem-antey.
Arrantherr ayenh apententy, mwanty ingwer-rnemel arrenhantherrenh antwerrkewerran, tyaty Jew-rnem-wenh-warl akngewerr-anem. Rernem arrenhantherrenh court-warl apek akngewerr-anem. Artwa rltwernemel-then atyetyart ingwer-rnemel-then rernemap arrenhantherrenh arrkernem, ayern-ayntem-anem intem. Atererrey-angenh, rernemarl ayernem-wetyan.
Inweng Mwerr-angker Akngey-wenh ra akalty-anthem, angkeyew arraty, rernem ayernentyan.”
Akngerr ingwer-rnem anenh-antey, Jesus-ew awelherrenh. Artwa anyentan angkew ikwer, “Atyetyartay! Awayaty atyenhel-then ayla akngey aylewenh iylpelerlewew. Awayaty atyenhel akngew akngey-wenh ilek-ilek ingkerrenh. Ntwa renh ilemer, ampwal-rnem arlperrtyeleyew atyengarl ingwerentyan.”
Jesus-el tyernew, “Ayengan arla, mpwel-wenharl yanhan! Nthakenh atha iley-angenh. Mpwelarrp arlperrtyelenh-atherr!”
Rap ingkerrew-anem angkew, “Arternp anemel awelhenherr-arey. Anketyerrerl-aney-angenh! Nthakenh arrantherr ampwal akngerrew inkwerelhey-angenh. Nthakenh ilek-ilekel arrenhantherrenh akngey-angenh Akngey-warl, arrangkw.”
Jesus-el angkanem ilenh ikwer-rnem. “Artwa anyent anenh ampwal akngerr-akert. Ra apmer akngerrew-artey anem, rap amern akngerr lyapelhelenhan.
Warlan amern akwerneyew-arelh ingkerrenh arrngelew. Rap nthakenh amern lyerteny-rneman akwerney-angenh, ingwer-ingwer arlkwaynteyewan. Rap ywarn-anem iterrew.
Rarl ament iterrenh-penh, ra angkew, ‘Alakenh atha mpwarey. Atha warl akely-rnem atakey, ilkwernem-anem arteyneyew. Alakenhan mwerrarl, atha amern ingkerrenh akwerneyew ampwal-rnem-then.
Kel ilek-ilek atha atnyeneyel-anem, ayeng ltyerreyew-anem, warrkerrey-angenh-anem. Atha inkwerelhemel amern-then arlkwaynteyew, ngkwarl-then antywaynteyew.’
Akngeyel ranap renh arew, angkew-anem ikwer, ‘Ngan apmwel-ayeth iterreyel! Rlengkan ingwel nga ilwem! Amern yanh-rnem-alew, ngkwengarl ntwa amentew akarrelenh? Rernemap ingwer-rnemewant-anem aynteman.’”
Jesus-el angka ilenh-penh, rap angkew ikwer-rnem, “Alakenh-anyem irrem artwa anketyewan, ampwal mwerr-angker-rnemarl akarreleyel amentew, ingwer-rnem anthey-angenh. Ran Akngeyew iterrey-angenh. Ra iterreyel, rant ilek-ilek atnyenerl-anenty-arrpantey, Akngey-angkwarran arrangkwarl.”
Ikwer-penh Jesus angkew kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew, “Nthakenh arrantherr intem artewenty iterrey-angenh amernew-then arnkwew-then. Akngeyel arrenhantherrenh arntarnt-aremarl.
Mwerrarlap amern-then arnkwethen atnyeneyew. Iteth aneyew mwerr inngarl.
Angerl yanh-rnem arenh-arey. Rernem-alew? Rernem irrngwa ilkanthey-angenharl, amern atherrkeny lyapeyewan, arrangkw. Amern ampengerrenty, rernemap akalthemel iney-angenh, arrangkw. Rernem amern warl-warl-anem akwerney-angenh, ingwer-ingwer-anem arlkwaynteyew. Arrangkwarl! Akngey rant renh-rnem wantem, rarl ikwer-rnem athamerreman. Arrewantherranap ran athamerrem inngarl, nthakenh iwerl-alhey-angenh!
Arrantherr ilkelheyel, arleng-alenty anaynteyew, ampwerreyew-atety. Nthakenh arrantherr iterrey-angenh, arleng-alenty anaynteyew, arrangkw. Arleng-alenty apek arrantherr anem, arrangkw apek. Alakenh artewenty iterrey-angenh, amern akngerr ineyew, arrantherr arlkwaynteyew.
<range>
Arnkwewan artewenty iterrey-angenh arrpemarl. Alpeyt yanh-rnem arenh-arey. Rernem-alew? Rernem warrkerrey-angenh. Arnkwethen atanthey-angenh, rernem aylpeyew, arrangkw. Mwerr-angkerarl rernem rtnew-rtnem. Atyetyart Solomon, awank-akerrarl anenh, arnkwa mwerr-angker arlkeny-arlkenyelarl ra aylpenh. Arnkwa Solomon-wenh mwerr-angker, alpeyt-rnemanap mwerr-angker inngarl!
Akngeyel arnwarnew ilek-ilek alpeyt-rnem atherrk-rnem-then. Aherretyel rernem arlenyerrem, anantherrap arrtyem-anem. Ra ingkerr arntarnt-arem, arrewantherr Akngey artewenty athamerrem, nthakenh iwerl-alhey-angenh! Artewenty iterrey-angenh, arnkwa akngerrel aylpaynteyew. Arrantherran Akngeyewan awelh-aynteyew. Irrtywerremel renh apentey-angenh!
Kel iterrey-angenh alakenh, ‘Amern-then aker-then-alew? Kwaty-then teylip-then-alew?’ Alakenh artewenty iterrey-angenh!
Ingwer-rnem Akngey iterl-arey-angenh-rnemel rernem alakenh intem iterrem. Akngey irrwerl-arenyel arrenhantherrenh iterl-aremarl, nthakenh iwerl-alhey-angenh. Ra iterl-arem, arrantherrarl amern-weny arnkweweny-thenan aneyelan, rarlap antheman arrewantherr.
Akngeyan atyetyart ilkwa ingkerrew, rap arrenhantherrenh arntarnt-areyel. Ikwerew ament arrantherr iterrenty, rap anthem amern-then arnkwethen ampwal ingwer-rnem-thenan arrewantherr.”
Jesus angkew kwertengerl 12 ikwer-rnem, “Arrantherran irrpetyap. Atererrey-angenh. Arrantherr yep-yep-rnem-apeny, Akngeyan yep-yepew-artey-apenyarl. Rap arrenhantherrenh ayerrpelew, ikwer-itwel aney-alpeyew.
Ampwal-rnem arrantherrarl akarrelenh-rnem ahern nhenh-itwew, arrangkwarlap ikwer-angkwarran. Ampwal-rnem akngerr apwert-then akarrelenty, ingwerentyel irrtyert-inewerr apek, interrkel arlkwewerr apek. Ampwal-rnem tharlemelenh-arey, apwert-anem ingwer-rnemew anthemel arrangkwarl aneyel-rnemew. Arrantherrap alakenh-anyem Akngey-warl anthem. Rap arrernem arrewantherr ilek-ilek mwerr-angker irrwerl-itwew. Mwerr-angker ayntayntem intem-antey irrwerl-itwew, nthakenh ywerrey-angenh, arrangkw. Ingwerentyel irrtyert-iney-angenh, interrkel arlkwey-angenh, arrangkw.
Arrantherr iterl-arenty, Akngeyel ilek-ilek mwerr-angker arrewantherr irrwerl-itwew atnyeneyel, arrantherrap intem iterrem Akngeyew. Arrantherr ilek-ilekant atnyenem ahern nhenh-itwew, arrantherranap iterrem ampwal ikwer-rnemewant.”
Jesus angkew ikwer-rnem, “Mwanty arntarnt-arelh-ayntenh-arey atyeng, ayengarl angkep apey-alheyenh ahern nhenh-warl. Angka nhew awelhenh-arey. Artwa ilkwa anyent anenh warrkenh akngerrew-artey. Atwerrpan ra angkew ikwerenh-rnemew, ‘Ayengarl alhem-wety atyeng apelty areyew, arrantherran warl atyenh arntarnt-arayntenh-arey. Mpwelherl-anemel, ayengant apey-alpeyew-atety, arntarnt-arelhemel atyeng.’ Rap anperl-alhew ikwer apelty-wenh apmer-warl-anem. Akngerr apmer ikwerel akarrerrenh, amern akngerr inkwerelhemel kwenty arlkwerrenh. Ingwa ikwerel-antey artwa ilkwa ra alpew warl ikwerenh-warl. Warrkenh ikwerenh-rnem atyek-antey anenh, arntarnt-arelhenh ikwer lyenenty-akert. Rarl arlkey-alpew, rerneman arriw ikwer altywerelew. Artwa ilkwan inkwerelhew, warrkenh ikwerenh-rnemarl atyek-antey ikwer mpwelhemew, rarl ilanthew-angkwarr. Ra renh-rnem ilew arrernelheyew, rap amentel-antey amern-anem ampernew, rernem arlkweyew.
<range>
<range>
Mwerrang awelheyelay? Artwa ilkwa ingwer apek apey-alpew ampepenyel ingwel, aherrk-aherrkel apek. Warrkenh ikwerenh-rnem atyek-antey mpwelhenh ikwer, rernemap inkwerelhey-ayntem, artwa ilkwa ran inkwerelhew arrpemarl ikwer-rnem.”
Jesus-elan angka ingwer-anem ikwer-rnem ilenh. “Irrtyert-awarr alhew anyelkel-antey warl anyent-warl. Rap warlew-artey iley-angenh-antey, warlew-artey ra ikwer atyek-anteyarl arntarnt-arelherl-anewerr, alwernemel renh irrentewerrarl. Rap kwen aylpenhew, ilek-ilek-anem inew.
Ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh. Arrantherr atyeng arntarnt-arelheyewan, arrantherrarl iterl-arey-angenh, ayengarl angkep apey-alheyenhan. Arrantherr apal anerl-anewerr, ayengan arwapeny apey-alheyenh, aremerrey-alheyenh.” Alakenh-anyem Jesus ilelhenh kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew.
Peter-el Jesus ayernew, “Ingkartay, 12 anwernantherrant iterrem angka nhenhew? Ingkerrenh-antey apek iterrem angka ikwer?”
Jesus-elan tyernew alakenh: “Atha angka arrenhantherrenh artwa akalty-akert ileyew, rarl arraty intem Akngeyew anem. Artwa ilkwel artwa nhelkwer-anyem arew. Rap renh arrernew, atyetyart ampepel aneyew, rarl warrkenh ingwer-rnem arntarnt-araynteyew, amern antherl-aynteyew.
Artwa ilkwa alhew-tangkwel. Rarl apey-alpewel, warrkenh renh arey-alpew, mwerrarl warrkerrenh artewentyel.
Ra inkwerelhew, rap angkew warrkenhew, ‘Nga mwerr-angker innga warrkerrew. Nhepenh-anyem nga warlewant atyetyart aney-angenh. Ngan atyetyart aneyenh ilek-ilekew; warlew, pwelek-rnemew, atherrkew, ilek-ilek ingkerrenh atyenhew.’
Warrkenh ingweran arraty warrkerrey-angenh apek. Ra iterrew, ‘Atyengew-artey apey-alpey-angenh-antey, intem apek alhew.’ Ran iltemel atwenh warrkenh ingwer-rnem, artwernem-then arelh-rnem-akerr. Ran aynterlant-anenh, amernant akngerrarl arlkwemel, ngkwarl-then antywenh, terangkerreyew-atety.
Rap apal ayntem, ikwerew-arteyarl apey-alpewel. Artwa ikwerew-arteyel renh artewentyel atwew, irrentemel ingwer-rnemarl anenh-warl, Akngey apentey-angenh-rnem-warl-anem.” Alakenh-anyem Jesus ikwer-rnem angkenh.
Jesus-el angka warrkenh-akert anayntelew. “Mwerr arrantherr aweyel angka nhenhan? Warrkenhel iterl-areyel arraty-angkwarr, ikwerew-arteyelarl renh ilanthew-angkwarr, rap alakenh irremer. Ra apmwelhelenty, ikwerew-arteyel renh artewentyel irrwampenh-anthem.
Ikwerew-arteyel renh mwanty iley-angenh apek, alakenh ileyew. Warrkenh ra apmwelhelenty, ikwerew-arteyel renh alyepelant irrwampenh-anthem. Kel alakenhaym Akngeyelan anthem warrk akely ingwerenty anyentew. Akngey ilkelhem, ikwer arraty warrkerreyew. Rap renh ayerney-angenh warrk ingwerewan. Akngeyel apek warrk ilkwarl ingwerentyak anyentew anthem-anem. Akngey ilkelhem, ra ikwer arraty warrkerreyew arrpemarl. Nthekwern ra alakenh angkey-angenh, ‘Warrk nhayman ilkwarl, nthekwern atha arnwarney-angenh.’”
Jesus-elan kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem akalty-anthenh-antey, rap ikwer-rnem angkew, “Ayeng apetyew ahern nhenh-warl, angka Akngey-wenh ilaynteyew. Ingwer-rnemelan iylparethel awey-angenh. Akngeyel renh-rnem rwewarl iweyenh, aletharl ampeyel-warl. Ayengan iterreyel, ‘Akngey alakenh anamerl irremer!’
Ingwer-rnemel-tangkwel ayenh atweyenh, artewentyel irrwampenh-anthemel. Akngeyel ilew awank-akerr, alakenharl irreyenh. Ayengan artewenty iterreyel-anem mpwelheyel, ayenh rernem ywerrelhelemel ipmew atweyew-atety.
Arrantherr apmwel-ayeth iterreyel alakenh, ‘Jesus-ang apetyew ahern nhenh-warl, ingwer-rnem ileyew, akeleyt anaynteyew?’ Arrangkwarl! Akngerr ilterrerl-aneyenh arnerant-arey atyeng-they.
Ingwer-rnem altyernem anerl-aneyenh warl anyentel. Ingwer-rnemel ayenh apenteyenh, ingwer-rnemelan arrangkw apek.
Rernemap ingkerrenh ilterrerl-aneyenh, akeleyt aney-angenh, arrangkw. Aynenheng-rnem ilterrerl-aneyenh. Amenheng-rnem ilterrerl-aneyenh arrpemarl. Anherrenheng-rnem ilterrerl-aneyenh arrpemarl. Alakenhaym akngerran ilterrerl-aneyenh atyeng-they.”
Jesus angkew akngerrarl rtnenherrenhew, “Arrantherrarl akwerrkel-akwerrkel arem, alker-itwewarl artenhey-alpem, arrantherrap alakenh angkem, ‘Ya, rlengkan kwatyarl rntwem.’ Raw inngarl rntweman.
Arepal pwenty, arrantherr alakenh angkem, ‘Ya, aherrety-anem irrenhey-alpeyenh alerl-antey.’ Rap inngarl aherrety irreman.
Arrantherran arraty iterrey-angenh! Arrantherr arem akwerrkel-akwerrkel-then arepal-then, arrantherrap arem, nthakenh irreyenh. Arratyip! Arrantherr iterl-aremer, ran aynteyenh, ayengarl angkeyel-angkwarr. Rlengkan arrantherr anngel ilek-ilek areyel. Arrantherrap iterl-arey-angenh, nthakenh irreyenh arrwekel.
Arrantherr iterl-aremer, arraty aneyew. Kel arrantherr arraty anayntenh-arey!
Athan angka ilem, arraty-angkwarr aneyew-arelh. Mwanty innga iterrenh-arey! Ntwa apek ingwerenty iltenh. Ra apek artewenty ahelerrew ngkweng, ngenh court-emeleyew apek. Nga angkemer ikwer-warl, arternp ikwer awelhemel. Ra apek ngkweng angkem, ‘Menty-anem iylpelerrey’. Alakenhaym mwerrant-atherr-anem mpwelanth pweyterremarl. Ngetangkwel apek ikwer-warl ilelhey-angenh, ra ngenh inngarl court-emelewerr. Artwa court-ew-arteyel ngenh ilem, apwert akngerr ikwer antheyew. Ra ngenh ahayiwem-anem iltyemwerney-warl, akwernem-anem iltyemwerneyel ngenh.
Ngenhap arlengew-alenty tyayl-itwew atnyenem, ntwa apwert antheyew-atety, artwa court-ew-arteyelarl ilanthew-angkwarr.” Alakenh-anyem Jesus-el akngerr akalty-anthenh.
Jesus-el akngerran akalty-anthenh-antey, ingwer-rneman apetyew ikwer-warl angka apmwakert. Rernemap ikwer-warl angkey-alhew, “Anantherran ngwampant apetyew Jerusalem-they. Nhakan akngerr Galilee-areny-rnem aylpew tyaty ilkwewarl Jew-rnem-wenh-warl, Akngeyew kwenerr-aynteyew. Atnwenth-rnem-then rernem Akngeyew atwew arrtyemel. Rernemarl alakenh irrenhewarl, Atyetyart Pilate-wenh ahawarr-rnem rernem alhew, aylpenhew-anem tyaty ilkwewarl. Rernemap Galilee-areny-rnem ingkerrenh atwey-alhew ipmew-antey!”
Jesus-el awew, rap ayernew, “Nthakenharl arrantherran iterreyel? Ilek-wety akngerr Galilee-areny-rnem ilwew? Rerneman irrwernelhew, apmwel-ayetharl apek anenh? Akngeyelap apek renh-rnem irrwampenh-antheyew? Ingwer-rnem Galilee-arenyan mwerr-angkwarr apek anenh?
Awelhenh-arey atyeng arrantherr! Arrantherr nyerrerremel apmwewety angkeperremer Akngey-warl, arrantherran ilwewerr arrpemarl.
Arrantherr apek angka awew, artwa 18 weth-rnem tawen Siloam-areny-akert? Warl arlpenty ilkwa atakelhew, aytnemel ikwer-rnem-warl, lthwew-anem renh-rnem ipmew-antey. Rernem-alew? Arrantherr apek iterreyel, Siloam-areny-rneman apmwel-ayetharl anenh? Akngeyan ikwer-rnem iterrey-angenh apek, renh-rnem arntarnt-arey-angenh, ingkerrenh-anemarl ilwew? Arrangkw, alakenh-weny. Rerneman apmwelhelew, arrantherr-apeny.
Arrantherr apmwewety angkeperremer Akngey-warl, arrantherrap ilwewerr arrpemarl.”
Jesus-el renh-rnem akalty-antheyew, Akngeyan akngerrew mpwelheyel, rernem angkeperrenhey-alpeyew apmwethey, ra renh-rnem irrwampenh-anthewerr. Rap ilenh-anem angka ikwer-rnem. “Artwa ilkwelan katen atnyenenh, rap arwerl tywerrk-apeny lyapelhelenh katen ikwer-itwew. Rap arerlenty-akngenh amern anentyew arwerl ikwer-itwew ywarn-antey.
Rap angkew warrkenh ikwerenhew, ‘Aherrety irrpetyew-anem atha arenh arwerl nhenh amern anentyew. Arrangkwarl! Arwerl nhenhelan ahern arrngelem arrangkwew. Arterney-anem, arwerl ingwerant-anem lyapelheley-alkenh.’
Artwa warrkenh angkew, ‘Artwa ilkway, aherrety anyentew-anem alerl mpwelhey. Alerl atha angerney ahern itwelhelemel, atna pwelek-wenh-anem arrernemel.
Aherrety anyent-penhel mwerr-anem apek lyapem. Kel mwerr. Amern aney-angenhan, athap arternemarl.’” Alakenh-anyem Jesus-elan ilenh ikwer-rnem.
Ikwer-penh, Saturday-el, arlta ikwerel ltyerrey-angkerel, Jesus aylpenhew tyaty ilkwewarl Jew-rnem-wenh-warl. Rap akngerr innga akalty-anthenh.
Arelh arntety anyent anenh. Ran artep apmwa alhenh, nthekwern arratyerrey-angenh, arrangkw. Arrenty anyentel renh arntetyelew awank-akerr, aherrety 18-el.
Jesus-el renh arew, rap arlkew-anem, ra apetyeyew. Rap angkew, “Irrepern ngan arelhampw! Atha arrenty ngkweng-wety irrentem.”
Rap arelh arnew itepel, rap anamerl-antey arratyerrenhey-alpew-anem. Arelh rap artewentyel inkwerelhew, Akngey nakemel.
Artwa rltwa tyatyew-arteyel arew, ra ahelerrew Jesus-ew. Rap ingkerrenh iltew alakenh, “Arlta 6-ant warrkerreyew-arelh. Rlengkan Saturday-el, arlta ltyerrey-angker. Saturday-el anantherr Akngey-warl-athek angkem. Arlta ingwer-rnemel arrantherr apetyemer mwerrel-aynteyewan.”
Jesus-el alakenh tyernew, “Arrantherr artwa rltwernem apmwel-ayeth iterreyel, Akngey apenterl-anenty-arrpantey arraty! Arlta arrpanenhel arrantherr atnwenth-rnem tyarlewem, kwaty antywaynteyew, atherrk-then arlkwaynteyew. Nthakenh arrantherr angkethakw iwerl-alhey-angenh, rtnaynteyew parrikel kwen. Saturday-el arrantherran alakenh-anyem iwerl-alhey-angenh arrpemarl.
Arrantherranap atnwenthew ilek-ilekew amperrngerrem. Alakenh ayengan amperrngerrew arrpemarl arelhampw nhenhew, atha Saturday-el mwerrelemel.”
Artwa rltwernemel awew, rernemap apatew, Jesus-elarl nyerrel-anthew. Ingwer-rneman inkwerelhewarl, Jesus-elarl ilek-ilek mwerr-angker mpwarenhew arawerrng rlterrk-akertel.
Ingwer-ingwer Jesus-elan akngerr akalty-anthenh angka Akngey-akertew, rarl atyetyart aneyenh ingkerrenhew. Rap ayernew, “Nthakenharlap Akngey-wenh-rneman akngerrerrem? Ilek-apenyarlap rerneman?
Rernemanap arwerl akely-apenyarl. Thip anyent arrernelhem, atharlkw arwerl ikwer-itwew mpwareyew. Arwerlarl ilkwerrem-warl thip akngerr-anem akarrerrem, atharlkw arwerl ikwer-itwew mpwareyew. Alakenh-anyem akngerr-anem akarrerrem Akngey-warl.”
Jesus-elap renh-rnem ayernew arrpemarl, “Nthakenharlap Akngey-wenh-rnem akngerrerrem? Ilek-apenyarlap rerneman?
Arelhel apek amern rtamp akely atherr-tangkwel ampernem. Rap amperneyneyel akngerrerreyew-atety, ingkerrenhel arlkweyew. Alakenh-anyem Akngey-wenh-rneman irrpetyap-tangkwel, ikwer-they akngerr-anem akngerr-anem irrem.”
Jesus alhenh-antey Jerusalem-warl. Rap apmer arrpanenh-warl alhenh, akalty-antherl-apenh akngerr.
Ingwerelan renh ayernew, “Atyetyartay! Akngeyel irrpetyap apekant akngeyneyenh, ikwer-itwel aney-alpeyew, akngerr-weny apek arrangkw?” Jesus-el angkanem ikwer-rnem ilenh.
“Arrantherran arraty anemer. Mwanty atyeng iterrenh-arey, irrwerl Akngey-itwel aney-alpeyew. Ranap arriw tyet-angkwarr aylperl-anenty-apeny. Akngerran akethelarl rtnerl-aneyenh warl-itwew. Rernemap twetiwerrerl-aneyenh, kwen aylpeyew-anem.
Warlew-arteyelarl arriw akenteyenh, ingwerenty nthakenh kwen aylpenhey-angenh, arrangkw. Arrantherr Akngey-warl-athek arraty aney-angenh-rnem, arrantherrap akethel rtnayntem. Arrantherrap arriwan rltar-atwerl-aneyenh ywarn-antey, ayernerl-aneyenh alakenh-anyem, ‘Atyetyartay! Arriw anewantherr altywerela!’ Warlew-arteyelan tyerneyenh, ‘Arrangkwaw! Athan arrenhantherrenh iterl-arey-angenh! Nthek-arenyarl arrantherran?’
Arrantherrap angkeyenh, ‘Iterl-areyelanap ntwa anenhantherr! Anantherrarlap anenh, amern arlkwenh ingkerrel-antey! Ntwa apmer anewantherrenh-itwew akalty-anthenh!’
Ranap tyerneyenh arrpemarl, ‘Rwengk, athan arrenhantherrenh iterl-arey-angenh, ayenh apentey-angenharl! Atha apmer arrewantherrenh iterl-arey-angenh! Arrantherr irrtywerremel ayenh apentenh, apmwel-ayeth anemel! Alpenh-arey atyeng-wety!’
Ikwer-penhan arrantherr areyenh Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnem-akert. Rernem ingkerr anerl-aneyenh Akngey-itwel. Nthakenh arrantherran ikwer-rnemel-arleng aney-alpey-angenh, arrangkw. Arrantherr ahelerremel artnerl-aneyenh, Akngeyarl arrewantherr-wety intwemelerreyenh.
Akngey-wenh-rneman anew-anerl-aneyenh, inkwerelhemel amern kwenty arlkwerl-anemel. Jew-rnem alethang-rnem-then pweyterreyenh anerl-anemel arrpemarl. Rerneman akngerrakw-areny, altwerl-areny, ayerrer-areny, antekerr-areny-akerr. Akngeyelanap renh-rnem ingkerrenh arntarnt-arerl-aneyenh.
Akngeyan ilkelhew, Jew-rnem-tangkwel ikwer iterreyew rlterrk. Rernemap ampep-they ipmelhew. Aleyan ingwer-rnemant-anem iterrem ikwer rlterrk. Rernem-tangkwel Akngey-itwel aney-alpeyenh.”
Jesus-arl angkenhewarl, artwa Pharisee-rnem apetyew ikwer-warl angkey-alhew, “Artwa atyetyart apmer Galilee nhenh-areny, artwa Herod, ra ilanthew, ngenh ipmew-antey atweyew! Ngan alpeyew apmer nhenh-wety!”
Ra tyernew, “Herod ra atyetyart apmwa. Ayengan atererrey-angenh ikwer-wety. Arrantherr iley-alpenh-arey renh, athan arrenty-rnem irrent-ayntem alerl-antey, arntety-rnem-then mwerrel-ayntem. Ayengan warrkerr-ayntem, warrk atyenh atha ywerrelheleyew-atety.
Ayengap anperl-alheyenh Jerusalem-warl-anem. Arlta irrpetyel ayeng alpayntem iwerr ikwerel-antey apmer ikwer-warl. Akngeyelan ayenh ilew, apmer ikwer-warl alpeyew. Herod-el nthakenh ayenh ipmew atwey-angenh apmer nhenh-itwew Galilee-itwew, arrangkw. Jerusalem-itwewant ayenh ipmew atweyenhan, angkakert-rnem atwew-apeny ikwer-itwew. Rernemap ingkerr ilwew Jerusalem-itwew.”
Jesus-an amperrngerreyelpew Jerusalem-areny-rnemew. “Ayengan ikwer-rnem amperrngerreyel Jerusalem-areny-rnemew! Rernem atwew Akngey-wenh angkakert-rnem, Akngeyelarl ikwer-rnem thwenew. Rernem apwertel wemel, ipmew-antey atwew renh-rnem. Ayenganap ilkelhew, renh-rnem ingkerrenh-antey arntarnt-araynteyew. Ayengan ilkelhew, renh-rnem ingkerrenh akarreleyew, tywek-tywekelarl akely-rnem akarrelem-apeny, aympelhel artemel. Alakenh-anyem. Arrangkwarl! Rernemanap ayenh ingkerrenhel artepelant arew!
Alakenh-anyem Akngeyelan apmer ikwer-rnem-wenh Jerusalem arntarnt-arey-angenh. Apmer yanhan alkey-anem aynteyenh. Tyaty ilkwa renhanap atep-atakeyenh, ahernel-anem ayntey-alheyenh. Rernem nthakenh ayenh arey-angenh arleng-alenty apmer yanh-itwew. Ingwer-ingwer ayeng angkep apetyeyenh. Rernemap ayenh areyenh-anem, alakenh-anem angkemel, ‘Artwa nhanyem mwerr-angker! Akngeyelan renh thwenew arawerrng rlterrk-akertel!’” Angka nhanyeman Jesus-elan ilenh Jerusalem-areny-rnem-akert.
Saturday anyentel, arlta ltyerrey-angker ikwerel Jew-rnem-wenh-angkwarrel, Jesus alhew artwa Pharisee alkenh-wenh apmer-warl, amern arlkweyew. Artwa Pharisee ingwer-rnem artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnem-then rernem akarrerrew arrpemarl apmer ikwer-warl, amern arlkweyew. Rernemap mwanty-antey Jesus arntarnt-arenh. Rernem alakenh iterrenh, “Angka Moses-wenh ra apentey-angenh apek, arntety ingwerenty mwerrelem Saturday-el.”
Artwa anyent anenharl arntety ilkwakert. Akwatherr-then arlaw-atherr-then ingkerrenh wangkew. Rap rtnerl-alhemel Jesus-warl alhew.
Jesus-elan artwa ilkwernem-anem ayernew, “Nthakenh arrantherr iterreyel? Ilek Moses-wenh-angkwarran aynteyel? Mwerrarlang artwa arntety mwerreleyewan arlta ltyerrey-angkerel? Arrangkw-part?”
Artwa ilkwerneman akeleyterrew, arrangkw tyerney-angenh. Jesus-elan artwa arntety arnew, renh mwerrelew. Rap artwa arntety-penh thwenew, mwerr-anem alpeyew apmer ikwerenh-warl.
Artwa ran alpew-wety, Jesus-el ayernerl-arrernew artwa ilkwernem, “Angka nhenhew iterrenh-arey arrantherr. Alerengkw ngkwenh apek aytnenty-alhem irrka intwer-warl Saturday-el. Ngap ikwer amperrngerrem, renhap tyerrem-anem. Pwelek ngkwenh apek aytnem. Ngap ikwer amperrngerrem, renhap tyerrem arrpemarl. Kel alakenh ayeng arntetyew amperrngerrew, athap mwerrelem Saturday-elan.”
Artwa ilkwa rerneman akeleyterrew, arrangkw tyerney-angenh, apatemel anew-anenh.
Kel akngerr anew-anenh artwa Pharisee alkenh-wenh apmerel. Jesus-el arew, rernemarl ilkelhew ingkerrenh, arrwekel aneyew artwa alkenh-itwel, amern arlkweyew. Jesus-elan renh-rnem arew, rap angkanem ikwer-rnem ilew, rernem iterl-areyew.
“Arrantherr iterl-areyel, artwethen arelh-then itengerrem anewantherrenh-angkwarr. Akngerran akarrerrem apmer anyent-warl, inkwerelhemel amern kwenty arlkwemel ikwer-atherr-itwel. Apmer ikwerew-arteyel apek ngenh ilem, ntwa amern arlkweyew arrpemarl. Pwertay mwanty! Arrwekel aney-angenh artwa ilkwel-arleng. Arrwekel-antey apek ra artwa ingwer-tangkwelarl ilew, ilkwa ngkweng-angkwarrarl.
Artwa apmerew-arteyel ngenh ilem, arnangerreyew artwa ilkwa ingwer-wety. Ngap aney-alpem ingkern-ampenyelarl. Akngerrelap ngenh arem. Kel ngap artewenty inngey nyerrerrem-anem, ngay?
Ngarl apmer ikwerel aney-alhem, mwanty-tangkwel iterra. Ingkern-ampenyel-tangkwel aney-alhemer. Apmerew-arteyel ngenh arem, rap ngenh ilem, arrwekel-ampenyel aneyew ikwer-itwel. Akngerrelap ngenh arem, rernemap ngenh iterl-arem ilkwarl.
Kel alakenh-anyem aynteyel: nga ilkwa aneyew arrkernelhem, ingwer-rnemelap ngenh akelyarl ilem. Nga apek akely-antey inkwerelhemel anem, ingwer-rnemelap ngenh ilkwarl ilem.”
Artwa alkenh Pharisee ikwer Jesus angkew-anem. “Ingwer-ingwer apek nga iterrem alakenh, ‘Atha apek ingwer-rnem ilem, apmer atyenh-warl apetyeyew, amern-then aker-then arlkweyew.’ Ngkwenh-rnemant ntwa iley-angenh. Ngkweng apelty-rnemant ntwa iley-angenh. Ingwer-rnem apwert akngerr-akert ntwa iley-angenh. Arrangkw! Ingwer-ingwer rernem ngenh ilewerr, amern arlkweyew ikwer-rnem-itwew-anem.
Ntwa amern akngerr ampernenty, ngap alakenh irremer. Apwert-weny-rnem-then lerrp-rnem-then aparrng-rnem-then ntwa ilemer, amern ngkweng-itwew arlkweyew.
Yanh-lkwer-rnemel nthakenh antheyney-angenh angkep. Akngeyelanap ngenh arntarnt-arem, irrngerney-anthemel ngenh. Ingwer-ingweran ra antheynem angkep ngkweng. Arlta ikwerel, rarl itethelem arraty-angkwarr aneyel-rnem, rap inngarl antheynem ngkweng angkep.”
Akngerr ingwer-rnem anew-anenh-antey artwa Pharisee alkenh-wenh apmer-itwew, amern arlkwemel Jesus-ew awelhenh. Rerneman apmwel-ayeth iterrenh alakenh, “Arrangkwarl aneyel-rnem rernem nthakenh aney-alpey-angenh Akngey-itwel, arrangkw.” Artwa anyentan ikwer angkew, “Anantherr inkwerelhem, Akngey-itwel aney-alpeyew amern arlkwemel. Rap arntarnt-arayntem anenhantherrenh.”
Jesus-an angkew, “Atha angka ileyew artwa ilkwakert. Artwa rap amern akngerr inew aker-then, rap iterrew, ‘Athap akngerr ilem, apetyeyew apmer atyenh-warl, amern inkwerelhemel arlkweyew.’ Rap ikwer-rnem yangkelhew, amern arlkweyew ikwer-itwew. Rernem apetyeyew, warrkenh ikwerenh-rnemel amern-then aker-then ampernentyewarlant.
Ikwerenh-rnemel ampernew-penh, rap warrkenh anyentan ikwerenh thwenew, ingwer-rnem ingwerl-alpeyew. ‘Apetyenh-arey arrantherr! Artwa ilkwa atyengew-arteyarl mpwelheyel amern kwenty-akert!’
Rernemanap anyentarl-anyentarl arlkarerrew, apetyewerr amern arlkweyew. Artwa anyentan angkew, ‘Ngwampan atha katen payemelew, athap rlengk areyew. Angkep alpa, ilerl-alpeyew artwa ngkwengew-artey, nthakenh atha ikwer-itwew arlkwey-angenharl.’
Artwa ingwer-anem angkew, ‘Ngwampan atha pwelek-rnem 10 payemelew. Atha renh-rnem arrkernemel warrkemeleyew. Angkep alpa, iley-alpeyew artwa ngkwengew-artey, nthakenh atha ikwer-itwew arlkwey-angenharl.’
Artwa ingwer-anemarl angkew, ‘Ngwampan ayeng itengerrew. Ayengan aneyew apmer-itwew akelty atyenh-akert.’
Artwa warrkenh alpem, artwa ikwerew-artey iley-alpeyew, rernemarl arlkarerrew. Artwa ilkwa ra nyerr-anem irrew, rap ahelerremel angkew, ‘Anamerl alha tawen-warl! Alha irrepern ileng-rnemew, iwerrel aneyelew-rnem nthweyew. Apwert-wenyew-rnem-then nthwa. Lerrpew-rnem-then aparrngew-rnem-then nthwa. Renh-rnem akngey-alpa apmer atyenh-warl, amern arlkweyew!’
Warrkenh rap alhew, ikwer-rnem nthweyew. Rap renh-rnem arey-alhew, atnwenhew-anem artwa ilkwewenh apmer-warl. Rap angkey-alpew, ‘Nhanteyaw! Atha akngey-alpew, ntwarl ilanthew-penh. Warl nhenhanap arrngeley-angenh-antey. Akngerr inngarl akarrerreyenh-wety.’
Artwa ilkwelan warrkenh ikwerenh thwenew arrpemarl. ‘Anamerl alha tawen aketh-ampeny-warl, ingwer-rnem irrkerel anew-aneyelew-rnem nthweyew. Rerneman apetyeyew arrpemarl apmer atyenh-warl. Warl atyenh akngerrel arrngelenheyew!’
Rap angkew-anem akngerrew warl ikwer-itwew, ‘Awelhenh-arey atyeng! Ingwer-rneman atha ilew arrwekel-antey ywarn. Rernem ayenh nyerrel anthew. Rernemap nthakenh amern atyenh arlkwey-angenharl, arrangkw!’” Jesus-elan angka nhenh ilenh, artwa ilkwel-rnemarl angka Akngey-wenh inwerlewenh. Nthakenh rernem ikwer-itwel aney-alpey-angenh.
Jesus-an alhenh-antey tawen Jerusalem-warl. Akngerrelan renh apenteynenh. Rap artepang arew, angkew-anem ikwer-rnem,
“Ingwerenty athamerrem ikwerenh-rnemewant. Aynewikw-then amewikw-then ra ilkelhem. Ra ilkelhem akeltyew-then alerikwew-rnem-then, awayikwew-then angkwerikwew-then. Rant mwantyelelhem arrpemarl. Kel ra kwertengerl atyenh aneyew apek, rap atyeng athamerremer artewentyel. Ra atyeng artewentyel ilkelheyew, ikwerenh-rnemewan alyepel. Ran ayenh apenteyew, ikwer amenterrpewant iterrey-angenh.
Ra apek kwertengerl atyenh aneyew, rap ayenh intem apent-aynteyew, ipmelhey-angenh. Ingwer-rnemel apek renh irrwampenh-anthewerr, rarl ayenhan apenteyel. Intem aneyew ra, ipmelhey-angenh.
Angka nhenhew awelhenh-arey arrantherr. Artwa anyent ilkelhew, warl arteyew. Rap iterrew-tangkwel, ‘Apwert akngerr antheyew, warl arteyewan. Ya, apwert akngerr atha atnyeneyel.’ Rap warl mwerr-angker-anem artew.
Artwa ingwer-anemarl ilkelhew, warl arteyew. Ranap mwanty-tangkwel iterrey-angenh, arrangkw. Rap warl ilkwarrpantey arteyew, apwert ikwerenh angath-antey ywerrew. Akngerrelan renh arew, warl ikwerenh ywerrelheley-angenh-antey, rernemap artwa renh atherrelhelenh,
‘Ran mwanty-tangkwel iterrey-angenh! Aleyan ra apwert-weny warl-weny-then-anem!’
Angka ingwerew-anem awelhenh-arey arrantherr. Artwa ilkwa atherr apmer ilkwew-artey atherr anenh. Anyentel artwa ahawarr-rnem 10,000 atnyenew, ingwerelan 20,000-arl atnyenew. Ingwer-ingweran ratherr ilterrenhan. Artwa ilkwa arrwekeleny iterrew mwanty, ‘Ran artwa ahawarr akngerrarl atnyeneyel atyenh-rnem-angkwarr. Nthakenh atha atyenh-rnem ilanthey-angenh, ingwer-rnem atweyew, arrangkw. Rernem atyenh-rneman atwewerrarl!
Angkakert-rnem-tangkwel atha thwenemer arleng-they-antey, akeleyt-antey artwa ilkwa ikwer angkerl-alpeyew. Anyenterremer aylanth atwerrey-angenh.’ Alakenh-anyem ra mwanty-tangkwel iterrew. Angkakert-rnem alhew artwa ilkwa ingwer-warl, rernemap ikwer angkerl-alpew akeleytelemel.”
Jesus-an angkew-anem ingkerrew, “Artwa warl artey-angker ra apwert-tangkwel arew, mwanty iterremel. Artwa ilkwa wethan iterrew artwa ikwerenh-rnem ahawarr-rnemew-tangkwel mwanty. Ingwerenty ayenh apenteyew, rap alakenh-tangkwel iterreyew mwanty, ra angkeperrewerr atyeng-wety. Ra iterremer, ‘Ingwer-rnemel ayenh irrwernewerr.’ Rap atyeng-tangkwel iterremer. Ikwerenh-rnemewan ra alyepel iterremer. Ampwal-rneman ra iwerlelpemer, ayenhant-anem apenterl-anemer.”
Jesus-el angka ingwer-anem ilew thalt-akert. “Anantherr thalt rlker-anthem-apeny aker-warl, anantherrap angkem, ‘Mwerr-angkerarl alakenhan.’ Thalt ra apek menty aynterl-anem, rap apmwerrem-anem ikweweny-anem. Nthakenh anantherr mwerreley-angenh, arrangkw. Anantherrap iwem rapety-warl. Mwanty iterrenh-arey angka nhenhew, arraty-angkwarran anemel. Thalt-weny aker anantherr nthakenh arlkwey-angenh, ikweweny wethey. Irrkaty arrpemarl Inweng Mwerr-angker-weny nthakenh anantherr Akngey-angkwarr aney-angenh, arrangkw.”
<range>
Artwernem apwert kapmentew akarreley-angker-rnem angka Moses-wenh apentey-angenh-rnem-then rernem akarrerrew, Jesus-ew awelh-aynteyew.
Artwa Pharisee-rnem artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnem-then rernem tyel-angkenh Jesus-ew alakenh, “Artwa nhenhan apmwarl! Inkwerelhemel artwa apmwernem-itwew anerl-apeyel, amern-then arlkwerl-apeyel!”
Jesus-el awew, rernemarl angkerrenh, rap angkanem ilenh.
“Artwa yep-yepew-artey anyent anenh, yep-yep-rnem 100 rarl atnyenenh. Yep-yep anyent ament alhew, rap aperrerterrew-anem. Artwa yep-yepew-arteyel 99 ingwer-rnem iwerl-alhew, atherrk arlkwaynteyew. Rap alhew, yep-yep anyent ikwer nthweyew. Rap nthwenh nthwenh arey-alheyew-atety.
Renharl arey-alhewel rap artewentyel inkwerelhewan, nthek-warl tywenerl-alhemel akngey-alpew-anem apmer-warl.
Rarl apmer-warl aremerrey-alpew, rap arlkey-alpew ikwer apelty-rnemew, ‘Apetyenh-arey arrantherr! Anantherr ingkerrenh inkwerelheyew. Yep-yep nhanyem atha inerl-alpew aperrertarl irrew-penh!’
Ingwerenty Akngey iterl-arey-angenh ra nyerrerremel ikwer-warl angkeperrenty, irrwerlel aneyel-rnem inkwerelhem, yep-yepew-artey inkwerelhew-apeny yep-yep ikwerenhew. Ingwer-rneman kel-anteyarl arraty ikwer aneyel.”
Jesus-el angka ingwer-anem ilenh. “Arelh anyent anenh ngkwelty-rnem 10-akert. Ngkwelty-rnem gold-penh, nthakenh anthey-angenh, nthakenh iwey-angenh, arrangkw. Rerneman impenarl ikwerenh, ra atnyenenh mwanty-antey. Ngkwelty anyentan aytnew, ywerrew-anem. Arelhel lyenenty-anem arrtyew, warl ikwerenh irrarlkemel arternp. Rap nthwenh nthwenh arey-alheyew-atety.
Renharl arey-alhewel rap artewentyel inkwerelhewan. Rap ikwer apelty-rnemew arlkew, ‘Apetyenh-arey arrantherr! Anantherr ingkerrenh inkwerelheyew. Ngkwelty impen nhanyem atha arey-alhew ywerrewarl-penh!’
Ingwerenty Akngey iterl-arey-angenh ra nyerrerremel ikwer-warl angkeperrenty, irrwerlel aneyel-rnem inkwerelhem, arelh inkwerelhew-apeny ngkwelty ikwerenhew.”
Jesus-el angka ingwer-anem ilenh. “Artwamp anyent alerikw atherr-akert.
Akelyelan aynikw ayernew, ‘Akngeyay! Ingwer-ingweran ntwa akalkelhelem ampwal-rnem apwert-rnem-then aylernew, anewantherrenh-angkwarr. Rlengk-antey aylernew ntwa alakenh-anyem akalkelem!’ Artwampel rap akalkelhelew-anem alerikwew-atherr.
Ikwer-penh ingwer-ingwer alerikw akelyel akarrelew ilek-ilek apwert-rnem-then. Rap apmer ikwerenh iwerlelpew, apmer ingwer-warl-anem alpew arleng intem. Apmer ikwer-itwew ra arrkentel-arlengant anenh, apwert-akerr arimpemel apmwel-ayeth.
Apwertan ikwerenh ingkerr ywerrew. Apatemel-anem ra aneyelpew. Apmer ikwer-itwew kwaty rntwey-angenh, arrangkw. Aynterrk ayntenh, amern-weny-then ayntenh. Akngerran angayakw anenh. Artwa akely ran angayakw arrpemarl anenh. Ywarn ra iterrenh, amern ineyew arlkweyewan.
Rap artwa ilkwa apmer ikwer-areny warrkew-anem ayernew. Artwa ilkwel renh thwenew, pikepik ikwerenh-rnem arntarnt-araynteyew. Rap pikepik-rnem wantenh.
Angwenhel renh amern anthey-angenh, arrangkw. Rap angayakw-antey anenh, amern apmwa pikepik-rnem-wenh angwarenh.
Ran iterrenh, ‘Ayengan angayakw-anem inngey, ayengarl apmwelhelew. Artwa warrkenh akngey atyenh-wenh-rnem rernemap amern akngerr arlkwem atnertengerreyew-atety. Ayenganap angayakwarl ilweyel!
Atha apmer nhenh iwerlelpemer, akngey atyenh-wenh apmer-warl alpemel. Ayengap ikwer angkey-alpemer, “Akngeyay, ayeng-antey apmwelhelew ngkweng. Iylpelant atha ngenh awenh, Akngey irrwerl-areny-then.
Ayenh alerey antwey-angenh. Ayengan nyerrerreyel. Warrkenh-anem ayenh arrerna ngkweng.” Alakenh-anyem ayeng akngey atyenh-warl angkeyew.’ Rap akwenterl-alhew, anperl-alhew-anem aynikw-wenh apmer-warl-anem.
Rap arrer-anem alpenh aynikw-wenh apmer-warl. Artwampan intemey arntarnt-arelhenh ikwer, rap renh arnarew-anem arleng-itwew. Rap alerikw ikwerenhew amperrngerrew. Ra anterrew, atnyenew-anem arrwantyemel.
Alerikw ikwerenh angkew, ‘Akngeyay, ayeng-antey apmwelhelew ngkweng. Iylpelant atha ngenh awenh, Akngey irrwerl-areny-then. Ayenh alerey antwey-angenh.’
Aynelikwanap renh akeleytelew, arlkemel artwa warrkenh ikwerenh-rnemew, ‘Apetyenh-arey arrantherr! Anamerl alhenh-arey, arnkwa mwerr ineyew, alerey atyenh aylpeyew! Iltyew-arelh-then pwet atherr-then ikwer akngetyey, ra aylpeyew!
Aker kapey-kapey anterant ikwer atwey, anantherr amperneyew! Rlengk anantherr kwenty arlkwem!
Ayengan iterrenh ilwentyew-athen ikwer. Ran iteth-antey! Ayeng iterrenh, ra aperrerterrenty-arrpantey, raw mwerr aney-alpew!’ Kel warrkenh-rnemel aker kapey-kapey atwew, rernemap anamerl-antey ampernew. Akngerran akarrerrew, inkwerelhemel arlkwew-arlkweyew.
Artwamp-wenh alerikw alkenhan warrkerrenh apal-antey katen-itwew. Warrk-penh ra apey-alpew apmer-warl-anem. Ra arrer-anem apmer-warl alpenh, rap aweynenh, akngerrarl inkwerelhemel aylelherrenh. Rap akngerr-anem arew, rntwenharl warl kwenel.
Rap itep-anem iltyerrew warrkenh anyentew, ‘Ilekay? Nthakenh irreyelay?’
Warrkenhel tyernew, ‘Ayteyengkw ngkwenh apey-alpew. Aynengkw ngkwenh inkwerelhew innga, rarl mwerr-antey apey-alpew. Ra ilanthew, aker kapey-kapey anterant ikwer atweyew, anantherr inkwerelhemel arlkweyew ingkerrel.’
