Alerikw alkenhanap ahelerrew, rarl awewel. Ran warl kwen aylpey-angenh, arrangkw. Ra akethel-antey ahelerremel rtnenh. Aynikw ikwerenh tyerrelhew warl kwen-they, rap ikwer angkew arternp-antey. ‘Ilek-wetyarl ntwa arleng-they-antey arey-alpew? Apetyaw, arlkweyew anewantherr-itwew.’
Alerikw alkenhan ikwerenh ahelerrenh-antey. ‘Arrangkw wenh! Arleng-alenty ayeng ngkweng warrkerrenh, iylpareth-then awelhenh ngkweng. Ntwanap atyeng aker kapey-kapey anthey-angenharl, atyenh-rnem-akertel atha arlkweyewan! Nanikwet akely apek atyeng anthey-angenh, arrangkw!
Alerengkw akely-alew ngkwenh? Ra apwertarl ngkwenh akngew, rap arimpew arelh apmwernem-akertel, iltyant-anem apmer-warlan apey-alpew! Ntwan iltey-angenh, arrangkw! Ntwan ilanthew artwa warrkenh-rnem, aker kapey-kapey anterant atweyew, inkwerelhemel arlkweyew akngerrel!’
Aynikwan alerikw alkenhew angkew, ‘Alereyay, awelha atyeng. Aylakan itengant-atherr anenharl. Ilek-ilek ingkerr aylewakenhan.
Mwerrarl alakenh-anyeman, ingkerrelarl inkwerelhemel arlkweman, ayteyengkw ngkwenharl aney-alpew. Ayengan iterrenh ilwentyew-athen ikwer. Ran iteth-antey aney-alpew. Ayengan iterrenh, ra aperrerterrenty-arrpantey, raw mwerr-antey aney-alpew!’”
Jesus-el angka ilenh kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew. “Artwa ilkwa anyent anenh, apwert-then ampwal-rnem-then mwerr-angker atnyenenh. Ra warrkenh anyent arrernew, ilek-ilek ingkerrenh arntarnt-araynteyew. Ingwer-ingwer ingwer-rnem artwa ilkwa ikwer angkew, ‘Artwa warrkenh ngkwenh yanh irrtyert-awarr! Rap apwertan ngkwenh apmwel-ayeth arimpeyel.’
Rap arlkew artwa warrkenh ikwerenhew, apetyeyew ikwer-warl. ‘Ingwer-rnemelan ngenh ileyel irrtyert-awarr. Ntwan nheng apwert atyenh apmwel-ayeth arimpeyel. Nthakenh ntwan ilew? Pip weth inerl-alpa, ntwarl ingkwernew-akert ilek-ilek apwert-then ikwer-warl. Arlta irrpetyap-penh atha ngenh thwenem nhenh-they.’
Warrkenhan iterrew, ‘Atyengew-arteyel ayenh thweneyenh. Warrk-weny-anem ayeng angayakw anerl-aneyenh. Arlka apmwa ayengan thapel, nthakenh atha angerney-angenh, amern atherrk rnkerneyew. Nthakenh ayeng ingwer-rnemew aparelhey-angenh, nyerrel. Nthakenh-anem ayengan irreyenh?
Ya, alakenh atha ilem. Ayengan anyenterrem ingwer-rnem-warl. Ayeng warrk-they ipmelhem, rernem ayenh ilem, aney-alpeyew apmer ikwer-rnem-wenh-itwew, ayenh arntarnt-araynteyew.’
Arrwekel-antey artwa ilkwelan arlenthew anter-then ntang-then ingwer-rnemew. Artwa warrkenhel renh-rnem ilew, apetyeyew ikwer-warl. Rap artwa anyent ayernew, ‘Ilek artwa atyengew-arteyel ngkweng arlenthew?’
Artwa ran tyernew, ‘Teram-rnem 100 anter-akert-rnem.’ Artwa warrkenh angkew, ‘Anamerl pip weth ineyew alha, artwa atyengew-arteyelarl thwenew. 100-an ipara. 50-anem ingkwerna ikwer-warl.’
Rap artwa ingwer-anem ayernew, ‘Ilek artwa atyengew-arteyel ngkweng arlenthew?’ Artwa ran tyernew, ‘Yakweth-rnem 1,000 ntang-akert-rnem.’ Artwa warrkenh angkew, ‘Anamerl pip weth ineyew alha, artwa atyengew-arteyelarl thwenew. 1,000-an ipara. 800-anem ingkwerna ikwer-warl.’
Kel artwa ilkwel awew, artwa warrkenh ikwerenhelarl anyelkel arrernew. Rap renh nakew, ‘Ngan tyak inngarl. Nga iterrew mwanty-tangkwel. Ingwer-rnemel ngenh ayernem, aney-alpeyew apmer ikwer-rnem-wenh-itwew, ngenh arntarnt-araynteyew.’” Jesus-elan angka nhenhan anayntelew kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew. “Akngerran iterrem ilek-ilek ahern-arenyewant artwa warrkenh rapeny. Rernemant ament arntarnt-arerr-aynteyew. Rerneman tyakarl Akngey-wenh-rnem-angkwarr.
Arternp awelhenh-arey arrantherr! Arrantherr anyenterremer artwa ingwer-rnem-warl artwa warrkenh rapeny. Ilek-ilek apwert-then anthenh-arey ingwer-rnemew, rernem arrewantherr ilkelhem. Arrantherrarl ilek-ilek apwert-then atnyeney-angenh anem, Akngeyelanap arrenhantherrenh ayernem, alpeyew aney-alpeyew ikwer-itwel intem-antey.
Artwa anyentel apekan ampwal akely-akely ayntengeny katy arntarnt-arem. Ra apek arraty-angkwarr arntarnt-arem, renhap arrernem atyetyart ilek-ilek akngerrew-anem. Ampwal akely-akely ayntengeny ra apek apmwel-ayeth arimpenty, ampwal akngerrewanap nthakenharl renh atyetyartan arrerney-angenh, arrangkw.
Arrantherr apek ahern-areny arraty arntarnt-arey-angenh, nthakenh Akngeyel irrwerl-theyan arrenhantherrenh anthey-angenharl. Arrantherr nthakenh arraty-angkwarr arntarnt-arey-angenh.
Ilek-ilek ayntengeny arrantherr mwanty arntarnt-arey-angenh, Akngeyel nthekwern ilek-ilek anthey-angenh, arrewantherran ament atnyen-aynteyew, arrangkw.
Arrantherr iterrerl-anenty apwert akngerr inaynteyew, nthakenhanap Akngey-angkwarr arraty aney-angenh, arrangkw. Anantherr anemer Akngeyewant, apwert akngerrew iterrey-angenh.” Alakenh Jesus-el kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem ilenh.
Artwa Pharisee-rnem Jesus-ew awelhenh. Rerneman ankety-rnem apwertew, rernemap irrpeltherrenharl atherrenh ikwer. Rerneman alakenh apmwel-ayeth iterrenh, “Jesus apmwel-ayeth angkeyel. Mwerrarl anewantherr apwert akngerr atnyeneyewan. Akngeyan anewantherr inkwerelheyel, rarl apwertan anthem anewantherr arratyarl aneyelew.”
Rap angkew ikwer-rnem, “Artwa Pharisee-rnem irrtywerremel arrantherran Akngey ikwer mwerr-arrpantey aneyel. Arrantherr inkwerelhem, ingwer-rnemel arrenhantherrenh araynteyew mwerr-arrpantey. Akngeyelanap arrenhantherrenh iterl-areyel, arrantherran akwerrng iterreyel apmwel-ayeth, apwertewant iterreyel. Ran arrenhantherrenh areyelarl, ranap arrewantherr inkwerelhey-angenh.
Awank-akerr Akngeyel anthew angka rlterrk ikwerenh Moses-warl. Angkakert-rnem Akngey-wenh-rnemel angka ikwerenh pip-warl ingkwernenh, akalty-anthenh ingwer-rneman akngerr. Rernem alakenh arleng-alenty irrenh, John Baptise-emeley-angker aremerreyew-atety. John aylanthan angka mwerr-angker nharl ilenh, ‘Akngeyan ilkelheyel, ikwerenh-rnem ingkerrenh aneyew, alpeyew aney-alpeyew ikwer-itwel intem-antey.’ Aleyan akngerr-anem ilkelheyel Akngeyew, alpeyew aney-alpeyew ikwer-itwel.
Mwanty awelhenh-arey! Angka atyenhewan arrantherr awelhemer. Angka Moses-wenhew arrantherr awelhemer arrpemarl. Angka Moses-wenhan aley aynteyel-antey anewantherr. Nthakenh angka ikwerenh akely apek iparey-angenh, arrangkw. Arrwekelan alker-then ahern nhenh-then-tangkwel ywerreyelpeyenh, angka rlterrk Moses-wenh ywerreyew-alenty.
Angka Moses-wenh aynteyel arrpemarl alakenh-anyem. Artwel nthakenh arelh ikwerenh iwey-angenh, alhemel arelh ingwer-itwel, aney-alhem. Alakenhan apmwel-ayetharl. Artwa ingwerel nthakenh arelh irrkaty iney-angenh, ran iteng-areny-antey. Alakenhan apmwel-ayeth arrpemarl.”
Jesus-el angka ingwer-anem ilenh. “Artwa ilkwan anenh apwert akngerr-akert, warl mwerr-angker ilkwitwew anenh. Ra arnkwa mwerr-angkerel aylpenh, rantarl arlkwenh amern mwerr-angker.
Artwa irrepern innga anenh itnan Lazarus, tywen-angketyarrarlap ran. Arlta arrpanenh ikwerenh-rnemel irrwerlap-akngenh warl mwerr-angker-warl, arriw aketh-warl renh athenhey-alhenh, aparelh-aynteyew.
Rap arenh, artwa ilkwelarl amern mwerr-angker arlkwenh. Ra amern ampeny-ampenyarl arlkwenh, artwa ilkwelarl iwenh. Arengk akngerr apmer ikwer-itwew akarrerrenh, rernemap tywen-rnem arrwantyenh artwa irrepern ikwer-itwew.
Ingwer-ingweran Lazarus atnengkanerrew-anem. Antyerl-rnemel renh akngeynew irrwerl, aney-alpeyew Abraham-itwel-anem. Ikwer-itwew amern mwerr-angker akngerr ra arlkwenh. Kel artwa apwert akngerr-akert ra atnengkanerrew arrpemarl. Ikwerenh-rnemel renh akwernew awenng-warl,
rap aney-alpew, rwa intemarl ampeyelel. Rap pwarrkerrenh artewentyel innga. Arleng-they ra arew, Abraham-then Lazarus-then anenh.
Rap iterrew, ‘Abraham-an akngey aylewakenh wethey anenh awank-akerr’. Rap arlkew, ‘Abraham-ay! Amperrngerra atyeng! Lazarus ila, iltya pwerlp-arrerneyew kwaty-warl. Renh thwena, aleny arneyew, ayenh arlkarleleyew! Ayeng ampeyel rwa nhenhel, artewentyel pwarrkerremel!’
Abraham-el tyernew, ‘Ngan iylpelerrew arrer-antey? Alakenh-anyem aynteyel. Ngarl iteth-antey anenh ahern-itwew, ntwap ilek-ilek mwerr-angker atnyenenh akngerr. Lazarus-arl iteth-antey anenh ahern-itwew, rap arrangkwarl atnyenenh, tywenant akngerr arlkitwew. Aleyan ran inkwerelhemel-anem aneyel atyeng-itwel, ngan pwarrkerreyel artewentyel inngarl.
Alakenh-anyem aynteyel arrpemarl. Ampepelan irrka ilkwa intwer arrngert aynteyel. Anantherr nthakenh ngkweng-warl alhey-angenh nhethey. Ngan nthakenh apetyey-angenharl anewantherr-warl yanh-they, arrangkw.’
Rap arlkew rwethey, ‘Kelew. Ayteyaty-rnem 5 atyenh-rnem-alew?
Rerneman ingkerrenharl aneyel apmer akngey atyenh-wenhel. Lazarus thwena, renh-rnem ileyew, rernem arraty anaynteyew. Ayengan ikwer-rnem amperrngerreyel, nhenh-warl rernem apetyewerr intemarl ampeyel-warl.’
Abraham-el tyernew, ‘Angkarlap ayteyelengkw-rnem iterl-areyel, Akngeyelarl Moses-ew anthew. Angka ingwer-rneman rernem iterl-areyel, angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnemelarl ingkwernew. Rernemap awelhemer ikwer-rnemew.’
Rap arlkew arrpemarl, ‘Abraham-ay! Alakenh-weny! Lazarus alhemer angkep, angkanem ikwer-rnem ileyew. Rernemap inngarl awemer, Lazarus-el ilentyan, rernemap nyerrerremel angkeperrenhey-alpem Akngey-warl.’
Abraham-el tyernew arrpemarl, ‘Arrangkw, Lazarus atha thweney-angenh. Ayteyengkw ngkwenh-rnemel awenh Moses-wenh angka, angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnem-then. Rerneman awelhey-angenh ikwer-rnem, rernemap ingwerew awelhey-angenh arrpemarl.’” Alakenh-anyem Jesus-el artwa Pharisee-rnem ilenh.
Jesus angkew ikwerenh-rnemew, “Ingwer-rnemelan arrenhantherrenh arrkernem intem-antey, apmwangkwarr alhaynteyew. Akngeyelan renh-rnem artewentyel irrwampenh-antheyenh.
Artwa ingwerel arrkerney-angker renh antwerrkemer, ahenty-they arertnemer rwepel apwert ilkwewarl, kwaty alay-warl iwemel. Ra alakenh apek irrey-angenh, Akngeyan ahelerrem inngey arrkerney-angker ikwer.
Kel mwanty anayntenh-arey, arrantherr ingwer-rnem arrkernewerr, apmwangkwarr alhaynteyew. Ingwer ayenharl apenteyel apmwelhelenty ngkweng-angkwarr, ntwa renh ilemer, ra ipmelheyew. Ra nyerrerremel ngkweng angkem, ‘Ya wenh, ayeng apmwelhelew ngkweng-warl. Atha ngkweng apmwa mpwarey-angenh arrpemarl.’ Kel ntwa renh ipmemel arrpemarl, rarl apmwelhelew-penh. Nga anyenterreyew-anem ikwerel-arleng.
Kel arlta anyent ikwerel rap intem arrpemarl apmwa mpwarayntem ngkweng. Rap angkepelarreng-anem nyerrerremel angkeyam-alpayntem ngkweng. Kel ntwap mentyarl renh intem awayntem iylpelerremel ipmemel. Nga angkemer ikwer alakenh, ‘Mwerr-anem ayeng ahelerrey-angenh ngkweng. Mwerrant-atherr-anem anaynteyew aylanth.’”
Kwertengerl Jesus-wenh-rnem angkew ikwer, “Rlterrk anewantherr. Anenhantherrenh akalty-antha, ingwer-rnem apmwepenh ipmemel tyarlew-aynteyew.”
Rap angkew ikwer-rnem, “Arrantherr angkem, ‘Rlterrk anewantherr.’ Kel arrantherran apek alyep iterrentyan irrpeltherrey-angenh, arrantherrap arwerl yanhew angkem alakenh, ‘Arwerlay! Tyerrelha ahern-they! Kwaty alayel-anem ampepel rtney-alha!’ Rap ngenh inngarl iylparethel awem.” Alakenh-anyem Jesus angkenh kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew.
Jesus-el angka ilenh ikwer-rnem artwa warrkenh-akert. “Artwa warrkenhel apek katenel angernem atyetyart ikwerew-arteyew. Yep-yep apek ra arntarnt-arem atyetyart-wenh. Ingkeny aylperl-alhem, rap apey-alpem atyetyart ikwerew-artey-wenh apmer-warl. Ikwerew-artey ikwer angkey-angenh alakenh, ‘Apetya, aneyew nhel, amern nhenh arlkweyew.’ Arrangkw, alakenh-weny.
Ikwerew-artey ikwer angkem alakenh, ‘Amperna amern-then aker-then atyeng. Akngetyanem atyeng-warl. Kwaty atyeng thela, atha antyweyew. Atharl ywerrelhelem, amperna amern ngkwengant-anem.’
Warrkenh rarl awelhem, atyetyart ikwerew-arteyelarl ilanthem, rap renh nakey-angenh, arrangkw. Ran warrkerrem iylparetharl.
Alakenh-anyem warrkenh rapeny arrantherran warrkerreyel Akngeyew. Arrantherran awelhew-penh Akngeyew, arrenhantherrenh ilanthew-angkwarr, nthakenh alakenh iterrey-angenh, ‘Akngeyel anenhantherrenh nakemer, anantherrarl ikwer mwerr-angkerarl warrkerrenh.’ Arrangkw. Arrantherran alakenh iterremer, ‘Anantherran arwa warrkenh Akngey-wenh-rnem. Akngey rarl ileyel-angkwarr, anantherr apmelerr-angkwarr warrkerreyel.’”
Jesus-an alhenh-antey iwerrel Jerusalem-warl kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem-akert. Jesus alhew akwerterrp-antey Jerusalem-warl apmer Galilee-they apmer Samaria-angkwarr antekerr-antey.
Rernemap arrer-anem apmer akely-warl alhenh, artwernem 10-anem arnareynenh, Jesus-warl apetyenharl. Rernem tywen-angketyarr, nthekwern arrer alhey-angenh, arntety anthelp-anthewerr.
Rernemap arleng-antey rtney-alhew, arlkemel artewentyel, “Jesus-ay! Atyetyartay! Amperrngerra anewantherr!”
Rarl renh-rnem arey-alhew-penh, rap angkew, “Arrantherr tyaty-warl alhenh-arey. Lwewarrernelhenh-arey artwa rltwa tyatyew-artey ikwer, ra arrenhantherrenh areyew mwerr-anem.” Rernemap anperl-alhew. Rernemarl alperlewenh-angkwarr-antey, arntetyan arlkethey ywerrenhew ikwer-rnem-they.
Artwa anyentan Samaria-areny ikwer-rnem-itwel alhenh, ingwer-rneman Jew-rnemarl. Artwa Samaria-areny arelhew, arlkarl alyelkerrenh, rap angkep alpew Jesus-warl, atayel nakemel Akngey. Rap kwenerrey-alpew, Jesus-arl rtnenh-itwew, “Jesus, ntwan ayenh mwerrelew! Mwerr-angker inngarl ngan Akngey!”
<range>
Jesus angkew kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew, “Artwernem 10 mwerrerrew, ngay? Artwernem 9 weth-rnem-alew?
Anyent nhanyemant angkep iterrewan, inkwerelhemel angkeyew Akngeyew. Alethangarlap ran, apmer Samaria-areny!”
Rap artwa arntety-penhew angkew, “Rtnerl-alha alpemel-anem. Ntwan iterl-arew, athan ngenh mwerreley-angker arawerrng Akngey-wenh-akertel, ngap mwerrerrew.”
Artwa Pharisee-rnem apetyew, Jesus ayerneyew, “Ilenger Akngeyan atyetyart aneyenh ingkerrew?” Jesus-el tyernew, “Arrantherr Pharisee-rnem ywarn arntarnt-arelheyenh areyew, Akngey atyetyart ingkerrew aneyenh. Nthakenh ingwerentyak angkey-angenh, ‘Arenherr-arey arrantherr! Akngeyan apetyew, atyetyart nhenh-areny-rnemew aneyew!’
Nthakenh ingwerentyak angkey-angenharl, ‘Arenherr-arey arrantherr! Akngeyan apetyew, atyetyart yanh-areny-rnemew aneyew!’ Alakenh-wenyarlap ran. Akngeyan kel atyetyart aneyel ikwerenh-rnemew, rernemarl rlterrk iterreyel ikwer. Arrantherr nthakenh renh arey-angenh anngel, arrangkw.”
Kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew-anem ra angkew, “Ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh, aneyelarl arrewantherr-itwel aley. Ingwer-ingwer arrantherr alakenh angkerreyenh, ‘Aleyan anewantherr arlertek innga. Jesus anamerl-antey apey-alpemer!’ Ywarn-antey arrantherr arntarnt-arelherl-aneyenh, ayeng apey-alpentyew.
Ayeng apey-alpeyew-alenty, ingwer-rneman irrtywerremel angkeyenh arrewantherr, ‘Jesus-an nhak! Alhey anantherr ikwer-warl!’ Ingwer-rnemarl irrtywerremel angkeyenh arrewantherr, ‘Jesus-an nhenh! Apetyenh-arey arrantherr!’ Iylpareth awelhey-angenh ikwer-rnem.
Ayengarl apey-alpeyenh, ingkerrenhel iterl-areyenh. Ayengan arwapeny aremerreyelpeyenh, awely-awely rtneyel-apeny alkerel. Alakenh-anyem apmer arrpanenh-they ingkerrel ayenh areyenh.
Kel aleyan ayeng aneyel-antey ahern nhenh-itwew. Ingwer-rnemel ayenh atweyenh-tangkwel, pwarrk ilkwa anthemel ikwerew-alenty. Akngerr-anem rlengk aneyel ahern nhenh-itwew rernem arlkarerreyenh atyeng-wety.
Ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh. Ayengarl apey-alpeyenheng-areyan, apal akngerran arnernkey anerl-aneyenh, Akngey iterl-arey-angenh. Rap alakenh aynteyenh awank-akerr-apeny, Noah-arl iteth anenheng-arey. Kwaty ilkwa apetyeyew-alenty, apal akngerran arnernkey anew-anenh, Akngey iterl-arey-angenh.
Rernem ikwer-rnem-wenh-angkwarr anenh; amernant arlkwerrenh, kwaty antywerrenh, itengerrenh apmelerr-angkwarr, Akngey iterl-arey-angenh. Rernem alakenh anenheng-arey-antey, Noah-el rtnwa ilkwa mpwarenh. Akngeyel kwaty ilkwanem thwenew, Noah-an aylpenhew ikwerenh-rnem-akert rtnwewarl kwen. Kwaty atnyerr ilkwa ra ingwer-rnem ilwerl-athenew.
Rap alakenh aynteyenh awank-akerr-apeny. Ingweran Lot-arl iteth anenheng-arey. Ra apmer Sodom-they anterrey-alpeyew-alenty, apal akngerran arnernkey anew-anenh, Akngey iterl-arey-angenh. Rernem ikwer-rnem-wenh-angkwarr anenh; amernant arlkwerrenh, kwaty antywerrenh, ilek-ilek payemelerrenh, ilek-ilek tharlemelerrenh, amern lyapelhelerrenh, warl-rnem arterrenh apmelerr-angkwarr, Akngey iterl-arey-angenh.
Lot rarl apmer Sodom-they anterrew ikwerenh-rnem-akert, Akngeyel thwenew rwa ilkwa lherrm ikwakeng irrwerl-they. Ra Sodom-areny-rnem ingkerrenh ilwerl-athenew.
Yew-yew, ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh. Ayengarl ahern nhenh-warl apey-alpeyenh, apal akngerr ingwer-rneman arnernkey anerl-aneyenh awank-akerr-apeny, Akngey iterl-arey-angenh.
Arlta ikwerel-antey, artwa anyentan rtnerl-aneyenh akethel-antey warl ikwerenh-itwew. Rap anamerl-antey anterremer atyeng-warl, ilek-ilek mwerr-angker ikwerenhew iterrey-angenh, arrangkw. Arlta ikwerel-antey, artwa ingwerel-anem katen angernerl-aneyenh, amern lyapelheleyew. Rap anamerl-antey anterremer atyeng-warl, ilek-ilek mwerr-angker ikwerenhew iterrey-angenh, arrangkw.
Arrantherr iterl-areyel angka weth Lot-akert, wetharl anterrew tawen Sodom-they. Akelty ikwerenhew iterrenh-arey. Akngeyelarl tawen renh arrtyew, akelty rap artepang arew, ‘Ayengan angkep alpeyew, ilek-ilek mwerr-angker inerleweyew.’ Rap anamerl-antey apwert-anem irrew.
Akngerran iterrey-angenh Akngeyew, apwertew ilek-ilekew-then iterrem. Alakenhan apmwel-ayetharl iterreyel. Rernemap ahaperrem arrpemarl, nthakenh Akngey-itwel intem-antey aney-alpey-angenh, arrangkw. Ingwer-rneman iterreyel alakenh apek, ‘Ayeng arraty aneyew Jesus-ew. Ampwal akngerr apek atha atnyenem, arrangkw apek. Mwerrarlap alakenhan.’
Ingwel apek ayeng apey-alpeyenh. Atherr apek aynterl-aneyenh pantyel warl kwen-itwew. Antyerl-rnemelan anyentant inerl-alheyenh, ingweran iwerlelpeyenharl.
Atherr apek anerl-aneyenh, ntang atherl-anemel. Antyerl-rnemelan anyentant inerl-alheyenh, ingweran iwerlelpeyenharl.
[Atherrel apek katen mpwarerl-aneyenh. Antyerl-rnemelan anyentant inerl-alheyenh, ingweran iwerlelpeyenharl.”]
Kwertengerl-rnemel renh ayernew-anem, “Apmer nthenh-itwewarlap ran alakenh aynteyenh?” Jesus-el tyernew, “Arlta ikwerel ingkerrenhel iterl-areyenh. Aker ipma ayntem artnel wethey, irrety-rnem anamerl-antey akarrerrenhey-alhem ikwer. Alakenh-anyem ingkerrenh atyeng-warl akarrerreyenh, ayengarl apey-alpeyenh.”
Jesus angkew kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew, “Akngeyew angkayntenh-arey arlta arrpanenh, ipmelhey-angenh. Angka nhenhew awelhenh-arey.
Tawen anyent-itwew artwa anyent ahelengkw anenh court-ew-artey, artwa irrngerney-wenyarlap ran. Ranap nyerr-wenyarl. Akngey-angkwarr ra awelhey-angenh. Ingwer-rneman ra ilterl-arrernenh.
Tawen irrkaty ikwer-itwew arelh inpert anenh. Ra angkepelarreng alpenh court ikwer-warl, arlkey-alhenh artwa court-ew-artey ikwer, ‘Artwa ilkway! Amperrngerra atyeng! Artwa ahelengkw yanhelan ayenh court-emeleyel, arwa arrangkwew! Renh artwerela! Renharl inngan court-emelemer!’
Ran renh iylpelant awenh arleng-alenty, arelh inpertelanap intemarl renh ayerneynenh. Ingwer-ingwer ra iterrew ament, ‘Ingwer-rnemelan ayenh ileyel ahelengkw. Ayenhan rernem ileyel nyerr-weny, ayengan Akngeyew awelhey-angenh, atharl ingwer-rnem iltem. Inngarl alakenh-anyem.
Arelh inpert ranap apetyeyel angkepelarreng, ayenh alhengkerr anthaynteyew. Artwa renhan atha ilanthem, ipmelheyew renh court-emeley-angenh.’ Alakenh-anyem artwa court-ew-artey ahelengkw iterrenh.”
Jesus-an angkew, “Artwa court-ew-artey ikwer iterrenh-arey!
Arleng-alenty ra arelh inpert iylpelant awenh. Arleng-alenty ra renh alpemeley-angenh, arrangkw. Akngeyanap alakenh-wenyarl! Ran awemarl, ikwerenh-rnemarl ikwer angkem. Rernemap ipantey apek ayern-ayntem, renh-rnem arntarnt-araynteyew.
Ra awemarl, rap renh-rnem iylparetharl alpemelem. Nhenhew iterrenh-arey! Ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh, ingwer-ingweran ayeng apey-alpeyenh. Arlta ikwerel-antey ayengarl apey-alpeyenhelan, atha arey-alpeyenh, irrpetyapantarl atyeng iterrerl-aneyenh.”
Akngerr ingwer-rnem Jesus-ew awelhenh. Rerneman anyentarl-anyentarl apmwel-ayeth iterrenh alakenh, “Ayengant arraty aneyel. Ingwer-rneman apmwel-ayetharl.” Jesus-el iterl-arenh, rernemarl iterrenh, rap angkanem ikwer-rnem ilenh.
“Artwa atherr alhew tyaty ilkwa Jew-rnem-wenh-warl, Akngey-warl-athek angkaynteyew. Artwa ingweran Pharisee-arl, ingweran apwert akarreley-angker kapmentewarl.
Artwa Pharisee-an ament-warl arleng-apenyarl rtnenh. Rap nakelhemel angkew, ‘Akngeyay, ayeng ngkweng inkwerelheyel. Ayengan arratyarl aneyel, ingwer-rnem-apeny-wenyarl. Athan irrtyert-iney-angenhan. Ayengan anyelk-awarr-weny. Arelh artwa ingwer-wenh atha irrtyertel iney-angenh. Ayengan apmwewenyarl, apwert akarreley-angker yanh-apeny-wenyarl.
Monday arrpanenh Thursday arrpanenh atha arlkwey-angenh amern-then aker-then, angkayntey-alkenh ngkweng. Ampwal atyenh-rnem apwert-then atha akalkel-ayntey-alkenh; alyepelarl ngkwengan, Moses-elarl akalty-anthenh-angkwarr.’ Alakenh-anyem artwa Pharisee angkew Akngeyew.
Artwa apwert akarreley-angker ranap nyerrerremel arleng innga rtnenh. Ran ilkelhew, angkeperreyew Akngey-warl-athek. Rap kwenerremel alakenh angkew, ‘Akngeyay, amperrngerra atyeng! Ayengan apmwa innga!’”
Jesus ikwer-rnem angkew, “Artwa apwert akarreley-angker arratyerreynew Akngey-angkwarran, rarl angkew, ‘Ayengan apmwarl!’ Akngeyel renh irrarlkew, apmwangkwarrel alhenh-penh, rap ikwer inkwerelhew. Artwa Pharisee-an arrangkwarl, arratyerrey-angenh Akngey-angkwarr, ra nakelhewarl. Akngeyan ikwer inkwerelhey-angenh, arrangkw. Kel nthakenh nga nakelhey-angenh, mwerr antwelhey-angenh, Akngeyelan ngenh apmwa antwewerr. Nga angkem, ‘Ayengan apmwa!’, Akngeyelan apmwa ngkweng-they irrarlkemarl, mwerr antwemel.”
Akngerr ilkelhew, ampernem akngetyeyew Jesus-warl, raw renh-rnem itepel arnep-arneyew, Akngey ayernemel ikwer-rnem. Kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemel arew, rernemap renh-rnem irrentew.
Jesus-anap athamerrew ampa ikwer-rnem, rap angkew, “Ampernem menty apetyey atyeng-warl, arrngert angkey-angenh ikwer-rnem. Akngey-wenh-rneman ampa nhernem-apenyarl.
Mwanty awelhenh-arey arrantherr! Ampernemelarl ilkwernem awem, rernemap iterrem alakenh, ‘Innga wenh! Irrtywerremel iley-angenh.’ Alakenh-anyem arrantherr angka atyenh awemer. Apmwel-ayeth iterrey-angenh, ayeng irrtywerrerl-anentyew-arrpantey. Arrantherr atyeng awelhenty, arrantherrap intemarl Akngey-itwel aney-alpem.”
Artwa rltwa tyaty Jew-rnem-wenh-areny ra angkew Jesus-ew, “Ngan akalty-anthey-angker mwerrarl. Ila ayenh, nthakenharl ayengan irrem, ayeng aney-alpeyew Akngey-itwel intem-antey?”
Jesus-el tyernew, “Ilekewarl ntwa ayenhan mwerr antweyel? Akngey rant anyent mwerr aneyel.
Angka weth Moses-wenh ntwa iterl-areyel. Ran alakenh aynteyel: ‘Anew ingwerentyak-wenh-itwel ayntey-angenh, ipmew atwey-angenh ingwerentyak, ayntengeny irrtyert-iney-angenh, court-itwew ilerl-aney-angenh ingwerentyak irrtywerremel, awelh-aynta aynewengkw-then amewengkw-then iylpareth.’”
Artwa rltwan angkew, “Akely-they athan angka nhenh-rnem ingkerrenh awew iylparethel. Aleyan atha iylparethel awelheyel-antey.”
Jesus-el renh awew, rap angkew-anem, “Kel mwerr. Angka anyentant-anem ingweran aynteyel, nga awelheyew. Ilek-ilek ngkwenh ntwa tharlemelemer. Ntwa apwert inem-penh, ntwa irrepern-rnem angayakw amern-weny-rnemew antha. Ntwap ayenh apenta iltyantel-anem. Akngeyelan ngenh mwerr-angkwarr arntarnt-areman, ngarl alpemel aney-alpeyew ikwer-itwel.”
Artwa rltwelarl awew alakenh, rap arlka apmwerreyelpew, ran apwert akngerrarl atnyenew ilek-ilek-then.
Jesus-el arew, rarl apmwerreyelpew, rap ingkerrenhew-anem angkew, “Ingwerenty apwert akngerrarl atnyeneyel ilek-ilek-then, rerneman arraty iterrey-angenharl Akngeyew. Rernem alakenh iterrem, ‘Athan atnyenem ilek-ilek-then apwert-then. Akngeyew ayeng iterrey-angenh.’ Irrpetyapelant renh inngan atyetyart antweyenh.
Tangkey ampwal-akert nthakenh aylpey-angenh arriw tyet-angkwarr, arrangkw. Alakenh-anyem rlterrk apwert akngerr-akert-rnemew aynteyel, Akngey-angkwarr alheyewan.”
Akngerrel awew, rarl alakenh angkew. Rernemap apmwel-ayeth iterrenh alakenh: “Apwert akngerrarl ilek-ilek-then atnyeneyel-rnem, Akngeyel ikwer-rnem anthem. Ra renh-rnem anthem alakenh, rarl inkwerelhem ikwer-rnem. Innga ampwal akngerr-akert-rnem Akngey-wenh-rneman.” Apmwel-ayeth alakenh iterremel rernem angkerrenh, “Akngeyel ingwer-rnem ampwal akngerr-akert-rnem iwerlelpem, ilek-apenyarlap ikwerenh-rneman?”
Jesus-el tyernew, “Ntwa amentel nthakenh mpwarey-angenh alakenh, arrangkw. Akngeyelant ngenh iteth atnyenem, ikwer-itwel intem aney-alpeyew.”
Peter angkew ikwer, “Anantherr-alew? Anantherran ngenh apenteyel. Warrk-then warl-then altyernem-then iwerlelpew ingkerrenh.”
Rap angkew ikwer-rnem, “Mwanty awelhenh-arey arrantherr! Ingwerenty apek apmer ikwerenh iwerlelpem, ikwerenh-rnem anteng apmer-itwew, raw Akngeyew warrkerrey-alkenh.
Ingwer-ingwer Akngeyel renh anthem ilek-ilek mwerr-angker. Rap aney-alpem Akngey-itwel intem-antey.”
Jesus-el kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem akarrelew, rap angkew, “Awelhenh-arey arrantherr! Awank-akerr angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnemel angka atyeng-akert ingkwernew, angka Artwa Innga Akngey-wenh ikwer-akert. Ingwer-ingwer aynteyenh, rernem ingkwernew-angkwarr. Arrantherr kel iterl-areyel, anantherrarl alheyel Jerusalem-warl.
Apmer yanh-itwew artwa Jew ilkwernemel ayenh antwerrkeyenh, ayenhap ahayiweyenh artwa ahelengkw-rnemew-anem, artwa Rome-areny ikwer-rnem. Rernemap ayenh kwantheyenh, apelh-then atyeng-warl iweyenh, ayenh atweyenh whip-el artewenty. Ayengap arwerl iylpeyl-atherrel ilweyenh-anem.
Ingwa atherr-penh ayeng angkep itetherrenhey-alpeyenh ipmepenh.”
Kwertengerl-rneman apatemel iterrenh-antey alakenh, “Jesus-an atyetyart anewantherrenh, nthakenh ilwey-angenh, arrangkw.”
Jesus alpenh ikwerenh-rnem-akert tawen Jericho-warl. Apmeran arrer-anem irrew. Iwerr-ampenyel artwa aparrng anenh, rap apwertew ayerneyam-ayntenh.
Rarl awenh, akngerrarl alpenh anper, rap arlkew-anem, “Ay! Nthakenh irreyel arrantherran?”
Rernem renh tyernew ilelhemel, “Anantherran alpeyel Jerusalem-warl Jesus Nazareth-areny-angkwarr.”
Rarl alakenh awew, artwa aparrng rap arlkew, “Jesus-ay! Ngan Atyetyart David-wenh-rnem-they! Amperrngerra atyeng!”
Arrwekelarl alpenh-rnemel renh iltew, “Akeleyterra!” Ran arlkenh-antey ikwer irrkaty-angkwarr, “Jesus-ay! Ngan Atyetyart David-wenh-rnem-they! Amperrngerra atyeng!”
Jesus rtneyelpew, rarl renh awewel. Rap ilanthew, “Akwethey atnwenheyew renh, akngetyeyew atyeng-warl.” Rernem renh akngetyew Jesus-warl. Ra renh ayernew,
“Ilekay? Nthakenh ilem atha ngenh?” Ran tyernew, “Atyetyart, ayengan ilkelheyel, atha areyew.”
Jesus-an angkew ikwer, “Annga altywerela! Aranem ntwa! Ntwa iterl-arew, atha ngenh mwerreley-angker, ntwap mwerr-anem areyel aleyan.”
Inngarlap ran arew anngel aleyant anaynt. Rap Jesus apenteynenh, alpenh Akngey nakemel. Ingkerrenhel renh arew aparrng-weny-anem, rernemap inkwerelhemel Akngey nakeynenh.
Jesus ikwerenh-rnem-akert alhew Jerusalem-warl, tawen akely-angkwarr Jericho-angkwarr rwaylpenhew.
Tawen ikwer-itwew artwa apwert akarreley-angker anenh itnan Zacchaeus. Ran atyetyart anenh artwa ingwer-rnem kapmentew apwertarl akarrelenh-rnemew. Apwert akngerr-akertarlap ran.
Ranap artwa akarteng akelyarl, rap ywarn-antey arrkernelhenh, Jesus areyew. Akngerr akarrerrenh arrer innga, Jesus arenh. Rerneman ilpenh ikwer-wety.
Zacchaeus iterrew, ra anterreyew arrwekel iwerr irrkaty-angkwarr. Rap nganew arwerl-warl, ra areyew-awaty Jesus arrwekel-they, ran anper-alhenty.
Jesus arwerl-warl apetyew, rap itnywenew Zacchaeus, “Zacchaeus-ay! Anamerl atwarrenhey-alha! Rlengkan ayeng alheyew apmer ngkwenh-warl, aney-alheyenh ngkweng-itwel.”
Rap anamerl-antey atwarrenhey-alpew, Jesus-anem ikwerenh-rnem-akert atnwenhew apmer ikwerenh-warl.
Akngerrel intwarew, Jesus-arl alhew apmer Zacchaeus-wenh-warl. Rernemap angkerrew, “Pwertay! Nhak Jesus alhew artwa apmwewenh apmer-warl, aney-alheyew ikwer-itwel!”
Ikwer-penh, rernemarl anemel arlkwenheng-arey, rtnerl-alhew-anem Zacchaeus angkemelan, “Ingkartay! Atha apwert ilek-ilek-then akalkeleyew. Apwert ingweran antheyew irrepern-rnemew amern-weny-rnemew, ingweran atyengarl ayntem. Ayengan apwert akarreley-angker kapmentew. Atha inenh irrtyertel arrpemarl ingwer-rnem-they. Athan apwert ilkwewant ayernenh, athap akert-they atyeng inenh. Atha angkep antheynem ingwerentyan alakenh: 100 tala atha inenh ingwer-they, athap antheynem 400 arrpemarl, mwerrant-atherr aneyew ikwer-penhan. Alakenh atha ingkerr-warl angkep antheynem. Athap angkep antheyneyew-anem akngerr-rnemew rlengkan.”
Jesus angkew ikwer, “Akngeyelan apmwa ngkweng-wety irrarlkem, ngkwenh-rnem-wety-then. Ngan Abraham-wenh-antey, alakenh-anyem anantherr-apeny. Ngan iterreyel Akngeyew, Abraham-arl iterrenh-apeny.
Akngerr apmwel-ayeth aneyel, aperrerterremel. Ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh, ayengap apetyew, nthweyew ikwer-rnem. Ayengap apetyew, apmwernem irrarlkeyew.”
Tawen Jericho Jerusalem arrerenty. Akngerr-anem anenh apmer ikwer-itwew, awelherrenh Jesus-ew. Rernem iterrenh apmwel-ayeth alakenh-anyem, “Jesus alpenty tawen Jerusalem-warl, Akngeyan aremerrem-anem. Rap Jesus atyetyart ilkwanem arrerneyenh ingkerrew.”
Jesus-el iterl-arenh, rernem iterrenh alakenh, rap angkanem ilew ikwer-rnem. “Apmer anyent-itwew artwa ilkwa anenh. Ingwer-ingweran atyetyart ilkwa apmer arleng-areny ra ikwer yangkelhew, alheyew ikwer-warl. Ra ilkelhew, renh atyetyart arrerneyew apmer ikwerenhew.
Ra anperl-alheyew-athath, ra arlkew warrkenh-rnem 10 ikwerenh-rnemew, apetyeyew ikwer-warl. Rap renh-rnem antheynew 1,000 tala amentew-ament, rap angkew, ‘Ayengarl alhem-wety apmer nhenh-they, arrantherrap payemel-ayntenh-arey ilek-ilek 1,000 tala nhenh-rnemel. Inayntenh-arey tharlemelemel ilek-ilek. Alakenh-angkwarr apwert atyenh akngerrelem, ayeng apey-alpeyew-atety.’ Rarl angkew-penh, rap anperl-alhew arleng-anem.
Akngerr apmer ikwer-areny-rnem ikwer-wety arlkarerrenh. Rernemap angka ingkern-they thwenew atyetyart ilkwewarl: ‘Nthakenh ntwa arrerney-angenh artwa ilkwa weth atyetyart anewantherr. Anantherran arlkarerreyel ikwer-wety.’
Atyetyart ilkwa awelhey-angenh ikwer-rnem. Ran arrernew artwa ilkwa weth renh, atyetyart ikwerenh-rnemew aneyew apmer ikwer-itwew. Rap apey-alpew-anem apmer ikwerenh-warl. Rarl apey-alpew, rap artwa warrkenh anyent thwenew, warrkenh weth-rnem 10 ingweyew. Rap renh-rnem ayernew, ‘Apwert atyenh arrantherr akngerrelew?’
Warrkenh anyent angkew, ‘Atyetyartay, ntwa 1,000 tala ayenh anthew. Nhenh atha atnyeneyel-antey. Athap aleyan atnyeneyel 10,000-anem.’
Artwa ilkwa angkew, ‘Ngan artewentyel warrkerrew, atha ngenh ilanthew-angkwarr. Ntwa apwert akely-akely mwerrarl atyeng akngerrelew. Atha ngenh atyetyart arrernem tawen 10 ikwer-rnem.’
Warrkenh ingwer-anem angkew, ‘Atyetyartay, ntwa 1,000 tala ayenh anthew. Nhenh atha atnyeneyel-antey. Athap aleyan atnyeneyel 5,000-anem.’
Artwa ilkwa ra angkew, ‘Mwerr-angkeray! Atha ngenh atyetyart arrernem tawen 5 ikwer-rnem.’
Warrkenh ingwer-anem angkew, ‘Atyetyartay, ntwa 1,000 tala ayenh anthew. Atha rag-el ataperrelew, irrtyert-akwernew.
Artwa arlertekarl ngan! Ntwa pwerep-anthem ingwer-rnem, warrkerr-aynteyew ngkweng, ngenh-then anthaynteyew. Ayengan ngkweng-wety atererreyel. Apwert ngkwenh atha aytnelhelewerr, ywerrewerr-anem. Ntwa ayenh ayernewerr, angkep anthenhey-alpeyew.’
Artwa ilkwa ikwer ahelerrew. ‘Ngan artwa warrkenh apmwarl! Arraty nga angkeyel: atha pwerep-anthem ingwer-rnem, warrkerr-aynteyew atyeng, ayenh-then anthaynteyew.
Alakenh-wetyap ntwa anthemer apwertan atyenh artwa bank-arenyew. Rarl apwert inenty, rap apwert akely ngkwenh-warl pweytelem, angkep anthenhey-alpeyew-athath. Ntwanap apwert atyenh rag-el ataperrelew!’
Rap angkew ingwer-rnemew, arrerarl rtnenherrenh-rnemew, ‘Apwert rakenh-arey artwa apmwa yanh-they, anthemel artwa warrkenh arrwekelenyew 10,000 talakertew.’
Rernem angkew, ‘Atyetyartay, kelarl ran atnyeneyel 10,000! Ingwerew anthemer!’
Ra tyernew, ‘Ingwerentyan apek mwerr atyeng warrkerrem, athap anthem ilek-ilek akngerr ikwer. Ingwerel apek warrk ipmerl-alhem. Kel athap rakem ikwer-they, ingwer-anem anthemel. Ran arrangkw-anem aneyelpeyenh.’
Rap angkew, ‘Ingwer ileng-rnem-alew atyeng-wety arlkarerreyel-rnem? Arrantherr renh-rnem iterl-areyelarl. Rernem artwa atyetyart ilkwa ilew, ayenh arrernewerr atyetyart apmer nhenhew. Ingwer-rnem atyeng-wety ilkelhey-angenh irreyel-rnem, atyetyart arrernewerr, renh-rnem anamerl akngetyenh-arey nhewarl. Atha areyew, arrantherr renh-rnem ipmew atwenty.’”
Ikwer-penh Jesus-arl alakenh angkenh-penh, ra tawen Jerusalem-warl-anem anperl-alhew. Arrwekelarl ran alpenh, ingwer-rnemelan apenteynenh.
Rap arrer-anem alpenh tawen atherr-warl, Bethphage-then Bethany-then. Apmer ratherr apwert impalth-itwew, apwert itnan Alip-itwew. Ra kwertengerl atherr ilew,
“Alhenh-atherr apmer angath-ampeny-warl. Mpwelanthap tangkey akely-anem arey-alhem, rwepelarl arertnew. Akelyarlap ran. Ingwerenty ikwer-warl nganey-angenh-antey, arrangkw. Rwep lhelemel akngey-alpenh-atherr atyeng-warl.
Ingwerentyel ayernenty, ‘Ilekewarl mpwelanth rwep lheleyel, tangkey irrtyert-akngeyew?’, alakenh ilenh-atherr, ‘Ingkartel akngeyew-tangkwel.’”
Ratherrap apmer ikwer-warl alhew, tangkey-anem arey-alhew, Jesus-elarl ilew-angkwarr-antey.
Ratherr rwep lhelenh, tangkeyew-artey-rnemel ayernew, “Ilekewarl mpwelanth rwep lheleyel, tangkey irrtyert-akngeyew?”
Ratherr tyernew, “Ingkartel akngeyew-tangkwel.”
Ratherrap tangkey atnwenheynew Jesus-warl, arnkwanem arrernew tangkey artep-warl. Jesus nganerl-alhew, alpenh-anem tangkey-akert.
Akngerrel renh arnarew, tangkey-akertel alpenh, rernemap arnkwernem arrerneynenh iwerr-warl arrwekel, Jew-rnem-wenh-angkwarr. Rap irrwerleng arnkwernemel-arleng alpenh tangkey-akert.
Apwert Alip-they Jesus-el arew, Jerusalem arrer-anem. Rarl atwarreynenh kwenel-athek tangkey-akert, akngerrelan renh apenteynenh. Rernem kel-antey arew, Jesus-elarl arntety-rnem akngerr mwerrelenh apmer arrpanenh-itwew. Rernemap inkwerelhemel arlkalhelerrenh alakenh:
“Akngey nakey, rarl thwenew artwa nhenh anewantherr arawerrng ikwerenh-akertel! Renh mwerr antwem, rarl anenhantherrenh arntarnt-areyel! Irrwerl-areny-rnemel renh nakemer arrpemarl, rernemarl aley mwerrant-arey-anem aneyel!”
Artwa Pharisee-rnem rtnenherrenh arrpemarl ikwer-rnemel-arleng, rernemap angkew Jesus-ew, “Atyetyartay, ilta ngkwenh-rnem akeleytelemel! Nthakenh rernem ngenh alakenh nakey-angenh!”
Ra tyernew, “Rernemarl akeleyt anenty, apwert nhernem iwerrelarl aynteyel-rnem arlkewerr arrpemarl. Rernemarl katy Akngey nakewerr!”
Jesus arrer-anem alpenh tawen Jerusalem-warl. Rarl arew apmer renh, rap artnenh-anem apmer ikwer-areny-rnemew.
Rap angkew, “Ayengan amperrngerreyel ikwer-rnem! Rernem apal aneyel, angka Akngey-wenh iterl-arey-angenh. Ayengan ilkelhew, angkep rernem pweyterrenhey-alpeyew Akngey-warl-athek anyenterremel. Rernemanap ayenh iylpelantarl awenh.
Irrepern-rnem rerneman! Alethang ahelengkw-rnem akngerr akarrerreyenh apmer nhenh-warl Jerusalem-warl, renh-rnem atweyew ingkerrenh. Rernemap ampereleyenh, iwerr-anem ikwer-rnem-wety arrngeleyenh.
Ipmew-antey renh-rnem atweyenh ampernem-then. Alethang-rnemelap ingkerrenh-antey apmer nhenh-itwew ywerrelheleyenh, warl-rnem atep-atakeyenh. Apmeran peleyn-apeny-anem aynteyenh. Akngeyel ayenh thwenew, renh-rnem arntarnt-areyew. Rernemanap atyeng awelhey-angenh, arrangkw.” Alakenh-anyem Jesus-el amperrngerremel ilew Jerusalem-areny-rnem-akert.
Ikwer-penh Jesus aylpenhew tyaty ilkwewarl Jew-rnem-wenh-warl Jerusalem-itwew. Warl ilkwa ikwer-itwew ra arew, akngerrelarl ilek-ilek tharlemelenh apwertew. Rap renh-rnem ahelerremel irrentew aketh-warl.
Rap renh-rnem iltew alakenh: “Nthakenh arrantherr aker tharlemeley-angenh nhenh-itwew. Ingwerentyam arrewantherr irrtyert-awarr, warl ingwerenty-wenh-itwewarl irrtyert-inenh. Nthakenh irrtyert-aylpey-angenh nhenh-itwew, iltyemwerneyelarl antwerrkey-angenh, arrangkw. Warl nhenhan Akngey-wenh. Angka ikwerenh alakenh aynteyel: ‘Warl ilkwa nhenhan atyenharl, ingwer-rnem arleng-they apety-aynteyew, ayenh nakemel ikwer-warl aylpaynteyew.’”
Renh-rnem irrentew-penh, Jesus-an aylpenhenh tyaty ilkwewarl arlta arrpanenh, rap akngerr-anem akalty-anthenh ikwer-itwew. Artwa rltwernem Jew-rnem-wenh tyaty ilkwareny-rnem, artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnem, artwamp-rnem-then rernem renh mwantyel-antey arntarnt-arenh. Rernem renh ipmew-antey atweyew.
Akngerr ingwer-rneman inkwerelhemel akarrerrenh ikwer-warl, ikwer awelheyew. Artwa ilkwernemel renh menty-antey amek-arew akngerr-itwew. Rernem arrkernelhenh, renh antwerrkeyew-arrpantey.
Arlta ingwerel Jesus aylpenhew tyaty ilkwewarl Jew-rnem-wenh-warl, rap angka mwerr-angker ilenh akngerrew. Artwa rltwernem Jew-rnem-wenh tyaty ilkwareny-rnem, artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnem, artwamp-rnem-then rernem renh ayernew,
“Angwenhel ngenh thwenew, tyaty ilkwitwew akalty-antheyew? Atyetyart nthenh-apenyel ngenh thwenew, ingwer-rnem tharlemeley-angker-rnem tyaty ilkwethey irrent-aynteyew?”
Ra ikwer-rnem angkew, “Alerlay! Athetangkwel arrenhantherrenh ayerneyew.
John Baptise-emeley-angkerel akngerr kwaty-warl baptise-emelenh. Atyetyart nthenh-apenyel John thwenew? Akngeyel apek? Artwa ingwerel apek? Ayenh ilenherr-arey!”
Rernem arreyterrenh alakenh: “Nthakenh anantherr angkem? Nthakenh anantherr iley-angenh, ‘Akngeyel wenh John thwenew.’ Ra anenhantherrenh ayernewerr, ‘Kel ilek-wety arrantherr ikwer awelhey-angenh?’
Nthakenh anantherr iley-angenh, ‘Artwa ingwerel renh thwenew.’ Ingwer-rnemel awewerr apmer nhenh-areny-rnemel, atwewerr-anem anenhantherrenh apwertel ipmew-antey. Rernem iterreyel, John Akngey-wenh angkakertarl anenh.”
Rernemap tyernew alakenh: “Anantherr iterl-arey-angenh, angwenhelarl John thwenew.”
Jesus ikwer-rnem angkew, “Arrantherr tyerney-angenh. Kel atha arrenhantherrenh iley-angenh, angwenhelarl ayenh thwenew, alakenh irreyew.”
Jesus-el angka ingwer-anem ilenh. “Artwa ilkwel katen atnyenenh. Ra ilkelhew, amern grapes lyapelheleyew. Antywer-tangkwel ra akethelew, rap rnkerneynew arwerl grapes akely-akely-rnem-anem. Rap artwa ingwer-rnem arrernew, arwerl-rnem arntarnt-araynteyew, rarl aney-alpew-wety apmer ingwer-itwew intem-antey.
Arwerl-rnem ilkwerrew, amern ampeng-akert-anem. Artwa ilkwa rap warrkenh ikwerenh thwenew katen ikwer-warl. Rap ilanthew, ‘Katen ikwer-warl alha, grapes atyeng akngey-alpa.’ Artwa katen arntarnt-aremel-rnem renh arnarew. Rernemap antwerrkemel atwey-ayntew, renh irrentemel arrangkw-antey. Rap artwa ikwerew-artey iley-alpew.
Artwa ilkwel warrkenh ingwer-anem thwenew. Rernemap antwerrkemel atwey-ayntew, irrentemel renh arrangkw-antey arrpemarl. Warrkenh ra artwa ikwerew-artey iley-alpew.
Artwa ilkwa ra warrkenh ingwer-anem thwenew. Rernemap renh atwey-ayntew arrpemarl, parrik-angkwarr iwemel aketh-warl. Rap akwenterl-alhew, alpew-anem artwa ikwerew-artey iley-alpeyew.
Artwa ilkwa ra iterrew, ‘Nthakenh irrem ayeng? Alerey atyenh-anem atha thweney. Rernem mentyarl renh arey-ayntem, ran alerey atyenharl, ayengarl ikwer artewenty ilkelhem.’
Artwa katen arntarnt-aremel-rnem artwa alerikw renhan alhengk-aremel arnarew. ‘Nhak arenh-arey! Alerikw ikwerenh-anemarl apetyeyel! Aynikw ikwerenh ahaperrenty, rant-anem katenew-artey aneyenh. Atwey renh anantherr ipmew-antey, katen anewantherrenharl aynteyenh.’
Rernemap renh atwey-ayntew, ipmanem iwemel parrik-angkwarr.” Jesus-an angkew akngerrew awelhenh-rnemew, “Nthakenh irrem artwa ilkwa raw?
Rap alakenh apek irrem. Ra alhem katen ikwer-warl, atwem-anem artwa renh-rnem ingkerr ipmew-antey. Rap artwa ingwer-rnem-anem arrernem, katen arntarnt-araynteyew.” Artwa ilkwernemelarl Jesus awew apateyelpemel. Rernemap angkew, “Alakenh angkey-angenh!” Angka rernem awew-penh, artwa ilkwernem-then ingwer-rnem-then angkew Jesus-ew, “Artwa katenew-artey nthakenh ingwer-rnem atwey-angenh. Ran amperrngerremer ikwer-rnem, atwey-angenh menty.”
Jesus-el renh-rnem aremel angkanem ilew, artwa ilkwernemel aweyew. “Alakenhan aynteyel. Awelhenh-arey arrantherr! ‘Artwernem iterrew, lywenty mpwareyew. Irrkernem-anem angernew, arwerl-rnem 4-anem rnkernew. Arwerl arlpenty rlterrk atherr-anem arrernew ltweper. Rernemap arew arrpemarl, arwerl ingwer angkeparl iweynew apmwarrpantey. Arwerl ranap impen inngarl, nthakenh iwey-angenh, lywenty rlterrk antwerrkey-angker.’”
Jesus angkew arrpemarl ikwer-rnem, “Ingwerentyel angka atyenh awey-angenh, Akngeyelan renh court-emeleyenh. Thwenem renh rwa ilkwewarl, aletharl ampeyel-warl.”
Artwa rltwernem Jew-rnem-wenh tyaty ilkwareny-rnem artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnem-then rernem angka awew, Jesus-elarl ilenh. Rernemap ahelerremel iterrenh, “Angka weth artwa katen arntarnt-arenh-rnem-akert ran anenhantherrenh-apenyarl ileyel. Jesus-el apmwa antweyel anenhantherrenh artwa renh-rnem-apeny. Antwerrkey anantherr renh!” Akngerrarl anenh-wety, rernem ywarn iterrew, renh antwerrkeyew.
Rernemap mpwelhenh, renh arrkernemel antwerrkeyew. Rernem iterrenh alakenh, “Anantherr renh antwerrkem, renhap artwa kapment-areny ikwer-warl atnwenheyew, renh court-emeleyew. Rap artwa ahelengkw-rnem ilanthem, renh ipmew atweyew.” Ikwer-penhan atyetyart ilkwernem Jew-rnem-wenh rernem warrkenh-rnem thwenew Jesus-warl. Rernemarl alpenhel, rernem alakenh iterreynenh, “Anantherr angka ikwerenh awem-penh, ilemel court-angkwarr, Jesus rernem ipmew atweyew.”
Jesus rernem alakenh irrtyertel ayernew, “Atyetyartay, nga arraty-angkwarr angkeyel ingkerrew. Ntwan akalty-antheyel Akngey-wenh-angkwarran arratyan. Alhewerarl irrkaty-angkwarr ntwa ileyel ingkerrew, artwa ilkwetyilkw-then ingwer-rnem-then.
Ila anenhantherrenh, nthakenh nga iterreyel? Jew-rnem anantherran apwert anthemang atyetyart ilkwa Rome-areny ikwer, rarl anenhantherrenh ilantheyel-angkwarr? Arrangkw apek?”
Jesus-el iterl-arew, rernem irrtyertelarl ayernenh, rap iterrenh, “Yanh-rnemel ayenh ayerneyel irrtywerremel. Rernem ayenh aweyew, apmwel-ayeth angkentyew. Rernem iterreyel, angka atyenh apmwarl, pip kapment-wenh apentey-angenh. Rernem iterrem, ayengarl alakenh angkem, ‘Kapmentew apwert anthey-angenh. Arrantherr apwert Akngeyewant arrernem.’” Alakenharl iterrenh-penh, rap angkew ikwer-rnem,
“Apwert anyent atyeng akngetyenh-arey, atha areyew.” Rernemap akngetyew, anthew-anem. “Arrantherr ayenh ilenh-arey, inngerr angwenh-wenh? Itna ilek?”
Rernem tyernew, “Atyetyart ilkwa Rome-areny.” “Kelap. Ingkerr ilek-ilek atyetyart Rome-areny-wenh arrantherr ikwerarl anthemer. Ingkerr ilek-ilek Akngey-wenhan arrantherr ikwer anthemer.”
Angka awew-penh, warrkenh-rnem angkerrew, “Nhenhan arraty angkeyel. Ran anenhantherrenh ilemer, apwert kapmentew anthewerr. Ranap alakenh angkey-angenh. Nthakenharlap anantherr ileyenh court-angkwarr renh?” Rernemap akeleyt-anem rtnenherrenh, angkerrey-angenh.
Ikwer-penh artwa ilkwa ingwer-rnem apetyew Jesus-warl, renh ayerneyew, itnan Sadducee-rnem. Rernem apmwel-ayeth iterrenh alakenh: “Ingwerenty nthakenh ipmepenh itetherrey-angenh. Ipma intemarl ayntem.”
Rernem angkew ikwer, “Atyetyartay, awank-akerr Moses-el angka rlterrk nhenh ingkwernenh anewantherr: ‘Iteng anem ampeweny apek. Artwa ra ahaperrenty, ayteyikw ikwerenhel-anem amarl inpert inem, ampa aneyew. Ratherr iterremer alakenh, “Ampa nhenh awayikw-wenh-apeny.” ’
Awelha angka nhenhew. Awayenheng-rnem 7 anenh. Artwa arrwekeleny-tangkwel itengerrew, rap ahaperrenhew, ampa ikwer-atherr aney-angenh-antey. Arelh ikwerenh inpert-anemarl.
Ayteyikwel-anem arelh renh inew, rap ahaperrenhew, ampa ikwer-atherr aney-angenh-antey.
Ayteyikw ingwerel-anem arelh renh inew, rap ahaperrenhew arrpemarl, ampa ikwer-atherr aney-angenh-antey. Ikwerel-antey awayenheng-rnemel arelh anyent renh ineynenh. Anyentarl-anyentarlap rernem ahaperreynew ampeweny-antey.
Arelh inpert rant-anem iteth anenh intem. Ingwer-ingweran ranem ahaperrew.
Kel anantherr ngenh ayerneyew angka nhenhew. Akngerran iterrem, anantherr itetherrem ipmethey. Kel ingwer-ingwer ingkerrenh angkep itetherrenty ipmepenh, nthek-apenyarlap mpwernikw inngan ikwerenh aneyenh? Artwernem 7-ew ra inperterrew.”
Jesus angkew artwa Sadducee ikwer-rnem, “Aleyan ahern nhenh-itwew apmelerrel-ayeth artwethen arelh-then itengerrem.
Ingwer-ingwer Akngey-wenh-rnem ahaperreyenh, ipmepenhanap rernem itetherrem angkep arrpemarl. Rernemap antyerl-apeny-anem aney-alpeyenh, nthakenh itengerrey-angenh, arrangkw-anem. Nthakenh ahaperrey-angenh arrpemarl. Akngey-wenh ampernem-anem rerneman aneyenh, ikwerel-arleng intem-antey aney-alpeyenh.
<range>
Inngarl aynteyel, akngerran angkep itetherreyenh ipmethey, alpeyenh aney-alpeyenh Akngey-itwel. Arrantherr angka Akngey-wenh iterl-areyel. Arrantherrap iterl-aremer angka weth Moses-akert, rarl arew, rwarl ampenh arwerl-itwew. Reytemarl ilem-penh arrantherr mwanty iterl-aremer. Akngeyan angkew Moses-ew alakenh, ‘Ayengan Abraham-ew-artey aneyel, Isaac-ew-artey, Jacob-ew-artey.’
Rernemanap iteth-anteyarl aneyel! Akngey atyetyart aney-angenh ipmernemewan. Ran atyetyart aneyel iteth-rnemewant. Ikwerenh-angkwarran anantherr ingkerrenh iteth intemarl anem ipmepenh.”
Artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnem rernem awelhenh-antey. Rernemap angkew, “Arraty-angkwarr nga angkeyel!”
Ikwer-penh-antey artwa ilkwernem ater-anemarl irrenh, renh ayernewerr.
Jesus angkew ikwer-rnem, “Artwa Christ-alew? Akngeyel ilew, renharl ahern nhenh-warl thweneyew. Akngerran apmwel-ayethan angkem alakenh, ‘Artwa Christ ran atyetyart ahern nhareny-rnemewant, Atyetyart David-apeny. Christ ranap David-wenh-antey.’ Ilekewarl rerneman apmwel-ayeth alakenharl angkeyel? Rernem iterl-aremer, Christ ranap Akngey-areny. Ran David-angkwarr ilkwarl.
Awank-akerr David-el aylelhenty nhenh ingkwernew pip Psalms-ewan: ‘Akngey angkew atyetyart atyenh-warl Christ-warl: “Ngan ana arrerenty atyengel-arleng arraty-angkwarrarl.
Ingwer-rnem ngkweng-wety artewenty arlkarerreyel-rnem atha atweyenh, renh-rnem ngkweng-wety irrentemel.” ’
Atyetyart David-el artwa Christ itnewew ‘Atyetyart atyenh’. Christ ranap ilkwarl Atyetyart David-angkwarr. Ranap Akngey-areny.”
Akngerran anenh apmer ikwer-itwew, awelherrenh Jesus-ew. Rap angkew kwertengerl 12 ikwerenh-rnemew,
“Mwanty anenherr-arey arrantherr! Artwa yanh-rnem iwarrerney-angenh, rerneman angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker. Irrtywalth rernem. Rernem aylpem arnkwa mwerr-angker arlpentyel, ingwer-rnemel renh-rnem nakemel araynteyew-awaty. Rerneman inkwerelhem, ingwer-rnemarl ikwer-rnem kwenerrey-alhem, atyetyart ilkwa antwemel. Rernem aylpenty tyaty Jew-rnem-wenh-warl, arrwekel-antey aney-alhem, ingwer-rnemel renh-rnem araynteyew-awaty. Akngerrarl akarrerremeng-arey, amern inkwerelhemel kwenty arlkweyew, rernem arrwekel-antey aney-alhem, ingwer-rnemel renh-rnem araynteyew-awaty.
Rernem arelh inpert-rnemew apmwel-ayeth mpwarem, ilek-ilek rakemel warl ikwer-rnem-wenh-they. Rernem irrtywerremel angkeyel Akngey-warl-athek arleng-alenty. Akngeyelarl ingkerrenh court-emeleyenh, rap renh-rnem irrwampenh-antheyenh, irrtywalth renh-rnem. Ingwer-rneman ra alyepel irrwampenh-antheyenh.”
Jesus anenh-antey tyaty ilkwa Jew-rnem-wenh-itwew, arrerenty ampwal apwertew-arelh ikwer-itwew. Ra arenh, apwert akngerr-akert-rnemel apwert arrernenh Akngeyew ampwal ikwer-warl.
Akelty inpert apetyew, ngkwelty akely atherrant arrernew. Rarl arrernew-penh, apwert-weny-anem ra aneyelpew.
Jesus-el arew, rap arlkew kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew, apetyeyew ikwer-warl. “Awelhenh-arey atyeng! Akngeyan inkwerelhem innga arelh nhenhew, apwertarl impen-antey ikwerenh ingkerr arrernew. Akngey ingwer-rnemew inkwerelhey-angenh. Apwert akngerr-antey rernem atnyeneyel. Ya, Akngeyan inkwerelheyel innga arelh nhenhew.”
<range>
Ikwer-penh rernem tyerrelhew tyaty ilkwethey aketh-warl. Kwertengerl-rnem angkew, “Tyaty ilkwa nhanyem mwanty-antey artew apwert alyelk mwerr-angker-akert. Ilek-ilek mwerr-angker-then kwen, akngerrelarl Akngeyew arrernew.”
Jesus-el awew, rap angkew, “Arrantherran areyel tyaty ilkwa nhenh. Ingwer-ingweran apwert nhenh-rnem rtney-angenh-anem irreyenh. Alethang-rnemelan apwert-rnem atep-atakeyenh, arlperrty iwemel.”
Rernem angkew, “Atyetyartay, ilengerarl tyatyan inngan atep-atakeyenh? Nthakenh-tangkwel irreyenh, alakenh irreyew-alenty? Anantherr iterl-areyew.”
Jesus angkew, “Mwanty anenherr-arey, ingwerentyakel arrenhantherrenh irrtywerl-ampernewerr. Ingwerenty angkewerr, ‘Ayeng nhanyem, Akngeyarl angkew, ra thwenem ahern nhenh-warl!’ Ingweran angkewerr, ‘Arlta arrer-anemerreyel! Jesus apey-alpeyenh-anem!’ Arrantherrarl awem, rernemarl alakenh angkem, awelhey-angenh arrantherr ikwer-rnem.
Arrantherr awem, angkarl arlpimperrem, apmer arrpanenh-itwew atwerreyel, atererremel aney-angenh. Arrantherr alakenh iterremer, ‘Ahern-then alker-then rlengk-antey ywerreyelpey-angenh. Ingwer-ingwerant apek ywerreyelpeyenh.’”
Rap angkew arrpemarl ikwer-rnem, “Ya innga! Ahern-then alker-then ywerreyelpeyew-alenty, akngerran atwerreyenh apmer arrpanenhel arlperrty. Akngerr apmer ingwer-they alheyenh, atwerr-aynteyew apmer ingwer-itwew.
Ahernan arrewemel iltewelheyenh apmer arrpanenh-itwew. Akngerran aneyenh amern-weny angayakw, ywarn iterremel apatemel anerl-aneyenh apmer arrpanenh-itwew. Ingwer-rneman arntety ilkwel atwerl-aneyenh apmer arrpanenh-itwew. Akngerrel ilek-ilek arerl-aneyenh alker-itwew, atererremelap anerl-aneyenh.
Alakenh aynteyew-alenty apmwa, Akngey apentey-angenh-rnemelan arrenhantherrenh irrwernerl-aneyenh. Rerneman arrenhantherrenh antwerrkeyenh, court-emel-aynteyew tyaty Jew-rnem-wenh-itwew. Rernemap arrenhantherrenh tyayl-warl akwerneyenh, rnkernemel arrwekel rtnaynteyew artwa ilkwernem-itwew. Apmer arrpanenh-itwew rernem alakenh mpwarayntem, arrantherrarl ayenh apenteyel.
Rernem arrewantherr alakenh mpwarem, arrantherran angka atyeng-akert ilemer alhewer, atererrey-angenhel.
Iterrey-angenh alakenh, ‘Nthakenh ayeng angkem ikwer-rnem?’
Athan arrenhantherrenh akalty-anthem, arrantherr angkeyew arraty-angkwarr Akngey apentey-angenh ikwer-rnem. Rernemap ywarn iterrem, ‘Nthakenh anantherr renh-rnem ayntarrp-ilem?’
Tywekererreyenh arrewantherrety ingwer-rneman, ayenharl arrantherr apenteyel-rnem-wety. Arrewantherrenh-rnem-then arrewantherr ahelerreyenh, akwetyemel ayernerl-aneyenh court-emelemel. Ingwerentyaman arrewantherr ipmewarl atweyenh.
<range>
Akngeyelanap arrenhantherrenh arntarnt-arayntemarl intem-antey, iteth atnyen-ayntemel.
Arrantherr ikwer rlterrk anentyan, angkeperrey-angenh, arrantherrap aney-alpem intemarl ikwer-itwel.”
Jesus angkew kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnemew, “Ingwer-ingweran arrantherr areyenh artwa ahawarr-rnem, alperrel-apeny ampereleyenh apmer nhenh Jerusalem. Arlta ikwerelap arrantherr iylpangkeyenh, ‘Ya, apetyew-anem rernem nhanyem, anenhantherrenh ingkerr atweyew ipmew, warl-then atep-atakemel.’
Arrantherr Judea-areny-rnem irrtyert-anterremer, apwert irrwerlel aney-alheyew. Arrantherran tawen-areny-rnem irrtyert-anterremer arrpemarl. Arrantherr arlengarl anew-aneyel-rnem, angkep alpey-angenh Jerusalem-warl.
Awank-akerr angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnemel ilew, Akngeyelarl irrwampenh-antheyenh Jerusalem-areny-rnem. Arlta ikwerel inngarl aynteyenh, rernemarl ingkwernew-angkwarr.
Rlterrkarlap aynteyenh arelh arntety-rnemewan, ampangketyarr-rnemew-then. Nthakenh anterrey-angenh, irrepern-rnem! Ya, Akngeyelan irrwampenh-antheyenh ingkerrenhew Israel-wenh-rnem.
Artwa ahawarr-rnemel akngerr atweyenh Jerusalem-areny nayp arlpentyel. Ingwer-rnem rernem arertnentyan akngeyneyenh apmer ingwer-rnem-warl. Arlengew-alenty alethang-rnem aneyenh atyetyart tawen Jerusalem-ew ikwer-itwew. Ingwer-ingwerantap Akngeyelan renh-rnem irrenteyenh.”
Jesus-el akalty-anthenh-antey kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem. “Ikwerel-antey ingkeny, alkent, antyarr-then ingwer-lkwererreyenh, akngelherreyenh arrewemel. Akngerran iterreyenh, ‘Nthakenh-anem irreyel ahern nhenhan?’ Rernemap aytnerl-aneyenh aterel. Kwaty alayan akngelheyenh, arwerlk angkeyenh artewenty innga. Akngerrelap aweyenh, rernemap aterenyengel irreyenh, apatemel ywarn iterremel.
<range>
Ikwerel-antey ayenhap arnareyenh, Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh. Ayengap kwenpay-angkwarr aremerreyenh, amparrkeyenh arawerrng rlterrk-akertarl.
Kwertengerl atyenh-rnem arrantherr arem apmwa ayntenty, atererrey-angenh. Arrantherr inkwerelhemer, ayengap arwapeny apetyem-anem, arrenhantherrenh mwanty arntarnt-areyew, inerleweyew.”
Jesus-el angka ingwer-anem ilenh ikwer-rnem. “Arwerl ampweth-ampwethew iterrenh-arey.
Alpeytan lyapenhey-alpem, arrantherr iterrem, ‘Ya, aherrety-anem irrenhey-alpeyenh.’
Alakenh-anyeman arrantherr iterreyenh, arrantherrarl arenty, ahern-then alker-then ingwer-lkwererrenty: ‘Ya, apetyeyenh-anem Jesus. Ra atyetyart-anem aneyew ikwerenh-rnemew arntarnt-aremel.’
Atha arrenhantherrenh arraty ileyel. Rlengkarl iteth aneyel-rnem apmer nhel rernem alakenh areyenh Jerusalem-itwew, rernemarl iteth aneyelel-antey.
Ahern-then alker-thenarl ywerreyelpeyenh. Angka atyenhanap intemarl aynterl-aneyenh, ywerrey-angenh.”
“Mwanty-antey anayntenh-arey arrantherr! Anngangelhey-angenh amernel, ngkwarlel, apwertel-akerr ilpertelemel. Apmwangkwarr apek arrantherr anerl-anewerr arlta ikwerel, ayengarl arwapeny apetyeyenh-wety.
Ingkerrenh apmer arrpanenh-itwew apateyelpeyenh, ayengarl arwapeny apetyeyenh.
Ya, arrantherrap intem atyeng arntarnt-arelh-ayntenh-arey mwanty. Akngey-then ayern-ayntenh-arey, arrenhantherrenh rlterrkel-aynteyew, apmwa ayntenty-angkwarr. Renh ayernemel, arrenhantherrenh rlterrkel-aynteyew, arrantherr ilelh-aynteyew nyerr-weny. Akngey-wenh Artwa Inngel atha court-emeleyenh ingkerrenh-antey anyentarl-anyentarl.” Alakenh-anyem Jesus-el renh-rnem akalty-anthenh, rernemarl alakenh-tangkwel ayernew, “Nthakenh-tangkwel irreyenh, nga apey-alpeyew-alenty?”
Arlta arrpanenh Jesus-el akngerr akalty-anthenh Jew-rnem-wenh tyaty ilkwitwew. Atwerrp-atwerrp ra akalty-anthenharl-penh, rap alpenh kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem-akert, ankwaynt-aynteyew Apwert Alip-itwew.
Aherlkamenhey-alhenh akngerran akarrerrenh ikwer-warl tyaty ilkwitwew, angka ikwerenh awaynteyew.
Tawen Jerusalem-itwew akngerr mpwelhenh tyenkerr ikwer apmelerrew. Jew-rnemarl akarrerrem, amern ilperr-ilperr arlwarelheley-angenh arlkwew-arlkwem, aker yep-yep-then. Rernemap iylpangkem, antyerl Akngey-wenhelarl awey alkenh-rnem Egypt-areny-rnem-wenh ipmew-antey atweynenh awank-akerr. Rap mentyarl arew awey alkenh-rnem Israel-rnem-wenh, renh-rnem ipmew atwey-angenh.
Artwa rltwernem Jew-rnem-wenh tyaty ilkwareny-rnem artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnem-then rernem angkerrenh alakenh: “Nthakenh Jesus-an anantherr irrtyertel antwerrkem, renh atweyew?” Akngerr-wety rernem ywarn iterrenh apatemel, ingwer-rnem ikwer-rnem ahelerrewerr.
Arrenty alkenhelan Satan-el Judas Iscariot arrkernew-anem. Kwertengerl ikwerenh-anteyarlap ran, Jesus-elarl ayerrpelew arrwekel-antey.
Rap irrtyertel-antey alhew artwa rltwa tyaty ilkwareny-rnem-warl, iltyemwerney tyaty ilkwareny-warl-then. Rap angkew, “Ayengan iterreyel, Jesus arrewantherr ahayiweyew. Nthakenharlap atha ileman?”
Rernemap inkwerelhemel awew, angkew-anem ikwer, “Anantherran apwert akngerr ngkweng anthem.”
Judas-an angkew, “Yew-yew.” Ran intem alakenh iterrerl-apenh, “Ilengerarl atha renh-rnem ilanthem, Jesus antwerrkeyew? Irrpetyapantarl ikwer-itwel aneyeleng-arey apek?”
Arlta ingwerelan rernem amern ilperr-ilperr arlkew-arlkwenh Jew-rnem-wenh-angkwarr. Ingkerrel yep-yep akely ahenty akemel atwew. Rernemap ampernew, arlkweyew-anem.
Jesus angkew Peter-ew-then John-ew-then, “Alhenh-atherr, amern tyenkerr-rnem ineyew. Amern-rnem ampernenh-atherr arrernemel, anantherr kwenty arlkwew-arlkweyew.”
Ratherrap ayernew, “Nthek-ampeny-warl aylernanth amern-rnem ampernem?”
Ra tyernew, “Alhenh-atherr Jerusalem-warl. Mpwelanthap renh arenheyenh, artwa anyentarl apetyeyenh ampwal kwatyew-arelh-akert. Renhap apentenh-atherr warl anyent-angkwarr, aylpenhemel ikwer-angkwarr.
Angkey-alhenh-atherr alakenh warlew-artey ikwer, ‘Ingkartel thwenew. Nthenh-itwewarlap anantherr tyenkerran arlkweyenh?’
Artwa rap atnwenhem irrwerl, room taypel ilkwangketyarr-warl. Ikwer-itwew amern tyenkerr-rnem ampernenh-atherr arrernemel, anantherr arlkwew-arlkweyew.”
Ratherrap anperl-alhew, inngarl arewan, Jesus rarl ilew-angkwarr arrwekel-antey. Amern tyenkerr-rnem arrernew-penh, ratherrap alpew Jesus-warl angkep-antey.
Ingkenyarl aylpenhewel, Jesus alhew kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem-akert apmer ikwer-warl. Rernemap arrernelhew, tyenkerr-anem arlkwew-arlkweyew.
Rap angkew ikwer-rnem, “Ayengan ilkelhew-antey, tyenkerr nhenh arlkweyew arrewantherr-akert. Anantherrarl arlkwem-penh, ingwer-rnemelan ayenh irrwampenh-antheyenh artewenty, ipmew-antey ayenh atweyenh.
Ingkerr atyeng awelhenh-arey! Tyenkerr nhelkwer atha arlkwey-angenh arrpemarl alakenh. Ingwer-ingwerant, ayengarl ilwenty-penh, Akngeyan ikwerenh-rnemew atyetyart aneyenh, athap arlkweyenh arrpemarl alakenh.”
Rap inew irrkwa ngkwarl wayn-akert, inkwerelhemel Akngey-anem nakew ngkwarl ikwer-akertel. Rap angkew-anem ikwer-rnem, “Ya, ngkwarl nhenhan inenh-arey. Antherreynemel antywenh-arey akelyarl-akely.
Ngkwarl wayn nhenh atha antywey-angenh arrpemarl ahern nhenh-itwew alakenh. Ingwer-ingwerant, Akngeyan ikwerenh-rnemew atyetyart aneyenh, athap antywem arrpemarl alakenh.”
Amern-anem ra inew, rap inkwerelhemel Akngey-anem nakew amern ikwer-akertel. Akaltheynemel akelyarl-akely ikwer-rnem antheynew angkemel, “Arlka atyenh nhenhan. Ingwer-rnemelarl arlka atyenh-anem artewenty arleny-arrerneyenh whip-el. Ayengan katy ilweyenh arrewantherr. Alakenhaym arrantherr amern arlkwerl-anem, atyeng iylpangkemel.”
Rernem tyenkerr arlkwew-penh, Jesus-el inew arrpemarl irrkwa ngkwarl wayn-akert, antheynemel angkemel-antey, “Arrnga thelemel katy ilweyenh ayeng arrewantherr, apmwa irrarlkenheyew. Akngeyel arretengelew, rarl anyent-anem arrenhantherrenh pweytelem ikwer-warl. Atharl arrnga thelem alakenh, Akngey arrewantherr angkem ingwer-rnemew-then, rarl apmwa irrarlkem arrewantherr ingkerrenh-they.”
Rap angkew ikwer-rnem, “Anyentan arrewantherr-they alherlenty-akngeyenh artwa ilkwernem-warl irrtyertel-antey. Amernarl arlkwem-penh, rap ingwer-rnem-anem ileyenh, ayenh antwerrkeyew.
Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh ayengan ilwem, Akngey-wenh pipel aynteyel-angkwarr. Artwa irrtyert-awarr renhanap Akngeyel artewentyel irrwampenh-antheyenh.”
Kwertengerl-rnemel awew alakenh, rernemap angkerrew, “Artwa nthek-apenyarlap ran?”
Rernemarl anew-anenh-antey, kwertengerl-rnem alakenh angkerrenh anyentarl-anyentarl, “Ayengan atyetyart Jesus-they, arrantherr ingwer-rneman arrangkwarl!”
Jesus angkew ikwer-rnem, “Atyetyart ahern nhenh-areny-rnem ahelengkwarl. Rernem akngerr pwerep-anthem, awelheyew ikwer-rnem. Rernem angkem, ‘Mwerr-angkerant-arey anantherr anem apmer nhenh-itwew, ayengarl atyetyart ilkwarl.’
Atyetyart ahelengkw yanh-rnem-apeny aney-angenh. Anyentarl arrewantherr-they atyetyartan aneyew. Warrkenh-apeny nga anemer anyentant, 11 yanh-rnemew warrkerreyew. Ntwan arntarnt-aremer 11 yanh-rnem.
Atyetyart ilkwa artwa ilek-apenyarlap ran? Weth ran taypelel anem, amernarl arlkwem, artwa warrkenhelarl ikwer akngetyem. Ayengarlap atyetyart ahelengkw weth-rnem-apeny-weny. Athap arrenhantherrenh arntarnt-arem.
Arrantherran ayenh iwerl-alhey-angenh, rlterrkarl atyeng ayntewengarl, ingwer-rneman atyeng-wety intwemelerrewarl.
Akngey atyenhel ayenh atyetyart arrernew ingkerr ikwerenh-rnemew. Alakenh-anyem ingwer-ingwer atharl arrenhantherrenh arrerneyenh atyetyart-rnem.
Ayengan aney-alpem atyetyart irrwerl-itwew, kwertengerl-rnem arrantherr atyeng-itwel aney-alpem. Anantherrap inkwerelhemel kwenty arlkwerrem. Arrantherr chair amparrkentyel anem, Jew-rnem arntarnt-aremel ingkerrenh.”
Jesus angkew Simon Peter ikwer, “Simon, awelha atyeng. Arrenty alkenhel Satan-el Akngey alakenh ayernew, ‘Mwerrang atha kwertengerl-rnem arrkernem artewentyel?’ Akngeyan angkew, ‘Kel mwerr.’ Ingwerentyaman arrantherr iylpareth-antey ikwer awelhem, apmwangkwarrarl angkeyelewan.
Athan ngkweng Akngey ayernew, Simon-ay, ngenh rlterrkeleyew. Atha iterl-areyel, ngarl atyeng-wety amenterrenheyenh. Ngarl atyeng-warl angkeperrenhey-alpeyenh, ntwap ingwer-rneman rlterrkel-aynta.”
Ra tyernew, “Arrangkwarl! Ngenh akwernem tyayl-warl, ayeng ngkweng-angkwarr alhem arrpemarl. Ngenh ipmew atwem, ayenhanap rernem atweyew arrpemarl.”
Jesus angkew, “Ileyel atha ngenh arraty. Tywek-tywek arlkeyew-alenty rlengk atemwengkel-antey, irrpety-inger nga ilelheyenh, ntwan ayenh iterl-arey-angenh.”
Kwertengerl 12 ikwer-rnem-anem ra angkew, “Arrantherr iterl-areyel, atharl weth thwenew arrenhantherrenh, angka mwerr-angker ilerl-apaynteyew. Iltyantarlap arrantherr alhew; apwert-weny, yakweth-weny, pwet anyentant. Ayek ingwer-rnemelan arntarnt-arew arrenhantherrenh?” Rernem tyernew, “Ya, ingwer-rnemel anenhantherrenh arntarnt-arew inngarl.”
Rap angkew, “Aleyan ingwer-lkwer-anem. Ingwer-rnemelan arrenhantherrenh arntarnt-arey-angenh. Aleyan arrewantherr mwerr-anemarl apwert-then yakweth-then akngeyew. Ingwerentyel nayp arlpenty atnyeney-angenh apek. Ra kwet ikwerenh anthemer apwertew. Apwert ikwerel ra nayp arlpenty-anem inemer.
Akngey-wenh pipelan alakenhan aynteyel: ‘Rernem angkeyenh, atharl angka Moses-wenh apentey-angenh.’ Ya, angka yanhan atyeng-akert. Rlengkan rernem atyeng-akert alakenh-anyem ilem, Akngey-wenh pipelarl aynteyel-angkwarr.”
Kwertengerl-rnem angkew, “Ingkartay, nhenh araw! Kelarl anantherran nayp arlpenty atherr atnyeneyel.” Ra angkew, “Kel-antey. Alakenh angkey-angenh, menty. Arwa angkeyel.”
Ikwer-penhan Jesus warl ikwer-they anperl-alhew kwertengerl ikwerenh-rnem-akert, angkep alpew apmelerrel-ayeth Apwert Alip-warl.
Rernemarl apwertel aney-alhew, rap angkew ikwer-rnem, “Akngey-anem arrantherr ayernenh-arey rlterrkeleyew. Arrentyel arrenhantherrenh arrkernewerr, angkeperreyew atyeng-wety.”
Kwertengerl-rnem arrernelhew ingkerrenh-antey, Jesus-an arleng-awatyelew. Rap kwenerremel-anem angkenh alakenh-anyem,
“Akngey atyenh, ayeng ilkelheyel, ntwa artwereleyew ahelengkw yanh-rnem. Ayenh irrwampenh-anthewerr, ipmew-antey atwemel! Ngarl ilkelhenty, rernem ayenh atwem, kel mwerrarl. Ayeng ngkweng awelhemarl. Ngkwenh-angkwarr mwerr.”
Antyerl-anem irrwerl-they anamerl-antey aremerrenhey-alhew, rlterrkeleyew renh.
Jesus-an arlka apmwerrenhew. Rap Akngey angkepelarreng ayernenh rlterrkel-antey irrkaty-angkwarr. Rlterrkel ayernenh-angkwarr, intyey-anem ikwer-they taltyaytnenh kwaty-apeny.
Akngey-warl angkenh-penh, ra rtnerl-alhew, alpemel-anem ikwer-rnem-warl. Rap renh-rnem arey-alpew, ankwarl ayntenh-anem. Rernemarl amperrngerremel anew-anenh, ankwel-anem renh-rnem atwew.
Rap atyekelemel ayernew, “Ay! Ilekewarl arrantherran ankwan aynteyel? Akwentenh-arey! Akngey ayern-ayntenh-arey artewenty, arrentyel arrenhantherrenh ilpertelewerr.”
Jesus-an angkenh-angkwarr, kwertengerl Judas-anem aremerrey-alhew akngerr ingwer-rnem-akert. Rap alhew, Jesus-ew arrwantyeyew-arrpantey.
Jesus-el ayernew, “Inngang ntwan ayenh arrwantyeyel? Arrangkw. Alakenhan ntwa ayenh artwa ahawarr-rnem-warl lwewarrerneyew, antwerrkeyew.”
Kwertengerl ingwer-rnemel arew, artwa ahawarr-rnem arrererrenhey-alhew, antwerrkeyew-anem. Rernem ayernew, “Ingkartay, mwerrang anantherr renh-rnem atanthem nayp arlpenty atherrel?”
Kwertengerl anyentelan nayp-anem tyerrenhew, rap artwa anyent-wenh iylpa akenhew arraty-angkwarr. Artwa warrkenharlap ran tyaty ilkwa Jew-rnem-wenh-areny artwa rltwewenh.
Jesus-el renh-rnem artwerelew, “Ipmelhenh-arey arrantherr!” Rap iylpa inew, arnemel mwerrelew-anem.
Artwa rltwernem tyaty ilkwareny-rnem, iltyemwerney tyaty ikwer-areny-rnem, artwamp-rnem-then rernem ingkerrenh rtnenherrenh. Rernem mpwelherrenh, renh antwerrkeyew. Rap angkew ikwer-rnem, “Ilekew arrantherr apetyew nayp arlpenty-rnem-akert arwerl-then-akert? Athan ingwerenty ipmew atwey-angenh!
Arlta arrpanenhel atha akngerr akalty-anthenh tyaty ilkwitwew. Arrantherran ayenh antwerrkemer ikwer-itwew. Nthakenh arrantherran ayenh antwerrkey-angenh ikwer-itwew, ayengarl apmwel-ayeth aney-angenh, arrangkw. Arrantherrap ayenh mentyarl arew. Kel-anem aleyan arrantherr ayenh antwerrkem. Arrentyel arrenhantherrenh ilanthew, ayenh antwerrkeyew, awank-akerr Akngeyan angkew-angkwarr.”
Rernemap Jesus antwerrkew, warl Caiaphas-wenh-warl-anem atnwenhew. Artwa Caiaphas ranap tyaty ilkwa Jew-rnem-wenhew-artey. Rernemarl renh akngeynenh, Peter-elan irrker-they apenteynenh.
Warl ikwer-itwew aketh-itwew, artwa ahawarr-rnemel rwa arrtyew atheperrel. Peter-an alhew, aney-alhew ikwer-rnem-itwel, rwel-anem arlterrngerrey-alhew.
Kwey warrkenh anyentel alhengk-aremel angkew ingwer-rnemew, “Artwa nhenhan Jesus-ew apelty arrpemarl.”
Ra irrtywerremel angkew, “Rwengk, atha renh iterl-arey-angenh.”
Ikwer-penh-antey ingwerel-anem alhengk-arew, “Ngan kwertengerl Jesus-wenh arrpemarl.” Peter-el tyernew, “Rwengk, ayeng-weny!”
Ingwer-ingweran ingwerel-anem renh alhengk-arew. “Ya, artwa nhanyem inngarl alhenh ikwerel-arleng. Ran angkeyel apmer Galilee-areny-rnem-apeny. Ranap ikwer-areny arrpemarl, Jesus-apeny.”
Ran tyernew, “Arrangkw! Atha iterl-arey-angenh, ngarl angkeyel-angkwarr!” Rarl angkenh-angkwarr, tywek-tywekan arlkew-anem.
Kwen-they Jesus-elan renh artepang arew. Peter-el iterl-arew, rarl arrwekel-antey ilew, “Tywek-tywek arlkeyew-alenty rlengk atemwengkel-antey, irrpety-inger nga ilelheyenh, ntwan ayenh iterl-arey-angenh.”
Rap akwenterl-alhew, tyerrelhenhey-alhew aketh-warl-anem keyt-angkwarr. Ra artewentyel artnenh-anem, rarl arrwekel-antey angkew-penh, ra renh iterl-arey-angenh.
Artwa ahawarr-rnemel Jesus antwerrkenh, rernemap arrkentelhelemel renh atwenh.
Rag-el annga atherran renh artew ayernemel, “Ntwarl arraty-antey iterl-areyel. Ilelha anewantherr. Angwenhel ngenh atwewan?”
Rernem alakenhan ayernemel-antey kwanthenh renh akwetyemel.
Itwern tyerrelhewel, artwa ilkwerneman akarrerrew angkerreyew. Atyetyart Jew-rnem-wenh-rnem, artwa rltwa tyaty ilkwareny-rnem, artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnem-then rernem ingkerr akarrerrew. Artwa ahawarr-rnemel Jesus renh rnkernew arrwekel-angkwarr.
Artwa ilkwernemel renh ilew, “Arraty ilelheyew! Nganang artwa Christ, Akngeyelarl ilew, rarl ahern nhenh-warl thweneyew?” Ra tyernew, “Ayengan angkenty alakenh, arrantherrap irrpeltharl irrem.
Atha arrenhantherrenh ilenty, angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnemel ilenh, arrantherran awelhey-angenharl. Ya, ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh.
Rlengk-antey ayeng alpeyenh, Akngey-itwel aney-alpeyew. Akngey ran arawerrng ilkwakertarl. Ayengan aney-alpeyenh ikwer-itwel, aylakap-atherr-anem aneyenh atyetyart alkenh-atherr.”
Rernem awew, ayernew-anem, “Kelew, innga wenh nga Alerikw Akngey-wenh, ngay?” Ra tyernew, “Inngarlap arrantherr alakenh angkeyel.”
“Kel anantherr awew! Ilekewarl anantherr nthwem ingwer-warl, apmwa renh antweyew? Rantey ament ilelheyel, ran Akngey-wenh Alerikwarl!”
Artwa ilkwernem rtnerl-alhew-anem, Jesus rernem atnwenhew artwa ilkwa Rome-areny-warl Pilate-warl.
Rernemap renh rnkernew arrwekel Pilate-itwew, ayntarrp-ilew-anem alakenh, “Artwa nhel-anyemel Jew-rnem anenhantherrenh akalty-anthenh apmwel-ayeth! Ran arrkernelhew, anenhantherrenh artwereleyew-arrpantey, apwert anthewerr artwa ilkwa Rome-areny ikwer! Ran ilelheyel Alerikw Akngey-wenh. Ranap Moses-wenh-angkwarr apentey-angenharl, rarl alakenh angkeyel. Ran Akngey-wenh-wenyarl, artwa anantherr-apeny. Ranap ilelheyel artwa Christ, Akngeyelarl ilew, rarl ahern nhenh-warl thweneyew, atyetyart Jew-rnemew-artey aneyew!”
Pilate-elan ayernew, “Inngang ngan atyetyart Jew-rnemew-artey?” Jesus-el tyernew, “Arratyan nga angkeyel.”
Pilate angkew artwa ilkwernemew ingwer-rnemew-then, “Ywarn-antey atha renh ayerneyel. Ranap apmwelheley-angenh! Nthakenh atha renh atwey-angenh arrangkwewan. Atha renh tyarlewemer.”
Rernemanap ahelerremel arlkew, “Arrangkw wenh! Ran alhenh apmer arrpanenh-warl, Jew-rnem akalty-antherl-apenh, kapmentew awelhey-angenh anaynteyew. Apmer Galilee-angkwarr-tangkwel ra alhenh. Aleyan ra apetyew apmer nhenh-warl Jerusalem-warl-anem, irrwerneyew.”
Pilate-el awew, rap ayernew, “Artwa nhenhan Galilee-areny, ngay?”
Rernemap angkew, “Ya, Galilee-arenyarlap ran!” Pilate rap iterrew, renh thweneyew atyetyart Galilee-areny-warl Herod-warl. Ikwerel-antey, rernemarl Jesus ayernenh-angkwarr, Herod-an anenh tawen ikwer-itwew, rarl arwa apetyew. Pilate-then ilkelhey-angenhant-atherr anenh.
Rernemap Jesus atnwenhew artwa Herod-warl, atyetyart Galilee-areny-warl. Herod-an inkwerelhew, renh areyew, rarl angka awew, Jesus-elan ilek-ilek mpwarey-angker. Anngetherr-anem ra renh areyew, mpwarenty rlterrk ilkwakertel.
Akngerr-inger ra Jesus-an ayernenh. Ranap akeleytarl rtnenh, tyerney-angenh.
Artwa rltwa tyaty ilkwareny-rnem artwa angka Moses-wenhew akalty-anthey-angker-rnem-then rernem awelhenh arrpemarl arrer-they, ahelerremelarl renh ayntarrp-ilerrenh.
Herod-el artwa ahawarr ikwerenh-rnem-akertel renh arrkentelhelenh. Rernemap arnkwa atyetyart-wenh mwerr-angkerel renh akwernew, angkep thwenemel artwa ilkwa ingwer weth-warl Pilate-warl-anem.
Arlta ikwerel-antey Pilate-then Herod-then mwerrant-atherr-anem aneyelpew.
Kel Jesus angkep thweneynew atyetyart Pilate-warl-anem. Akngerr-anem Pilate-el ilew, akarrerreyew ikwer-warl. Artwa rltwa tyaty ilkwareny-rnem, atyetyart Jew-rnem-wenh-then ingkerrenh-antey akarrerrew.
Rap angkew ikwer-rnem, “Arrantherran artwa nhenh atyeng-warl akngetyew. Arrantherrap renh ayntarrp-ilenh, irrwernelhewarl. Athan renh ywarn-antey ayernenh, anngetherr arrewantherr-itwew. Renh thwenew Herod-warl-anem. Ran ayernenh arrpemarl ywarn-antey, rap renh thwenew angkep arrpemarl. Herod-atherr aylanthan iterreyel, ran apmwewenyarl. Atha nthakenh atyenh-rnem iley-angenh, renh ipmew atweyew, arrangkw.”
<range>
Pilate-an iterrenh, “Atyetyart Jew yanh-rnem inkwerelhem apek, ayengarl alakenh angkentyew, ‘Atha artwa ahawarr-rnem ilanthem, renh whip-el atweyewant, tyarlewemel-anem.’” Rap alakenh angkew, “Atha atyenh-rnem ilanthem, rernem atweyew artepant whip-el, renh tyarlewemel-anem.”
Ikwerel-antey rernem Jesus court-emelenh, artwa anyent anenh tyayl-itwew itnan Barabbas. Awank-akerr artwernem atwerrenh Jerusalem-itwew. Ra nheng artwa anyent ipmew atwew, renhap tyayl-warl-anem akwernew. Ingkerrenh arlkalhelerrenh, “Jesus yanh atwey! Barabbas-an tyarlewa anewantherr!” [Apmer ikwer-areny-rnemelarl tyenkerr weth arlkwenh, Pilate-el tyerrenh artwa anyent tyayl-they. Ra apmelerrel-ayeth alakenh irrenh.]
<range>
<range>
Pilate-an ilkelhew, Jesus tyarleweyew. Ywarn-antey ra ayernenh arrpemarl.
Rerneman arlkalhelerrenh, “Arwerl iylpeyl-atherr-warl atantha! Arwerl iylpeyl-atherr-warl atantha!”
Pilate angkew ikwer-rnem, “Arrangkw wenh! Ranap apmwelheley-angenh! Atha nthakenh atyenh-rnem iley-angenh, renh arrangkwew ipmew atweyew. Atha renh-rnem ilanthem, rernem atweyew artepant whip-el, renh tyarlewemel-anem.”
Arlkalhelerrenh-antey atayel, “Arwerl iylpeyl-atherr-warl atantha!” Pilate rap awelhew iylpareth-antey.
Ra renh-rnem akeleyteleyew-arrpantey, rap angkew, “Kelew!”
Rap artwa renh Barabbas tyarlewew-anem tyayl-they, rernemarl arlkalhelerrenh-angkwarr. Rap Jesus ahayiwew artwa ahawarr-rnemew, arwerl iylpeyl-atherr-warl atantheyew.
Ikwer-penh artwa ahawarr-rnemel Jesus atnwenhew atyetyart Pilate-wenh warl-they. Rernemap artwa anyent-anem rlwatew, Jerusalem-warlarl apetyenh apmer ingwer-they. Simon-arlap ran, apmer Cyrene-areny. Rernemap renh antwerrkew, ilanthemel arwerl katy akngeyew Jesus-ew. Jesus arrwekelarl alhenh, Simon-el ingkern-theyarl apenteynenh arwerl-akertel.
Akngerr ingwer-rnemel Jesus apentenh. Arelh-rnem artnalhelerrenh artewentyel ikwer.
Rap artepang aremel angkew ikwer-rnem, “Arelh Jerusalem-areny-rnemay! Atyeng artney-angenh arrantherr! Amenheng nhenh-areny-rnemew artnenh-arey!
Ya, pwarrk antheyenh rernem ayenh artewenty innga. Ingwer-ingwer arrewantherr Jerusalem-areny-rnemew apmwernemel pwarrk ilkwa innga antheyenh. Arrantherrap angkeyenh, ‘Arelh ampeweny-rneman inkwerelheyel. Arelh ampernem-akertan amperrngerreyel-anem, apmwernemelarl ampa ikwer-rnem-wenh atwew.’ Arlta ikwerel arrantherr apwert ilkwernem-warl anterreyenh. Arrantherrap rtneyenh apwert impalth-itwew, angkemel Akngeyew, ‘Artwa ahawarr-rnemelan ipmew atwewerr, apwert nhenh-rneman ntwa arrewelhela, anewantherr-warl aytneyew, anenhantherrenh ipmew lthweyew!’”
<range>
<range>
Artwa ahawarr-rnemel atnwenheynenh artwa ingwer atherr-then, artwa ratherran irrwernelhewarl. Rerneman ilkelhew, artwa irrpety renh-rnem atweyew.
Renh-rnem rernem atnwenheynew apwert anyent-warl itnan Akarnng. Apwert ikwer-itwew Jesus-itwew rernem arnkwan lhelp-lhelew. Atanthew-anem arwerl iylpeyl-atherr-warl, rnkernemel Jesus-enp-antey. Artwa apmwa atherr-then rnkernew akwerrant-atherr, renh ampepewelemel.
Jesus itnywenemel angkew, “Akngeyay, akwerrparl rernem. Rernem iterl-arey-angenh, apmwel-ayeth mpwareyel. Apmwa irrarlka ikwer-rnem-wety.” Artwa ahawarr-rnemap ntwelhelerrenh, ampwal iwemel namp-akert, Jesus-wenh arnkwa antengeleyew.
Akngerr rtnenherrenh-antey, Jesus arntarnt-arenh, aynterarrerrenharl arwerl-itwew. Artwa Jew alkenh-rnemelan renh arrkentelhelenh irrpeltherremel alakenh, “Ra ingwer-rneman itethelew ipmepenh. Rap ament itethelhelemer ipmewety. Inngang ran artwa Christ, Akngeyelarl arretengelew anewantherr, ra ahern nhewarl thweneyew? Rap atwarremer arwerl yanh-they!”
Artwa ahawarr-rnemel renh arrkentelhelenh arrpemarl alakenh, “Ngkwarl tyekert antywa anewantherr-itwel!
Inngang ngan atyetyart Jew-rnemew-artey? Anantherr iterl-areyew! Atwarra arwerl yanh-they!”
Arwerl tyeylp arrernew arwerl iylpeyl-atherr ikwer-warl. Tyeylp ikwer-warl alakenh-anyem ingkwernew, “Artwa nhanyem atyetyart Jew-rnem-wenh.”
Artwa apmwa anyentelan Jesus ra arrkentelhelenh arrpemarl. “Nheng nga artwa Christ. Atwarra arwerl-they, atwarrelhelemel aylernenhanth-then!”
Artwa apmwa ingwerelan renh iltew. “Ipmelha, atherrelerl-aney-angenh! Nga atererremer Akngey-wety! Anantherr ilweyew-anem arwerl nhenh-rnemel!
Kelarl aylewanthan mwerrarl ilweyew alakenh, apmwel-ayetharl mpwarew-penh. Artwa nhenhan apmwelheley-angenh, arrangkw.”
Jesus aremel ra angkew, “Iterra atyeng, ngarl rlengk-antey alpem irrwerl, atyetyart alkenh aney-alpeyew.”
Ra tyernew, “Atha ngenh arraty ileyel. Rlengk-antey aylanth alpem, aney-alpeyew apmer mwerr-angker-itwew irrwerl.”
Arlta ikwerel-antey arlta ampepel atemwengkerreyelpew. Nthakenh ingkeny arey-angenh. Apmer arrpanenh-itwew atemwengkerrew arlta ampep-they atwerrpew-atety.
Ingkeny arrtyerneyelpew-anem angkeparl. Rag ilkwa aynterarrerrenh tyaty ilkwitwew. Atemwengkerrewel, rap ilterrelhew ament-antey ampep-angkwarr irrwerl-they kwenel-athek.
Jesus arlkew, “Akngey atyenhay! Ayeng ilweyel-anem! Inweng atyenh arntarnt-ara!” Ra alakenh angkew-penh, rap ilwew-anem.
Atyetyart artwa ahawarr-rnem-wenhel arenh arrer-they. Rap Akngey nakew alakenh angkemel, “Inngarl artwa nhenhan mwerr. Ran apmwelheley-angenh, arrangkw.”
Akngerr akarrerrew. Rernem aytareyew, artwernem irrpety arwerl-warl aynterarrewew, artwa apmwa atherr Jesus-anem. Rernemap amperrngerrew, alpew-anem apmer-warl, artewentyel artnemel.
Jesus-ew apelty-rnem ikwerenh-rnem-then rerneman arleng-they arenh. Arelh Galilee-areny-rnemel arenh arleng-they arrpemarl, rernemarl apetyew Jesus-el-arleng apmer ikwer-they.
Kel artwa Joseph-an rtnenh arwerl-itwew arrerenty, ranap apmer Arimathea-areny Judea-ampeny-areny. Ran arratyarl anenh, Akngeyew mpwelhemel, rarl atyetyart ingkerrenhew aneyenh. Artwa Jew ilkwarlap ran. Arrwekel-antey artwa ilkwernem angkerrenh, Jesus renh atweyew. Joseph-elan ywarn-antey arrkernelhenh, artwereleyew-arrpantey.
<range>
Jesus-arl ilwew-penh, rap atyetyart Pilate ayerney-alhew, “Menty atha renh akngeyney, akwerneyew?” Pilate-el tyernew, “Ya, akngeyna.”
Rap ikwerenh-rnem-akertel arwerl-they atwarrelhelew, arnkwa arlterel-anem ataperrelew, akwernemel awenng-warl. Awennganap intey-penh, ingwerentyelarl akalthew apwert impalth-they. Intey ra arrangkwarl ayntenh, ingwerenty akwerney-angenh-antey.
Friday atwerrp-atwerrp-anem. Joseph-wenh-rnemel renh anamerl-antey akwernew, ingkeny aylpenhewerr. Friday atwerrpan alakenh warrkenh Jew-rneman iterrem, “Warrk anantherr ipmelhem-anem. Nthakenh anantherr Saturday-el warrkerrey-angenh arlta ltyerrey-angker-wety.”
Friday ikwerel arelh weth-rnem, Jesus-el-arlengarl apetyew Galilee-they, Joseph-anem rernem apentew. Rernemap intey-warl alhew, Jesus-arl akwernew-warl, areyew.
Rernem arew-penh, apmer-warl-anem alperlewew, anter mpwareyew mwerr-angker intenh-akert. Anter ipma aperneyew-arelh Jew-rnem-wenh-angkwarr. Saturday-el rernem ltyerrew apmer ikwer-rnem-wenh-itwew, Moses-elarl akalty-anthenh-angkwarr.
Ingwepenh-antey Sunday-el, arelh-rnem angkep alpew intey-warl anter mwerr-angker intenh-akert, rernemarl arrwekel-antey mpwarewenp. Mary Magdala-areny, Joanna, Mary ingwer-anem (James-wenh amikw), arelh ingwer-rneman, rernemarl alhenh ingkerrenh.
Intey-itwew rernem arey-alhew, apwertarl arnangelew arriw-they.
Rernem kwen aylpenhew areyew, Jesus ipma ayntentyew. Rernemap ywarew ikwer, arrangkwarl.
Rernemarl apatemel ayernerrenh, artwa atherr arwapeny aremerreyelpew, rtnenh-anem ikwer-rnem-itwel. Arnkwa ikwer-atherrenh amparrkenh.
Rernem atererremel kwenerrew-anem. Ratherr angkew ikwer-rnem, “Ilekew arrantherr artwa itethewan nthweyel ipmewenh-itwew-anem?
Ran nhenhel aney-angenh, arrangkw! Ran itetherrenhey-alpew, alhew-anem. Arrantherrarlap iterl-areyel, wetharl arrwekel arrewantherrel-arleng anenh apmer Galilee-itwew. Angka nhenh ra ilenh arrewantherr:
‘Ayengan Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh. Artwa apmwernemew ayenh ahayiweyenh. Rernem ayenh atweyenh ipmew-antey, tywenemel arwerl iylpeyl-atherr-warl. Ingwa atherr-penh ayeng itetherreyenh arrpemarl ipmepenh.’”
Arelh-rnemel angka renh iterl-arew-anem.
Rernemap intey-they alpew-anem, angka iley-alpew kwertengerl-rnem 11-ew ingwer-rnemew-then.
<range>
Kwertengerl-rnemanap awelhey-angenh. Rerneman iterrew, irrtywerremel ilerl-anenty-arrpantey.
Peter-anap rtnerl-alhew-anem, anterremel intey-warl. Rantey anngetherr amentel areyew. Rarl intey-itwew aremerrey-alhew, rap ayterney-alhew kwen. Arrangkw. Arnkwa arlterant ra arew, ipma ataperreleyew-arelh. Apatemel-anem ra apmer-warl alpew.
Arlta ikwerel artwa atherr alhenh tawen akely-warl Emmaus-warl, Jerusalem-they arrerenty. Ratherrap Jesus apentenh.
Alpenharl ratherr angkerreynenh Jesus-ew, ipma anaynt ayntey-angenh intey-itwew.
Ratherrarl angkeynenh-antey, Jesus rantey-anem anteng-they alpenh ikwer-atherr-warl, rap alpenh-anem ikwer-atherrel-arleng.
Ratherran renh alhengk-arey-angenh, arrangkw. Ingwerew-athen arenh.
Rap renh-atherr ayernenh, “Nthakenh mpwelanth angkerrenh?” Ratherr rtneyelpew, amperrngerremel ayternenh.
Artwa anyent itnan Cleopas ra angkew, “Ingkerrelan iterl-areyel, Jerusalem-itwewarl apmwa ayntew. Ntwan anyentelant iterl-arey-angenh?”
Rap ayernew, “Apmwa ilek-apenyarlap ran?” Ratherrap tyernew, “Artwa weth Jesus Nazareth-areny, ranap angkakert Akngey-wenharl. Arawerrng rlterrkel ra arntety-rnem mwerrelenh, angkethen akalty-anthenh Akngey-wenh arraty-angkwarr. Akngerran ikwer inkwerelhenh. Akngeyan ikwer inkwerelhenh arrpemarl.
Artwa rltwa tyaty-areny-rnem ikwer-wety arlkarerrenh atyetyart ingwer-rnem-then. Rernemap renh artwa ahawarr-rnem-warl ahayiwew atweyew, arwerl iylpeyl-atherr-warl-anem atantheyew.
Anantherranap renh apalelarl apentenh. Anantherr iterl-aremer, Akngeyelarl anewantherr thwenew Israel-wenh-rnemew. Anantherr iterrenh, rarl anewantherr atyetyart ilkwa anem-arrpantey, Rome-areny-rnem irrentemel. Alakenh ayntey-angenh, arrangkwarl. Ingwa atherrel-anem ra ipma ayntenh.
Ngwampan anantherr apateyelpew. Ingkeny aremerrey-angenh-antey, arelh-rnem alhew intey ikwer-warl, apey-alpemel angkakert-anem. Rernemarl kwen aylperl-alpew-penh intey-itwew, rernemap angka iley-alpew, ‘Ywarn-antey anantherr nthwenh Jesus ikwer. Antyerl atherr aremerrey-ayntew, angkew-anem, “Jesus-an angkep itetherrew ipmepenh!” ’
<range>
Artwernem-anem alhew intey-warl. Rernemap arey-alhew, arelh-rnemelarl ilenh-angkwarr-antey. Renhanap rernem arey-angenh, arrangkw.”
Jesus angkew ikwer-atherr, “Mpwelanthan arwengk apek, arraty iterrey-angenh? Mpwelanthan irrpeltherreyel angka artwa Christ-akert, awankarl angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnemel ingkwernenh!
Mwerrarl artwa renh irrwampenh-antheyewan, ingkerrew katy ilweyew. Ingwa atherrel rarl ayntem-penh, rap angkeparl itetherreyenh ipmepenh, Akngey-itwel-anem aney-alpemel arawerrng ilkwakertel.”
Rap renh-atherr akalty-anthenh arraty-angkwarr, anaynt-then ilenh angka irrkaty ikwer-akert. Angka renh Moses-el angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnemel-then ingkwernew Akngey-wenh pip-warl.
Rernemap aremerrey-alhew tawen ikwer-itwew Emmaus-itwew. Jesus-an alhenh-antey. Ingwer-atherran ilkelhew, aynteyew apmer ikwer-itwew.
