Akngerran atererrew-anem, rernemap anterrerrenh. Ingkerrenh anterrenh: artwa alkenh-rnem apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem, artwa ahelengkw alkenh-rnem, man akngerr-akert-rnem, kapment-areny-rnem, ingwer-rnemewarl warrkerreyel-rnem, amentarl warrkerreyel-rnem-akerr. Rernemap anterrerrenh, irrtyert-aylpeyew apwert-itwew intey-angketyarr-warl.
Rernemap arlkenh apwert-rnemew alakenh: “Aytneyew anantherr-warl, irrtyert-akwerneyew weth-atherr-wety! Yanharl chair mwerr-angker ilkwitwew aneyel-wety irrtyert-akwerneyew, ra arewerr! Yep-yep akely-wety-then irrtyert-akwerneyew, rarl anewantherr ahelerreyel, atwewerr ipmew-antey!
Arltan rlengk ayntem, Akngeyarl angkew, 'Aylak ingkerrenh court-emeleyenh, rwewarl iwemel.' Anantherr nthakenh arrngert rtney-angenh ikwer-atherr-wety.”
Ikwer-penhan atha arew antyerl-rnem 4 altyerr-itwel, rernemap rtnenherrenh ahern nhenh-itwew. Ingweran rtnenh akngerrakw, ingweran altwerlarl, ingweran ayerrerarl, ingweran antekerrarl. Rernemap arrngert rtnenh awer-wety, awer pwewerr ahern-warl, kwaty alay-warl-then arwerl-rnem-warl-then.
Akngeyan angkew, “Awelhenh-arey! Atha arrenhingkerrenh ileyel, alheyew ahern-then kwaty-then apmweleyew.” Antyerl ingwer-anem tyerrelhey-alhew akngerrakw-they, rap rwalep antwerrkenh. Rwalep ra Akngey iteth-wenharl. Antyerlan arlkew-anem antyerl 4 ingwer weth-rnemew,
“Alerl-tangkwel arringkerr mpwelhenh-arey! Rlwetangkwel aningkerr warrkenh Akngey-wenh-rnem-warl ingkwerney. Ikwer-penhant arringkerr apmwelem ahern-then kwaty alay-then arwerl-rnem-thenan.”
Ingwerentyel atyeng ilew, renh-rnem-warlarl ingkwerneyenh akngerr inngey, 144,000. Rernemanap artwamp Israel-wenh alerikw-rnem 12-penh, awank-akerrarl anenh.
Judah-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh, renh-rnem-warlarl ingkwernew rlwangkwarr, Reuben-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh, Gad-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh,
Asher-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh, Naphtali-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh, Manasseh-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh,
Simeon-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh, Levi-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh, Issachar-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh,
Zebulun-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh, Joseph-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh, Benjamin-wenh-rneman 12,000 anenh. Ya, renh-rnem-warl ingkerrenh alakenh ingkwerneyenh.
Ikwer-penhan athap arew, akngerr rtnenherrerl-alhenty. Akngerr innga. Nthekwern count-emeley-angenh, arrangkw. Apmer arrpanenh-areny; angka ingwerek-ingwer, irrpwerl-then arlter-then arrkay-then. Rernemap rtnenherrenh arrwekel-ampeny chair ilkwa atyetyart-wenh-itwew, arrwekel-ampeny chair yep-yep akely-itwew-then. Rernem arnkwa arlter-akert, waly-rnem antwerrkemel.
Rernemap aylelherrenh artewentyel alakenh-anyem: “Akngeyay! Ngant anyent aneyel chair ilkwa atyetyart-wenh-itwewan! Ntwethenant yep-yep akelyel-thenant mpwelak anenhantherrenh itethelem ipmewetyan!”
Ampwa alkenh 24 weth-rnem-then atnwenth iteth 4 weth-rnem rernem rtnenherrenh chair arrerenty. Antyerl ingkerrenhan rtnenherrenh ikwer-itwew arrpemarl, ampwernem-then atnwenth-rnem-then amperelelhemel. Rernemap kwenerrew-anem chair ilkwa atyetyart-wenh arrwekel-ampenyel, atnertel-ayeth ayntemel, nakemel Akngey alakenh:
“Ya, Akngey anewantherrenh mwerr-angker! Ingkerrel anantherr renh nakemer! Ra ingkerrenh iterl-areyel! Ra arawerrng rlterrk-akert! Ra ilek-ilek mwerr-angker mpwarew anewantherr ingkerrew! Ingkerrenhel renh mwerr antwerl-anemer intem-antey aleth! Ya, arraty alakenh-anyem!”
Ampwa alkenh anyentel ayenh ayernew, “Arlter-akert yanh-rneman, ntwan apek renh-rnem iterl-areyel? Nthenh-areny-rnem rerneman?”
Atha tyernew, “Atha iterl-arey-angenh. Ntwant iterl-areyel.” Ra angkew, “Ingwer-rnemelan rlterrk mpwarenh ikwer-rnem, atwemel renh-rnem, artewentyel pwarrk anthemel. Alakenhaymarl ayntenh-angkwarr, rerneman Akngey-wety angkeperrey-angenh-antey. Rernem iterl-arenh-antey, yep-yep akely Akngey-wenh katy ilwewarl ikwer-rnem, arrnga thelemel. Rernem apmwangkwarr-tangkwel anenh, rernemap awelhew-anem yep-yep akely ikwer. Arrnga ikwerenhel ra apmwa ingkerrenh irrarlkew ikwer-rnem-wety. Arnkwerneman mwerr-angker arlter-rnem ikwer-rnem-wenh, renh-rnemarl irrarlkew arrnga ikwerenhel.
Alakenhaym-wety: Rernem rtnenherreyel arrwekel-ampeny chair ilkwa Akngey-wenh-itwel, warrkerremel ikwer arltel-then kwenyel-then tyaty ilkwa ikwerenh-itwew. Ya, Akngeyan aneyel chair ilkwa ikwer-itwel, arntarnt-aremel ikwerenh-rnem, iwerl-alhey-angenh.
Akngey-wenh yep-yep akely ra rtneyel chair ilkwa arrerenty. Artwa yep-yepew-artey-apenyarlap ran. Ra renh-rnem arntarnt-areyel, ayteng-akngemel kwaty mwerr-angkerarl anterreyelarl-angketyarr-angkwarr. Kwaty renharl antywem-penh, itetharlap aleth-antey aneman. Angayakw irrey-angenh, angkethakw irrey-angenh-anem, arrangkw-anem. Itwernel ampey-angenh-anem, ampepenyel rwenperrey-angenh. Akngeyel rantey-anem irrarlkeyenh anngerneman. Rernem arrangkey-angenhan anaynteyew intem-antey.”
<range>
Yep-yep akely ra antwerrkenh-antey pip ataperr renh. Rap iylwew anker-apeny anyent ingwer-anem pip ikwer-they, namp 7-anem. Akngerr akeleyterrew-anem irrwerl. Alerl rernem angkey-angenh akeleyt anew.
Atha arew antyerl 7 ingwer-rnem-anem. Nhenh-rneman intem rtnenh Akngey-itwel arrwekel-ampeny. Ingwerentyel terampet anthew ikwer-rnem anyentam-anyent.
Apwert ilperr-ilperr gold-elarl artew ayntenh arrwekel-ampeny chair mwerr-angker atyetyart-wenh-itwew. Rernem rwa aperrk-tangkwel arrernew apwert ikwer-warl, rernemap irrkwa gold-penh thalt-apeny mwerr-angker intey-angkerinp aperrk-warl-anem arrernew, rap mwerr-angker intenh kwert-angkwarr. Antyerl ingweran aremerrey-alhew-anem, apwert ikwer-itwew arrwekel-ampeny rtnerl-alhemel. Rap irrkwa gold-penh antwerrkenh. Ingwerentyel anthew thalt-apeny akngerr mwerr-angker inteyelarl, irrkwewarl-anem arrerneyew, aperrk-itwew arrtyemel. Antyerlel irrkwa antwerrkew. Irrkwa ikwer-they-anem kwert itntenh Akngey-warl-athek. Kwert mwerr-angker-anem itntew Akngey-warl-athek, raw inkwerelheyew. Akngey-wenh-rnemarl angkem ikwer-warl, irrkaty-angkwarr angkan alpem ikwer-warl ikwer-rnem-they. Alakenh-anyem kwert-apeny angka ikwer-rnem-wenh alpem Akngey-warl.
<range>
Antyerl rap inew aperrk rwenp-rnem apwert ilperr-ilperr ikwer-they, arrernemel irrkwa ikwer-warl. Irrkwa renh aperrk-akert iwew kwenel-athek ahern-warl. Arwapeny arwerlk angkew, awely-awely-anem arrkew, ahern arrewemel.
Antyerl 7 rernem mpwelhenh, angkelh-angkelheleyew terampet.
Antyerl arrwekelenyel-tangkwel angkelh-angkelhelew terampet ikwerenh. Anamerl-antey ingwerentyel iyntwerelhelew aperrkwer, rwa, arrngethen, iwemel ahern-warl. Rwelan ampernew apmer ingwerentyant arwerl ingwerentyant-then. Rap antywer atherrkeny ampernew ingkerr.
Antyerl ingwerel-anem terampet ikwerenh angkelh-angkelhelew. Ingwerentyel anamerl-antey iwew apwert-apeny rwakert ilkwa kwaty alay-warl. Kwaty alay ingwer-ampenyan arrnganem irrew.
Kwaty alay-areny ingwer-rnemant ilwernerrew. Rtnwernem akngerr alhenh kwaty alay ikwer-itwew. Apwert ilkwel ra ngkweltyelew rtnwa ingwer-rneman.
Antyerl ingwerel-anem terampet ikwerenh angkelh-angkelhelew. Anamerl-antey antyarr ilkwa aytnew alker irrwerl-they, itnan Tyekerteley-angker. Rwenp innga ra ampenh, rap atwew ilpay ingwer-rnem kwaty apeynt-then. Kwaty ingwer-ampenyan tyekerterrew. Akngerran ilwernerrew kwaty ikwer-penh.
<range>
Antyerl ingwerel-anemarl terampet ikwerenh angkelh-angkelhelew. Anamerl-antey atwemengkel artew ingkenyan anyent-ampeny. Alkent anyent-ampeny artew arrpemarl irrkaty-angkwarr. Ingkenyan atemwengk irreyelpew arlta ampepew-atety. Alkentan atemwengk irreyelpew ampepenyew-atety. Antyarr ingwer-rnemelan arrtyerney-angenh irrew.
Athap irrwerl itnywenew, irretyarl alkerelerrenh. Rap arlkenh alakenh artewentyel: “Pwertay! Pwertay! Pwertay! Ayengan amperrngerreyel arrewantherr ahern-areny-rnemay! Antyerl ingwer irrpety yanh-rnem-alew? Rernem-anemarl terampet-rnem angkelh-angkelheleyenh. Irrpety-inger ilek-ilek apmwa aynteyenh ahern-itwew!”
Antyerl ingwerel-anem terampet ikwerenh angkelh-angkelhelew. Antyarr atha arew, alker-they aytnenty ahern-warl. Rap artwapeny rtnew irrka intwer-ampenyel. [Irrka ikwer-itwewan Akngeyel inweng apmwernem akentem. Ingwer-ingweran ra renh-rnem iweyenh rwa ilkwewarl, aletharl ampeyel-warl.] Ampwal ilperr-ilperrel arriwan artew door-el-apeny. Ingwerentyel key anthew antyarr renh, door altywereleyew.
Rarl altywerelewel, kwert ilkwa arlwar anew irrka ikwer-they, rwa ilkwethey-apeny. Kwertel ingkeny artew-anem. Alker atemwengk irreyelpew, nthakenh arey-angenh-anem.
Intelty akngerr tyerrelhew kwert ikwer-they, ahern-warl-anem atwarrerrew. Ingwerentyel renh-rnem rlterrkelew, akngerr atantheyew, atneth-akertel-apeny.
Antyerl angkew ikwer-rnem, “Atherrk arlkwey-angenh, arwerl arlkwey-angenh, alperr-akerr arlkwey-angenh! Menty aney! Menty aney Akngey-wenh-rneman, rlwewarlarl ingkwernew-rneman! Ingwer-rnemant atanthenh-arey!
Nthakenh arrantherr renh-rnem atanthey-angenh ipmew, arrangkw. Arwa pwarrk anthem alkent-rnem 5-ew-atety.” Apmwanem rernem awelhem, atneth-akertel atanthenty-penh.
Ikwereng-arey rernem iterrem alakenh, “Pwarrkerreyel anantherr! Ilweyew-anem anantherr!” Arrangkwaw! Ilwey-angenh-antey. Rernem anerl-aneyenh, kwarnelherl-aneyenhant pwarrk inngey.
Intelty-rneman rtnenherrenh nantew-rnem-apeny. Rernem mpwelhenh, alheyew akngerrarl atwerrenh-warl. Ampwal mwekart-apeny atyetyart-wenh gold-penh-akert akapwert-itwew. Inngerran artwapeny.
Alta arlpenty arelh-apeny. Arntekan arreylp lion-apeny.
Arneltyan arlkwertel ayen-penhel artelhew irrtyart-wety. Intelty-rnemarl alkerelerrew, aympelh-rnem arwerlk angkew, nantew pakey-akert akngerr-apeny, atwerrenty-warlarl anterrenty, akngerrarl atwerreyel-warl anterrenty.
Rernemap atanthenh kantyel, atneth-akertel-apeny. Alakenh rernem akngerr pwarrk anthew alkent 5-ew-atety.
Antyerl anyent atyetyart ikwer-rnem intelty-rnemew anenh, rap irrka intwer kwert-akertew-artey anenh. Angka Hebrew-they renh itnewem Abaddon, angka Greek-theyan itnewem Apollyon-arl. Itna yanh-atherrel ileyel, Altheney-angker Ingkerr.
Alakenh apmwa arrwekelenyan ayntem. Alerl-antey apmwa ingwer-atherr aynteyenh.
Antyerl ingwerel-anem terampet ikwerenh angkelh-angkelhelew. Anamerl-antey ingwerenty atha awew angkenharl. Ran apwert ilperr-ilperr ikwer-they angkenh, Akngey-itwelarl arrwekel ayntenh. Apwert renhan gold-el artew, rap rewely 4 atnyenew. Rewely ikwer-rnem-they apek ra angkenh.
Rap angkew antyerl terampet-akert ikwer, “Ilpay yanh-itwew Euphrates-itwew antyerl 4 aneyel, arertnewarl. Renh-rnem tyarlewanem!”
Antyerl 4 rernem mpwelhenh arlta ikwerew, Akngeyelantarl iterl-areyelew. Ra renh-rnem artwerelenh-tangkwel, rap renh-rnem alakenh ilenh, “Arnwarnelhenh-arey!” Arlta ikwerel, renh-rnemarl tyarlewewel, rernemap alhew, akngerr atweyew ipmew.
Athap altyerr-angkwarr-anem arew, artwa army-areny-rnem nantew-akert alhenh, akngerr innga. Nampan atha awew; 200,000,000-arlap ran. Artwa army-areny-rnemel atnyenew alkwert-rnem ayen-penh, arnelty artelheyew. Alkwert rernem rnter-rnter, blue one, yellow one. Nantew-rneman akapwert lion-apenyarl. Lherrm arrakert-they rlwemertnew, ikwakeng itntenh kwert yellow one.
<range>
Kanty rtnwem ahelengkw-rnem-apeny, tnhwaynteyew akngerr ipmew. Rtwem-rnemel rernem ingwer-rnem tnhwew ipmew. Nantew-rneman alhew apmer arrpanenh-warl, atweyew akngerr ipmew lherrmel kwertel-then.
<range>
Ingwer-rnemanap ilwey-angenharl, arrangkw-antey. Rernemap Akngey-warl angkeperrey-angenh, weth-rnem iteth-anteyarl anew-rneman, arrangkw. Rernem angkenh-antey inweng apmwernemew. Ya, rernemap kwenerrenh-antey ampwal apmwernemew, rernemarl mpwarewew gold-penhew, thilp-penhew, bronze-penhew, apwert-penhew, arwerl-penhew. Ampwal apmwernemel nthakenh arey-angenh, nthakenh awey-angenh, nthakenh alhey-angenh, arrangkw.
Rerneman apmwel-ayeth-antey anenh; ipmew ingwer-rnem atwenh, ingwer-rnem aylenh arntetyerreyew, mpwenyel alherlewenh, irrtyert-inenh ilek-ilek. Rernemap nyerrerrey-angenh, amperrngerremel angkey-angenh ingwer-rnemew, angkeperrey-angenh Akngey-warl-athek, arrangkw.
Atha arew antyerl alkenh ingwer-anem altyerr-angkwarr, irrwerl-theyarl atwarrenhey-alhew. Kwenpayel renh artew, arnkwel-apeny. Mpwelarrel akapwert-angkwarr amperelew. Inngerrarl itwern-apeny amparrkenh. Arlaw atherran rwa lherrm-apeny.
Rap pip ataperr antwerrkenh. Ingwerentyel arrwekel-antey pip renh arlpimpelew. Rarl rtney-alhew ahern-itwew, ingkety arraty-ampeny alay-itwewarl, ayleng-ampeny ahern artwerrety-itwew.
Rap atayel arlkenty iwew lion-apeny. Rarl arlkenty iwewel atha awew awely-awely angkenty-apeny. 7-inger ra angkew alakenh-anyem.
Awely-awely angkenty-penh, ayeng arrkernelhew, pip ineyew, angka ikwerenh ingkwerneyew ikwer-warl. Ingwerentyarlap angkewan irrwerl-they, “Menty ayntey! Angka ingkwerney-angenh, awely-awelyarl angkew 7-inger. Ingwerenty iley-angenh!”
Antyerl atyetyart rarl rtnenh alay-itwew ahern-itwew-then, rap irrwerlerrew itep arraty-angkwarr alker-warl-athek.
Rap angkew, “Awelhenh-arey ingkerrenh-antey! Akngey ran intem-antey aleth aneyel! Rap mpwarew alker, ahern, alay-then ilek-ilek. Innga atha ileyel, rarl aweyel-wety. Nthakenh ra arlengew-alenty mpwelhey-angenh, arrangkw!
Awank-akerr ra iterrew, “Nthakenh atha ilem ahern nhenhan, atharl mpwarewan?” Ranap akngerr iley-angenharl, rarl iterrenhan. Artwa angkakert-rnemant ilenhan ra. Aleyanap arrantherr ingkerrenhel iterl-areyenh, antyerl namp 7-elarl terampet ikwerenh angkelh-angkelheleyenhel.”
Irrkaty wethan angkew atyeng arrpemarl irrwerl-they, “Alha antyerl atyetyart ikwer-warl, alayelarl rtneyel-warl ahernel-then. Pip weth ineyew, rarl antwerrkeyel, pip arlpimp renh.”
Ayengap alhew antyerl ikwer-warl, pip ikwer ayerneyew. Rap angkew atyeng, “Nhanteyaw! Pip nhenh ina! Arlkwanem renh! Arrakert-itwew antemarn-apeny arwerl ankerr-penh-antey. Atnert akey-angkerarlap ran.”
Athap pip renh inemel arlkwew-anem, rarl ilanthew-angkwarr. Ya, inngarl antemarn-apeny arrkernew. Atharl arlkwew-penh, atnert ayenh akew.
Ingwerenty atyeng angkew, “Alha arrpemarl, angka Akngey-akert ileyew ingkerrenhew, rernemaw iterl-areyew, nthakenharl irreyenh ikwer-rnemew. Atyetyart ilkwernemew-then ila. Akngerr apmer arrpanenh-itwew ila; angka ingwerek-ingwer, irrpwerl-then, arlter-then, arrkay-then.”
Ingwerentyel ayenh anthew arwerl arlpenty arraty ruler-apeny measure-emeleyew-arelh. Rap angkew, “Arwerl nhenh ina. Alha, aylpenha Akngey-wenh tyaty ilkwewarl. Arwerl measure-emeleyew-arelh akngerr-inger arrerna tyaty ikwer-angkwarr, ntwaw iterl-areyew, warl ilek-apenyarlap ran. Arlpenty apek, rtwety apek. Measure-emela irrkaty-angkwarr apwert yanh amperneyew-arelh. Ingwer-rneman rtnenherreyel warl ikwer-itwew, nakemel Akngey-warl aylelherreyel. Arey renh-rnem count-emelemel. Akngerr apek, irrpetyap apek.
Yard yanhan aketh-ampenyan mentyarl, measure-emeley-angenh. Akngeyelan yard yanh anthew ingwer-rnemew, renh iterl-arey-angenh-rnemew. Ra anthew tawen Jerusalem-then ikwer-rnem, rernem atakeyew. Rernemap lthwemel alhaynterl-aneyenh apmer ikwer-itwew alkent 42-ew-atety.
Rernemarl apmer ikwerel aremerrey-alhenty, atha angkakert atherr ikwer-rnemew thweneyenh, angka arraty atyenh ilaynteyew. Ratherrap ilerl-aneyenh alkent 42-ew-atety, arnkwa apmwel aylpemel amperrngerremel.” Alakenh-anyem ra angkew atyeng.
Angkakert Akngey-wenh weth-atherr ratherr intem-antey rtnem Akngey-itwew. Ran atyetyart aneyel ahern ingkerrenh-angkwarr. Ratherran arwerl olive atherr-apeny, ampwal arlpenty weth atherr lherrm-angketyarr-apeny.
Ingwer-rneman ilkelhey-angenh ikwer-atherr artewenty. Ingwerenty apek iterrem, renh-atherr atweyew-arrpantey, kel rwa lherrm arrakert ikwer-atherr-they tyerrelhem, ywerrelhelemel atwem. Ingwerentyel renh-atherr irrwernem, ratherrap renh-rnem ilwerl-athenemarl.
Akngeyelan renh-atherr rlterrkelew, kwaty-then rntwey-angenheleyew. Ratherrarl angka Akngey-wenh ilerl-apaynteyenheng-arey, kwatyanap rntwey-angenh, arrangkw arrpemarl. Akngeyel renh-atherr rlterrkelew arrpemarl, kwaty apmweleyew, kwatyan arrnganem irreyew. Ratherr ilkelhentyelan, apmwa ilek-ilek thweneyenh ahern-warl.
Alkent 42-ew-atety ratherr alherl-aneyenh, ilerl-apaynteyew angka Akngey-wenh. Ikwer-penhan arraylenty anyent tyerrelhey-aynteyenh irrka irrkaty intwer ikwer-they, renh-atherr antwerrkeyew. Rap renh-atherr atweyenh ipmew-antey.
Rap ipma atherr iwerlelpeyenh iwerr ampep-itwew tawen ilkwa Jerusalem-itwew. Apmer ikwer-itwewan Jesus atwemel, arwerl iylpeyl-atherr-warl tywenew. Akngerrel apmer renh itnewem Sodom, Egypt-then. [Rernem iterl-areyel, artwa apmwernem anenh apmer ikwer-atherr-itwew awank-akerr.]
Ya, ipma ratherr ayntaynteyenh arlta irrpetyew-atety ingwepenh-ingwerel-anem. Akngerr-anem apetyeyenh apmer arrpanenh-they, angka ingwerek-ingwer angkemel – irrpwerl-then, arlter-then, arrkay-then. Rernemap ipma renh-atherrenh atwew-areyenh, ingwer-rnem-then artwereleyenh, akwernewerr.
Rernemarl renh-atherr arerl-aneyenhel, rernemap inkwerelhemel angkerrerl-aneyenh alakenh, “Mwerr wenh! Weth-atherr ipmanem! Ratherran pwarrk anthenh anewantherr, aleyan arrangkw-anemarl!” Rernemap akarr-akarrerreyenh, amern kwenty arlkweyew, ilek-ilek-then antherremel inkwerelhemel.
Rernem alakenh irreyenh arlta irrpetyew-atety ingwepenh-ingwerel-anem, ratherrarl ipmantey aynterl-anerl-aneyenh. Ikwer-penh Akngeyel ikwer-atherr rwarr anthew, ratherrap itetherrenhey-alpew-anem anamerl-antey, rtnenhey-alpew-anem. Akngerrel arew, rernemap apateyelpew atererremel.
Ratherr awew, ingwerenty atayel angkew ikwer-atherr irrwerl-they, “Apetyenh-atherr nhenh-warl!” Renh-atherr arlkarerreyel-rnemelan intwarew, ratherrarl irrwerl alpew kwenpay-angkwarr.
Ahernan artewenty innga arrewew-anem, iltep-iltewelhew ingweram-angkwarr. Warl ingwerentyaman aytnew ngkweltyerremel. Akngerr ilwernerrew, 7,000 innga. Ingwerenty iteth-anteyarl anew, atererrew innga, rernemap Akngey nakew.
Alakenh-anyem apmwa ingwer-anem aynteyenh. Alerl-antey apmwa anyent ingweran aynteyenh.
Antyerl ingwerel-anem terampet ikwerenh angkelh-angkelhelew. Ingwer-rneman atayel angkerrenh irrwerl alakenh: “Akngeyel Jesus Christ rlwanew. Rlengkan ratherr atyetyart ilkwanem anem ahern ingkerrew. Akngey ran atyetyart aneyenh arawerrng rlterrk-akert intem-antey!”
Ampwa alkenh weth-rnem 24 rernem anenh-antey Akngey-itwew arrwekel-ampenyel chair ikwerenh-rnem-wenh-itwew. Rernemap kwenerrew-anem, atnertel-ayeth ayntemel, nakemel Akngey alakenh:
“Akngeyay, Atyetyart Ilkwa Ingkerrenhew! Anantherr ngenh nakem! Nga arrwekeleny anenh, iteth-antey aneyel. Aleyan nga atyetyart ilkwa aneyel arawerrng rlterrk-akert apmer arrpanenhew!
Ingwer-rnem ngkweng awelhey-angenh-rnem rernem ahelerrenh ngkweng. Ngan ikwer-rnem ahelerrem-anem aley. Rlengkan arlta ntwa rlwanewarl, ipmernem itetheleyew, renh-rnem ayerneyew-anem anyentel-anyentel. Rlengkan ntwa ilek-ilek mwerr-angker anthem angkakert ngkwenh-rnemew, angka ngkwenharl ilenh awank-akerr. Rlengkan ntwa ilek-ilek mwerr-angker anthem ngkwenh-rnemew, akely-akelyew ilkwetyilkwew, rernemarl ngkweng mwanty-antey awelhenh. Aleyan nga awakelhem ingwer-rnemew, ngkwenh-rnemarl atwenhew ahern nhenh-itwew. Ntwap inngarl renh-rnem irrarlkemel atweyenh.” Alakenh-anyem ampwa alkenh weth-rnem 24 angkew.
Ikwer-penhan ingwerentyel arriwan altywerelew Akngey-wenh tyaty ilkwitwew irrwerl. Arriw-angkwarr athap arew box impen Akngey-wenh. [Apwert ilperr-ilperr atherr angka Akngey-wenh angka rlterrk-rnem-akert 10 ayntenharl box ikwer-itwew.] Atharl arew box impen, awely-awelyan arrkemel angkew, ahernan arrewew, aperrkwer aytnew irrwerl-they.
Ikwer-penhan ilengem ingwer-lkwer aremerrew tyak innga alker-itwew. Arelhanap ra, arelh anyent-anem alkerel anerl-anenty. Arnkwan ikwerenh itwern-apeny. Ra rtnew alkent-itwew. Akapwert-itwew ampwal mwekart-apeny mwerr-angker atyetyart-wenh antyarr 12-akert.
Arelh irrepern ra arntetyarl awelhewarl artnenh.
Athap arew, ilengem ingwer-lkwer aremerrew tyak innganem alker-itwew. Rtnwem ahelengkw-apeny rnter-rnter, ilkwa inngarlap ran, akapwert-rnem ampwal mwerr-angker 7 mwekart akely-apeny atyetyart-wenh-rnem-akert, rewely-rnem 10 arrpemarl.
Rap kanty-anem akngelhenh ingweram-angkwarr, antyarr-rnem iwemel kantyel alker-they ahern-warl. Rap rtney-alhew arrwekel-ampeny arelh-itwew, ampa akely rakemel arlkweyew.
Arelhel awey akely-anem atnyenew. Rtwemelanap nthakenh awey renh rakey-angenh. Ingwerentyelan renh inew anamerl-antey, akngeynemel Akngey-warl-athek chair ilkwa ikwerenh-warl-then. Renhanap Akngeyelarl rlwanew, aneyew atyetyart ilkwa ahern ingkerrew. Rarl ilkwerreyenhel, rap ingkerr arntarnt-areyenh arawerrng rlterrk-akertel.
Arelh ran irrtyert-anterrew ahern arlpaw-ampeny-warl. Apmer ikwer-itwew Akngeyel alalewew ikwer arrwekel-antey, ra aynteyew. Akngey ikwer mpwelhenh, renh arntarnt-areyew. Ra arntarnt-arenh alkent 42-ew-atety.
Ikwer-penhan irrwerl-areny-rnem atwerrenh-anem. Antyerl alkenh itnan Michael ra yerl-alhew antyerl ikwerenh-rnem-akert, rtnwem ilkwa renh atweyew antyerl apmwernem-then.
Michael ikwerenh-rnemelan rtnwem ilkwa antengelemel atwew ikwerenh-rnem-then artewenty, renh-rnem irrwerl-they irrentemel arleng intem-antey.
Ya, rernem rtnwem renh iwew kwenel-athek ahern-warl. Ran arrwekeleny weth, arrenty alkenh. Itna ingweran Satan. Ran irrtywalth, irrtywerl-amperney-angker ingkerr ahern-itwew, rernem apmwel-ayeth anaynteyew. Michael antyerl ikwerenh-rnem-akertel renh iwew kwenel-athek, antyerl apmwernem-then.
Atha awew ingwerenty arlkew atayel irrwerl-they alakenh: “Akngeyan Atyetyart Ilkwa Ingkerrew! Arawerrng rlterrk-akertel ra anenhantherrenh itethelem ipmewety. Rap arrernew Alerikw Jesus Christ atyetyart arrpemarl. Arrenty alkenh Satan rtnenh Akngey-itwel arrwekel-ampeny intem, ingwel itwernew, ayntarrp-ilemel Akngey-wenh-rnem irrtywerremel. Michael antyerl ikwerenh-rnem-akertelan renh irrentew intem-antey arawerrng rlterrk-akertel.
Akngey-wenh-rnem rernem arrenty Satan antengelew, Jesus Christ Akngey-wenh yep-yep akely ra katy ilwew ikwer-rnem, arrnga thelemel arwerl iylpeyl-atherr-itwew. Alakenh-anyem rernem arrenty Satan antengelew. Ingwer-rneman ilkelhenh, renh-rnem atweyew ipmew-antey. Akngey-wenh-rnemelan angka innga ikwerenh ilayntenh, ingwer-rnem-wety atererrey-angenh, arrangkw. Alakenh arrpemarl rernem arrenty Satan renh antengelew.
Alakenh-wety ayengan angkeyel arrewantherr irrwerl-areny, ‘Inkwerelhemel anaynteyew!’ Arrantherran ahern-areny-rnem alay-areny-rnem, arrewantherr rlterrkarl aynteyenh. Arrentyan atwarrew, aney-alpeyew arrewantherr-itwel! Aleyan ra ahelerreyel artewenty innga, rarl iterl-areyel, arlta ra arrer-anem irreyel, Akngeyelarl ikwer arrngerteweyenh intem-antey.”
Rtnwemelarl iterl-arew, Michael-elarl renh iwew ahern-warl, rap iterrew, “Ya, atha arelh weth alwerney-anem awey akely-akert.”
Ingwerentyelanap arelh renh anthew aympelh atherr irrety ilkwepenh, raw arlkerelerreyew-awaty apmer ikwerenh-warl arlpaw-warl, Akngeyelarl ikwer alalewew arrwekel-antey. Apmer ikwer-itwew rtnwemel nthakenh renh antwerrkey-angenh, arrangkw. Akngeyelap arelh renh arntarnt-arenh alkent 42-ew-atety.
Rtnweman ikwer arrkernelhenh arrngerteweyew, mwerr-antey alkerelerrewerr. Ra rlkwetherrew kwaty akngerr arrakert-they atnyerr-apeny, arelh renh akngeyew kwatyel.
Ahernanap altywererrew, renh alpemeleyew. Kwaty rtnwemelarl rlkwetherrew, ra altywer ikwer-angkwarr thelhelew, arelh ra mwerr-antey alkerelerrew-anem.
Rtnweman ahelerrew arelh ikwer artewenty innga, rap alhew, ampa ikwerenh-rnem atweyew, ampa aperlikw-rnem-then. Rerneman Akngey-wenh angkewarl awelheyel-rnem, intem-antey angka Jesus-akert ileyel-rnem ingwer-rnemew.
Rtnwem ran rtnenh arlwerengel kwaty alay impalth-itwew.
Ikwer-penhan atha arraylenty arew, kwaty alay-theyarl tyerrelhey-ayntew. Ranap ingwer-lkwer-anem, rewely 10-akert akapwert 7-akert. Rewely 10 ikwer-rnem-itwew ampwal mwerr-angker mwekart atyetyart-wenh akely-apeny gold-penh 10 ayntew. Akapwert 7-itwew ingwerentyel ingkwernew angka apmwernem, Akngey arrkentelhelemel.
Arlka atnwenth lipert-apeny, ingkelthel arlpenty arreylp-akert bear-apeny. Arrakertan lion-apenyarl. Rtnweman angkew, “Atha ngenh rlwanem, atyeng warrkerreyew. Atha arawerrng atyenh ngenh anthem, ngenh rlterrkeleyew, ntwa ilek-ilek mpwareyew. Ngap anem chair ilkwa atyenhel, ngap atyetyart anem ahern-itwew.”
Athap arraylenty renh arenh, akapwert 7-akert. Akapwert anyentan kwerrm-akert, ayengap iterrew, “Ingwerentyelan renh ipmew atwew arrwekel-antey! Rap itetherrenhey-alpew!” Ingkerrel ahern-itwew arew, rernem apaterrew, awelhemel ikwerant-anem, rarl angkenhew.
Rernemap ingkerrenh kwenerrenh apal rtnwem ikwer, Akngey inngewarl-arrpantey, rtnwemel rarl arawerrng ikwerenh anthew arraylenty ikwer. Rernem ingkerr kwenerrenh arraylenty ikwer-warl, nakemel alakenh, “Arraylenty ran rlterrk inngey ingwer-rnem-angkwarrarl! Nthakenh renh ingwerentyel ipmew atwey-angenh!”
Akngeyelan arraylenty tyarlewew, ra nakelhemel angkeyew, Akngey renh-then arrkentelheleyew. Rap renh tyarlewew, ra aneyew atyetyart alkent 42-ew-atety.
Arraylenty rap Akngey arrkentelhelew artewenty innga itna ikwerenh-then. Rap Akngey-rnem arrkentelhelew, ikwerel-arleng aneyel-rnem-then. Rap apmer Akngey-wenh arrkentelhelew, rernemarl ingkerr anew-anenh irrwerl.
Ikwer-theyan arraylenty alhew, atwerreyew akngerr Akngey-wenh-rnem-then alkent 42-ew-atety, renh-rnem antengeleyew-atety. Nthakenh ingwerentyel artwereley-angenh. Akngeyel ran artwereley-angenh arrpemarl. Arraylenty ra atyetyart ingkerrenhew anenh; apmer arrpanenh-arenyew, angka arrpanenhew, irrpwerlew, arlterew, arrkayew-then.
Ingkerr ahern-areny-rnem ikwer kwenerremel nakeyenh. Ingwerentyanap irrpetyap ikwer awelhey-angenh aneyenh, renh nakey-angenh. Itnan ikwer-rnem-wenh Akngey-wenh yep-yep akelyel ingkwernew arrwekel-antey pwek impen ikwerenh-warl, rernemaw intem-antey aneyew. Ra itnernem ingkwernew awank-akerr, rarl alker-then ahern-then mpwarey-angenhel-antey. Artwa ahelengkw-rnemel yep-yep akely atwew ipmew.
Iylpakert arrantherr! Awelhenh-arey mwanty!
Akngeyel rlwanew akngerr ikwerenh-rnem, renh-rnem akwerneyew tyayl-warl. Inngarl ingwer-rnemel renh-rnem antwerrkem, akwernemel tyayl-warl. Akngeyel rlwanew akngerr ikwerenh-rnem, renh-rnem atweyew ipmew nayp arlpentyel. Inngarl ingwer-rnemel renh-rnem akep-akalthem ipmew. Alakenh-wety Akngey-wenh-rnem ikwer awelh-aynteyew, ipmelhey-angenh.
Ikwer-they atha arraylenty ingwer-anem arew, ahern-theyarl tyerrelhew. Ingwer-lkwerarlap ran, rewely atherr-akert, yep-yep akely apeny. Rap atayel arlkenh rtnwem weth-apeny.
Ra warrkerrenh arawerrng ilkwakert arraylenty wethew alay-arenyew. Arawerrng ilkwakertel ra ahern-itwew pwerep-anthenh, kwenerr-aynteyew arraylenty alay-arenyew, renh nakemel. Arraylenty alay-areny ranap kwerrm ilkwakert weth akapwert-itwew.
Rewely atherr-akert wethel tyakel ilek-ilek mpwarenh, akngerrel araynteyew, rernemaw apateyew. Ra ilew, rwa apetyeyew alker-they ahern-warl. Inngarlap alakenh irrewan.
Akngeyel renh tyarlewew, alakenh irreyew, arraylenty alay-arenyew warrkerreyew. Alakenhap ra ahern-areny akngerr irrtywerl-ampernew, rernemaw iterreyew, alay-arenyan atyetyart ilkwew-arrpantey. Rap renh-rnem ilew, “Arwerl ilkwa arrpeyew-arrpantey, arraylenty weth alay-areny-apeny, kwerrm nayp arlpenty-penh-akert!” Rernemap arwerl mpwarew rapeny.
Akngeyel ran tyarlewew rewely atherr-akert weth, arwerl renh itetheleyew, ra angkeyew-anem. Rap renh-rnem ilew, “Arwerl ikwer-warl kwenerrenh-arey nakemel!” Ingwerentyanap apek kwenerrey-angenh arwerl ikwer. Kel arwerl ra ingwer-rnem ilanthenh, renh-rnem atweyew ipmew.
Rewely atherr-akertel warrkenh ikwerenh-rnem ilenh, ingkerrenh-antey amperneyew pwelek-apeny itep arraty-angkwarr, rlwewarl apek. Renh-rneman alakenh ampernem; ilkwernem, akely-rnem, man akngerr-akert-rnem, man-weny-rnem, warrkenh-rnem, atyetyart-rnem-akerr.
Rernemanap apek anthelhey-angenh, renh-rnem amperneyew. Kel nthakenh rernem ampwal-rnem payemeley-angenh, tharlemeley-angenh anem, arrangkw. Arraylenty arrwekeleny rewely 10-akert weth ra itna anyent-akert anenh. Itna ran namp ikwerenh ileyel. Kwerrm ampernentyan, itna arlkitwew ayntem intem-antey.
Artwa angwenhelap namp renh iterl-arem? Tyak inngant, iterreyew arraty. Nampa artwewenharlap ran, 666-arl.
Ikwer-penhan atha arew ingwer-angkwarr-anem altyerr-itwew. Akngey-wenh yep-yep akelyan rtnenh apwert ilkwa irrwerl-itwew. Apwertan itna Zion. Akngerr innga rtnenherrenh yep-yep ikwer-itwel, 144,000. Rlwitwew ingwerentyelan ingkwernew yep-yep-wenh itna Akngey ikwerenh-wenh itnethen.
Athap ingwerenty angkerl-anenty-anem awew irrwerl-they. Atayel inngarlap ra angkewan, kwaty atnyerr-apeny, awely-awely ilkwapeny apek. Ayengan iterrew, “Mwerr-angker! Akngerr arrkenterrenty-apeny ampwal ketay-apeny!”
144,000 weth-rnem ingkerrenh rtnenherrenh Akngey-wenh chair mwerr-angker atyetyart-wenh arrwekel-ampeny-itwew, atnwenth iteth weth-rnem 4-then ampwa alkenh 24 weth-rnem-akerr. 144,000 rernem aylelherrew arreyn ngwampeny ingwer-lkwer. Nthakenh ingwerentyak arreynew akaltyerrey-angenh. Rernemant iterl-arenh arreyn renh. Akngeyel renh-rnem ingwer-rnem-then ayerrpelew, ahern-they angkep akngey-alpeyew. Ra renh-rnem payemelew arrnga Jesus-wenhel.
144,000 rerneman ingwer-itwew ayntey-angenh anewarterrem-apeny. Rernemap irrtywerrey-angenh, apmwel-ayeth aney-angenh, arrangkw. Nthakenh ingwerentyakel renh-rnem ayntarrpeley-angenh. Rernemap yep-yep akely renh apentenh ingweram-angkwarr. Akngeyel renh-rnem akngakew ahern-areny-rnem-they. Rap payemelemel ayerrpelew ikwer-atherr, Akngeyew yep-yep akelyew-then, rernemap mwerr-angkerarl ikwer-atherr-wenh, intem-antey.
<range>
Ikwer-penh atha arew antyerl ingwer-anem alkerelerrenharl. Ra angka mwerr-angker ilerl-apenh, angka rarl arraty innga intem-antey aneyel. Rap ahern-areny-rnemew ilerl-apenh, akngerr apmer arrpanenh-arenyew; angka ingwerek-ingwer angkeyel-rnemew, irrpwerlew-then arlterew-then arrkayew-then.
Rap atayel innga angkenh, “Akngey nakenh-arey arrantherr, kwenerremel, mwanty-antey awelhemel mwerr antwemel! Rlengkan ra apetyeyel, ingkerr rnkerneyew ayernemel. Renh nakenh-arey! Rant anyentel ilek-ilek mpwarew; alker, ahern, alay, kwaty alapeltharr-then!”
Antyerl namp 2-anem atha arew alkerelerrenharl. Rap angkerl-apenh, “Awelhenh-arey! Tawen Babylon-areny-rneman apmwa innga, rernemap ingkerr apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem ilenh, 'Mwerr arrantherr apmwangkwarr mpweny aynteyew ingwer-rnem-then.' Aleyan rernem arrangkw-anem ywerrelhelew. Ilek-ilek aytnew, apmer ra arlpaw-anem aynteyelpew. Tawen ilkwa weth Babylon arrangkw-anem!”
Ikwer-penhan atha antyerl namp 3-anem arew alkerelerrenharl. Atayel ra angkerl-apenh, “Pwertay! Akngeyan aley ahelerreyel-anem weth-rnemew, kwenerreyelarlew arraylenty wethew, arwerl wethew-then rapenyew-then. Akngey ran ahelerreyel ikwer-rnem, rernemarl anthelhew, rlwa amperneyew, itep apek. Ya, ra ahelerreyenh inngarl ikwer-rnem, renh-rnem iwemel rwewarl kwert ikwakeng-warl. Rernemap pwarrkerreyenh artnemel artewenty. Antyerl Akngey-wenh-rnemel yep-yep akelyel-then rernem aytareyenh, rernemarl pwarrk artneyenh.
<range>
Kwertan rwa ikwer-they intemarl arlwar anaynteyenh. Arltel ingwel-then rernem intem-antey artnayntem pwarrk. Nthakenh ltyerrey-angenh, ankwayntey-angenh, arrangkw. Alakenhaym aynteyenh ikwer-rnem, rernemarl kwenerrenh arraylenty ikwer arwerl wethew-then rapenyew-then, rernemarl anthelhew, renh-rnem itna ikwerenh-akert amperneyew.”
Alakenh-wety Akngey-wenh-rneman ipmelhey-angenh anaynteyew, rernemarl ikwer awelh-ayntem, Jesus renh intem apent-ayntemel.
Ingwerenty-anem atha awew, irrwerl-they angkerl-anenty, “Alakenh ingkwerna pip-warl! ‘Ingwer-rnem Jesus-arl apentenh-rnem, rernem iteth-tangkwel anenh ahern-itwew, rernemap ilwew-anem. Aleyanap rernem iteth aneyel inkwerelhemel!’” Inweng Akngey-wenhel ran awew, rap tyernew, “Ya innga! Akngeyel iterl-areyel, rernem artewenty ikwer warrkerrenh. Rernem ltyerremel ikwer-itwel aney-alpeyenh intem-antey.”
Ikwer-they atha irrwerl itnywenew. Athap anyent ingweran arew, Artwa Inngarl Akngey-wenh-apeny-anem, anenharl kwenpay arlter-itwew. Akapwert-itwewan ampwal mwekart-apeny atyetyart-wenh gold-penh. Itepelan ra nayp arlpenty amper-amper antwerrkew, arreylp innga.
Antyerl ingwer-anem tyerrelhenhey-alhew Akngey-wenh tyaty ilkwethey irrwerl. Rap atayel arlkew, wetharl anenhew kwenpayel, “Nayp ngkwenh ina! Amern weytan ampeng-anem ahern-itwew. Alheyew akemel ingkerr akarrelemel.”
Rap amern akew, antyerlel ilew-angkwarrarl. Nayp ikwerenhel ra anamerl-antey akew, akarrelew amern weyt-rnem. Amern weyt picture talk-arlap ran, akngerr-apeny.
Antyerl ingwer-anem tyerrelhenhey-alhew Akngey-wenh tyaty ilkwethey. Rap antwerrkew nayp arreylp arlpenty amper-amper arrpemarl.
Atha antyerl ingwer-anemarl arew, rwarl arntarnt-arenh, apwert ilperr-ilperr-itwewarl ampenh. Apwert ikwer-they ra anperl-alhew, atayel arlkenhew antyerl nayp-akertew, “Nayp ngkwenh ina! Amern grapes-an ampeng-anem ahern-itwew. Alheyew akemel ingkerr akarrelemel.”
Rap alhew akeyew, antyerlel ilew-angkwarrarl. Nayp ikwerenhel ra anamerl-antey akew, akarrelew amern grapes-rnem. Rap iwew irrka ilkwewarl, ingketyel-anem lthwaynteyew. Grapes picture talk-arlap ran. Ran akngerr-apeny, weth Akngeyew awelhey-angenh-rnem-apeny. Ran ahelerreyel innganem ikwer-rnem.
Irrka ra Jerusalem arrer-apeny. Rernem grapes lthwenh ikwer-itwew. Grapes-penh akarr thelheley-angenharl, arrangkw. Arrngarl raw! Arrnga ran ankalhenh ilpay intwer-itwew-apeny, nantew-wenh akapwertew-atety. Rap ankalhenh arleng-alenty, 300 kilometre-ew-atety.
Ikwer-theyan tyak ilkwa ingwer-lkwer-anem aremerrew alker-itwew. Athap apatemel itnyweneyelpew, antyerl-rnem 7 arew-anem apmwa anthey-angker-rnem. Akngeyan ahelerreyel innga apmwernemew, rap anthew arawerrng 7 antyerl ikwer-rnem, antheyew apmwernem akngerrew. Apmwarl ipmelheyelpeyenh-anem. Akngey ran ahelerrey-angenh-anem, arrangkw-anem.
Athap arew glass-apeny-anem, ayntenharl arlperrty irlwart innga kwaty-apeny, alay ilkwapeny. Kwaty alay ra amparrkenh rwa amperl-anenty-apeny. Akngerr innga rtnenherrenh alay impalth-itwew, weth-rnem rlterrkarl anew-rnem arraylenty weth-angkwarr, kwaty alay-they tyerrelhewarl. Rernem renh antengelew, kwenerrey-angenh ikwer. Ampwal weth rapeny apwert-penharl mpwarew, ikwer rernem kwenerrey-angenh arrpemarl. Namp ikwerenh atnyeney-angenh rlwitwew itep-itwew-then, arrangkw, 666 wethey. Akngeyelan renh-rnem anthew ampwal ketay-apeny-rnem-anem.
Rernemap aylelherrenh Moses-wenh arreyn weth, angkakert Akngey-wenh awank-akerrarl anenh. Arreyn ingweran yep-yep akely-wenh rernem aylelherrenh arrpemarl alakenh: “Akngey ngant anyent rlterrk arawerrng ilkwakert. Ngan Atyetyart Ilkwa Ingkerrenhew. Ilek-ilek mwerr-angker mpwaremel, intem-antey arraty-angkwarr mpwarem. Ngan atyetyart ilkwa aneyel apmer arrpanenhew!
Ingkerrenhel nakemer mwerr-angkwarr, itna ngkwenh mwerr antwemel. Ngant anyent mwerr-angker inngan. Ngkweng mwanty awelhem, ngkweng-warl-athek mwanty ilelhemel. Akngerr apmer arrpanenh-arenyel areyenh, ntwarl arraty-angkwarr mpwarem intem, rernemap arleng-they apeyarr-alheyenh, ngkweng-warl-athek kwenerreyew.”
Ikwer-they atha irrwerl itnywenew arrpemarl. Akngey-wenh tyaty ilkwa rtnenh, arriwan altywerarl. Kwenan rtnenh kalikw impen Ingkart-wenh, Akngey rarl ikwer-itwew aneyel.
Tyaty ilkwa ikwer-they antyerl weth-rnem 7 tyerrelhew, apmwa anthey-angker-rnem. Rernem arnkwa arlpenty-akert arlter innga. Arnelty-angkwarr ikwer-rnem-itwew pilt gold-penh amparrkew.
Atnwenth 4 iteth weth-rnem rtnenh-antey. Anyentelan irrkwa akely-rnem 7 gold-penh anthew antyerl 7 weth-rnemew apmwa anthey-angker-rnemew. Akngeyelan ngkwarl wayn-apeny-anem thelew irrkwa 7 ikwer-rnem-warl. Alakenh ra ahel inngarl irrewan. Rarlap ran, intemarl aneyel, rap ahelerrem innga akngerr apmwernemew.
Kwert ilkwa tyerrelhew tyaty ilkwa ikwer-they, Akngey rarl anenh arawerrng ilkwakert. Nthakenh ingwerentyan aylpey-angenh tyaty-warl kwert-wety, arrangkw-antey. Alerl-antey ingwer-ingwerant rernem aylpayntem. Antyerl 7 weth-rnem-tangkwel ipmelhem, apmwarl anthem-penh.
Ikwer-theyan atha awew, ingwerenty arlkenharl atayel innga tyaty ilkwitwew. Rap angkew antyerl 7 weth-rnemew, “Alhenh-arey arrantherr! Irrkwa 7 akngenh-arey wayn-apeny-akert. Thelenh-arey-anem ahern-warl! Alakenhan akngerr ahern-areny-rnemel iterl-arem, ayengarl ahelerrem innganem ikwer-rnem!”
Antyerl namp 1-tangkwel alhew, theleyew irrkwa ikwerenh-they ahern-warl. Anamerl-antey akngerr-anem arntetyerreyelpew, tywen apmwa akngerr-akert pwarrkerremel. Rerneman akngerr weth-rnem namp arraylenty weth-wenh-akert. Kwerrman rernem atnyenew arlkitwew namp-akert. Rernemap kwenerrem ampwal rapeny-warl apwert-penh-warl.
Antyerl namp 2-anemarl alhew, theleyew irrkwa ikwerenh-they kwaty alay-warl. Anamerl-antey alay arrnganem irreyelpew, rap ikwakeng inngarl intenharl, arrnga ra ipmewenh. Ilek-ilek kwaty alayel anenharl ilwernerrew.
Antyerl namp 3-anemarl alhew, theleyew irrkwa ikwerenh-they ilpay-rnem-warl ngenty-rnem-warl-then. Anamerl-antey kwaty arrnganem irreyelpew.
Antyerl ingweran angkew-anem. Ran kwaty ingkerrenh ahern-itwew arntarnt-arey-angker anenh. Atha renh awew, Akngeyew alakenh angkenty, “Akngeyay, ngan arrwekeleny anenh, ahern nhenharl arnwarney-angenhel-antey. Iteth nga aneyel, iteth nga anayntem intem-antey. Ntwa anyentel mwerr-angker mpwarem, arraty ingkerrew mpwarem. Apmwernemewan nga awakelhew.
Apmwa weth-rnemelan Akngey-wenh-rnem atwew ipmew artwa angkakert ikwerenh-rnem-then arrngew-antey. Alakenhan ntwa renh-rnem arrnganem anthew, rernem antyweyew. Arraty-angkwarr ntwarl alakenh mpwarew!”
Athan ingwerenty-anem awew arlkewarl. Ra rtnenh apwert ilperr-ilperr-itwew, kwert mwerr-angkerarl arlwar anem-itwew. Apwert ra ayntenh arrwekel-ampeny chair mwerr-angker Akngey-wenh-itwew. “Ya, Ingkart Akngey! Ngan Atyetyart Ilkwa Ingkerrenhew! Ntwa apmwerneman atwem! Alakenh-anyem ntwa apmelerr mwerr-angkwarr mpwarem, intem-antey arraty-angkwarr iterremel!”
Antyerl namp 4-anemarl alhew, theleyew irrkwa ikwerenh-they itwern-warl. Anamerl-antey itwern rwenp innganem irreyelpew. Akngeyel ilew, ingkerrenh amperneyew, renh-rnemap ipmew atwey-angenh.
Rerneman ahelerrew innga, rwitwew ampemel. Rernemap Akngey apmwarl antwenh arrarletyel iltemel, rarl ilek-ilek apmwa tyarlewenh. Rernemanap angkeperrey-angenh ikwer-warl, renh mwerr antwey-angenh, renh nakey-angenh, arrangkw.
Antyerl namp 5-anemarl alhew, theleyew irrkwa ikwerenh-they chair arraylenty weth-wenh-warl. Chair ikwer-itwew arraylenty ra anem atyetyart ilkwa akngerrew. Apmeranap ikwerenh atemwengk-anem irreyelpew. Akngerran ikwerenh-rnem pwarrkerrenh artewentyel. Aleny rernem akwarlkelhenh pwarrk.
Rernem ahelerremel Akngeyan apmwa antwenh-antey, tywen-rnemarl pwarrkerrenh-antey. Rernemap angkeperrey-angenh-antey ikwer-warl-athek, apmwarl mpwarenh-penh, arrangkw.
Antyerl namp 6-anemarl alhew, theleyew irrkwa ikwerenh-they ilpay ilkwewarl itna Euphrates. Anamerl-antey kwaty ankalhey-angenh irreyelpew, arlwereng-anem artwerrety irreyelpew. Akngeyelan alakenh mpwarew, artwa atyetyart ilkwernemaw ahern artwerrety-angkwarran alheyew artwa army-areny-rnem-akert ikwer-angkwarr akngerrakw-they.
Atha inweng apmwernem irrpety-anem arew, perak-rnem-apeny rerneman. Ingweran tyerrelhew rtnwem weth-wenh arrakert-they, ingweran arraylenty weth-wenh arrakert-they, ingweran artwa angkakert-wenh arrakert-theyarl, wetharl irrtywerremel ilenh.
Inweng apmwernemel ilek-ilek mpwarenh arawerrng rlterrk-akertel. Rernemap alhew apmer arrpanenh-warl ahern-itwew, atyetyart-rnem arlweleyew, rernemaw atwerreyew Akngey-then. Akngey ranap renh-rnem antengeleyenh ingkerr.
Jesus rantey angkew-anem, “Awelhenh-arey arrantherr! Ayengan apetyeyenh anyelkelan, artwa irrtyert-awarr-apeny kwenyel! Ingwerenty apek atyek mpwelhem, arntarnt-arelhemel atyeng, rap inkwerelhem. Ra arnkwakert-apenyan mpwelhem, nyerrerrey-angenhel. Ingwerentyanap arnkweweny-apenyarl anerl-aneyenh, ingwer-rnemel renh-rnem arerl-aneyenh.”
Ikwer-penhan inweng apmwerneman irrpety perak-apeny rernem arlkew atyetyart-rnemew army-areny-rnemew-then. Rernem renh-rnem ilanthew, akarr-akarrerreyew apmer anyent-itwew. Angka Hebrew-el apmer itna Armageddon.
Antyerl namp 7-anemarl alhew, theleyew irrkwa ikwerenh-they alker-warl. Anamerl-antey ingwerentyan atayel arlkew Akngey-wenh chair ilkwa mwerr-angker-they tyaty ilkwitwew alakenh, “Kel-antey! Ipmelhew-anem!”
Awely-awely-anem arrkew, atayel angkemel. Ahern arrewew artewenty innga, iltewelhew-anem. Ranap aleyant arrewew alakenh, ingwerentyelarl alakenh arey-angenh-antey.
Tawen ilkwa Babylon atakelhew, apwert-rneman arlperrty ayntew. Tawen-rnem irrpety-anem ikwer-itwew aynteyelpew. Tawen ingwer-rnem-then apmer arrpanenh-itwew rerneman atakelhew arrpemarl. Akngeyel iterl-arew, akngerr apmer ikwer-areny-rneman apmwangkwarr anenh, rap ahelerrew artewenty innga ikwer-rnem, renh-rnem ilwerl-athenew ipmew.
Ahernan arrewenharl, akwerlp akely-rnem ampep-itwew alay-itwew rernem ingkerrenh aylperl-alhew-anem kwaty-warl ywerremel. Apwert ingkerr ywerrerl-alhew.
Aperrkwer-rnem-anem aytnew alker irrwerl-they, awerr innga ayen-apeny. Ingkerrenhel atwew artwethen arelh-then, pwarrk ilkwa anthemel. Rernem ywarn iterrew, nthakenh irrem. Akngeyan rernem apmwa antwenh-antey, rarl renh-rnem alakenh atwew.
Antyerl 7 weth-rnem rernem rtnenh-antey, irrkwa arltwernem antwerrkenh. Ingweran apetyew atyeng-warl, rap angkew, “Apetya atyeng-angkwarr! Atha ngkweng lwewarrerneyew arelh apmwa innga. Akngeyel renh ipmew atweyenh. Ran ilem tawen ilkwa Babylon, wetharl rtneyel ilpay kwaty-akert akngerr-itwew. Arelh ra ayntem apmwangkwarr artwa akngerr-itwew apmer arrpanenh-itwew, man ineyew.
Atyetyart ilkwernem apmer arrpanenh-they apetyenh, ayntaynteyew ikwer-itwew, rernemap apmwerrew rapeny-anem. Rernem apmwa anthelp-anthew arntety-apeny, akngerr ingkerr apmer arrpanenhel apmwerrew-anem. Rernemap ilkelhew, alakenh irreyew intem-antey, wetharl ngkwarl antywenty-apeny.”
Ikwer-penhan Inweng Akngey-wenh-anem atyeng-warl aylpenhey-alhew. Antyerl irrkaty ra ayenh akngew apmer artwerrety-ampeny-warl-anem. Apmer ikwer-itwew atha arelh arey-alhew, irrwerl anerl-anenty arraylenty rnter-rnter-itwew. Ranap akapwert 7-akert, rewely 10-akert. Arlkitwew angka apmwernem arlperrty ingkwernew, Akngey arrkentelhelemel.
Arelh ra arnkwa mwerr-angker rnter-rnter-akert. Rap atnyenew apwert ilek-ilek mwerr-angker, nikeleth iylpew-arelh-then gold-penh. Irrkwa ra antwerrkenh, gold-penh. Irrkwa ikwer-itwew ilek-ilek apmwa ingkerr, rarl mpwarenh. Artwa akngerr-itwew ra aynterl-apenh.
Ingwerentyel itna ingkwernew rlwewarl. Itna arlpentyarlap ran, alakenhap aynteyel: “Ayengan tawen ilkwa Babylon. Weth-rnemel akngerr-itwelarl aynterl-apem, rernemap ayenh amey antwem. Ilek-ilek apmwel-then ayenh amey antwem arrpemarl.” Itna ranap arrngertelengkw-tangkwel aynteyel, nthakenh iterl-arey-angenh-anem.
Atha arew, arelh ran ngkwarl antywenty-penh-apeny anenh, terangk. Ran Akngey-wenh-rnem intem-antey ipmew atwenh, angka Jesus-akertarl ilerl-apenh-rnem. Renh-rnem ipmew atwenty-penh rap inkwerelhenh-anem, terangk-apeny. Atharl renh arew, ayengap apateyelpew.
Antyerl angkew atyeng, “Ilekew nga apateyelpew? Ntwa arelh weth iterl-areyel arraylenty-then, akapwert 7-akert-itwew rewely 10-akert? Arelhan ikwer-itwel aneyel. Atha ngenh ilem, ntwa arraty-angkwarr iterl-areyew-awaty. Atha ngkweng anayntelem-anem arrngertelengkw renh.
Arraylenty ntwarl ngwamp arew, ra iteth-tangkwel anenh, rap ilwew-anem. Ntwa iterl-areyel, Akngeyel itnernem ikwerenh-rnem-wenh ingkwernew pwek ikwerenh-warl awank-akerr, ahern-then alker-thenarl arnwarney-angenhel-antey. Itna ingwer-rneman arrangkwarl. Rernemarl arem arraylenty renh, rernemap apateyelpeyenh. Rernem angkerreyenh, ‘Pwertay! Arraylenty yanhan iteth-tangkwel anenh, rap ilwew-anem. Iteth-anemarl irreyenh!’ Alakenh rernem angkerreyenh. Ingwer-ingweran ra irrka intwer ikwer-they tyerrelheyenh arrpemarl angkep-antey. Akngeyelanap arraylenty renh ywerrelheleyenh intem-antey-anemarl.” Alakenhan antyerl angkew atyeng.
Antyerl ra atyeng ilew arrpemarl arraylenty renh. “Nga apek tyak innga, ntwap iterl-arem angka nhenh? Akapwert 7-el ilem apwert 7, arelh rarl aneyelel.
Akapwert-rnemel ilem atyetyart 7 arrpemarl. Atyetyart 5-an kel-antey ahaperrew, ingweran atyetyart aneyel-antey apmer ikwerenh-itwew, ingweran alerl-anteyarl apetyem. Rarl atyetyart irreyenhel, ranap arleng-alenty aney-angenh, arrangkw.
Atyetyart ingwer-anem aremerreyenh, atyetyart 7 ingwer weth-rnem-apeny, atyetyart namp 8. Ran arraylenty weth, rarl iteth-tangkwel anenh, ilwew-anem ra. Akngeyelan renh ywerrelheleyenh.” Alakenhan antyerl angkew atyeng.
Antyerl ra ilenh-antey atyeng arraylenty renh. “Rewely 10, ntwarl ngwamp arew, rernem ilem artwa ilkwa 10 ingwer-rnem. Rerneman atyetyart aney-angenh-antey, alerl-antey. Ingwer-ingweran rernem anerl-aneyenh arraylenty weth-itwew, atyetyart anerl-aneyenh ingkerrew. Rernemap atyetyart arleng-alenty aney-angenh, arrangkw. Atyetyart rernem aneyenh arwa arrer-antey angath-antey, arlta anyentelant apek.
Rernem iterreyenh, anyenterreyew, arraylenty renh rlterrkeleyew alakenh angkemel, ‘Ngant anyent atyetyart ilkwanem aneyew ingkerrew. Anantherran ngkwengant awelhemarl.’
Atyetyart 10-then arraylenty weth-then rernem alheyenh, yep-yep akely-then atwerreyew. Nthakenh yep-yep akely renh atwey-angenh ipmew, arrangkw. Rant anyent Ingkart, Atyetyart Ilkwa Ingkerrenhew aneyel. Rap renh-rnem ywerrelheleyenh. Ikwerenh-rneman ikwer-itwel anerl-aneyenh. Ra renh-rnem rlwanew arrwekel-antey, rernemap renh apentem arraty-angkwarr.” Alakenhan antyerl angkew atyeng.
Antyerlel atyeng ilew arelh apmwa renh. “Altyerr-angkwarr ntwa arew apmer ilkwa, wetharl rtneyel ilpay kwaty-akert arrpanenh-itwew. Ilpay rernem ilem apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem, angka ingwerek-ingwerarl angkemel.
Ntwa iterl-areyel rewely 10 weth-rnem, atyetyart ilkwa 10 weth-rnem ilemarl? Kel Akngey ran atyetyart 10 weth-rnem arnew, rernem pweyterreyew, arraylenty rlterrkeleyew arawerrng ilkwakertel. Arrwekel Akngey iterrew arrpemarl, alakenharl aynteyenh. Arraylenty ran atyetyart aneyenh arlta ikwerew-atety, Akngeyelarl renh ywerrelheleyenhel. Alakenhan inngarl aynteyenh, Akngeyelarl ilew arrwekel-antey. Rernem pweyterreyenh arraylenty ikwer-warl, rernemap ilkelhey-angenh irreyenh arelh apmwa wethew, rernemap arlekerremel renh atweyenh. Ilek-ilek mwerr-angker ineyenh ikwer-they, arnkwa lhelp-lhelemel. Nyerr-anthenty-penh rernem tyelk arlkweyenh, arlka iwemel rwewarl.
<range>
Arelh apmwa, ntwarl arew, ra ilem apmer ilkwa weth. Apmer ikwerew-artey ra atyetyart aneyenh atyetyart ingkerrew ahern-itwew.” Alakenhan antyerl atyeng angkew.
Ikwer-theyan atha antyerl ingwer-anem arew altyerr-angkwarr, irrwerl-theyarl atwarrenhey-alpenh arawerrng rlterrk-akert. Ran artewenty amparrkenh, lyenenty arrtyernew apmer arrpanenh-itwew ahern-itwew.
Ra atayel arlkenh alakenh: “Arrangkw-anem! Tawen ilkwa Babylon atakelhew! Apmwamwan-rnemant aneyel-anem yanh-itwew: inweng apmwerneman, arrenty-rnem, antyiper-rnem, thip irrpwerl-rnem-then. Moses-an angkew, ‘Yanh-lkwer arlkwey-angenh!’
Apmer yanh-areny-rnemel intem apmwel-ayeth mpwarenh. Rernemap ayntenh ingwer-rnem-itwew apmwangkwarr. Akngerr apmer arrpanenh-areny alhenh apmer yanh-warl, renh-rnem iwarrerneyew, apentemel apmwangkwarr. Atyetyart apmer arrpanenh-areny alhenh apmer yanh-warl, ilek-ilek apmwel-ayeth mpwareyew irrkaty-angkwarr. Ingwer-rneman apmer arrpanenh-areny tharlemeley-angker rernem alhenh apmer yanh-warl, ilek-ilek mwerr-angker tharlemeleyew ankety-rnemew, man akngerr inaynteyew ikwer-rnem-they. Ingkerrenh arwengk-arwengk irrenh ngkwarl antywenty-penh-apeny.”
Atha awew ingwerentyak-anem, irrwerl-theyarl arlkenty alakenh: “Atyenh-rnemay! Awelhenh-arey atyeng! Iwerl-alhenh-arey apmer apmwa yanh! Anerl-aney-angenh apmwernem-itwew yanh. Apmwangkwarr iwarrerney-angenh, athan arrenhantherrenh atwewerr arrpemarl, irrkaty-angkwarr atha renh-rnem atweyenh-apeny artewenty.
Rernem intem-antey apmwel-ayeth mpwarem, apmwa weth mpwer tywenem-apeny alkerew-atety. Akngeyelan renh-rnem iterl-areyel kanper, rernemarl apmwel-ayeth mpwarem.
Rerneman arrenhantherrenh intem-antey irrwernenh. Atwenh rerneman arrenhantherrenh artewenty, artewenty inngarl renh-rnem-anemarl angkep-antey atweyew! Angkep atweyneyew artewenty innga apmwa yanh-rnem!
Rerneman ankety anenh, nakelhemel intem-antey. Apwert akngerr-akert, arnkwa akngerr-akert, ilek-ilek mwerr-angker-akert. Rernem angkenh, ‘Anantherr atyetyart aneyel akngerrew apmer arrpanenhel. Anantherr artnemel aney-angenh akertemwengk, arrangkw.’ Kel arrantherran renh-rnem-anem awakelhemel akertemwengk amperrgeleyew!
Tangkemel rernem angkenty-penh Akngeyel renh-rnem anamerl-antey court-em-elemel artewenty atweyenh arawerrng ilkwa ikwerenh-akertel. Rernemap angayakwarl anerl-aneyenh akertemwengk, pwarrkerreyenh arntety ilkwakert, Rernemap ilwernerreyenh-anem. Akngeyelan rwa thweneyenh apmer Babylon-warl, rap amperl-aneyenh ywerreyew-atety.” Alakenhan antyerl ingwerentyak atyeng angkew.
Tawen yanhan amperl-aneyenhel, kwert akngerr arlwa anerl-aneyenh ikwer-they. Ingkerrenhelan areyenh. Atyetyart apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem rerneman apmer yanh-warl alhenh, ilek-ilek apmwa mpwareyew. Rernemap apmwangkwarr ayntenh ingwer-rnem-then apmer ikwer-areny-rnem-itwew – apwert akngerr-akert, arnkwa akngerr-akert, ilek-ilek mwerr-angker-akert. Rernemap kwert areyenh, artnemel artewenty arrangkeyenh apmer ikwerew, atyetyart yanh-rnem.
Arleng-they rernem apmwa yanh arerl-aneyenh. Rernemap atererreyenh, nthakenh arrer-apeny alhey-angenh, Akngeyelarl renh-rnem arrtyewerr arrpemarl. Artewenty inngey rernem artneyenh alakenh angkemel: “Atyewey pwertay! Irrepern-rnem Babylon-areny-rnemay! Ywerrelheleyenh ingkerrenh-antey! Rernem anenh atyetyart-tangkwel, aleyan arrangkw-anemarl! Tawen ikwer-rnem-wenh ilkwa rlterrk anenh! Artwa army-areny akngerrelan tawen renh arntarnt-arenh! Aleyan Akngeyel anamerl-antey tawen renh ywerrelheleyenh-anem!”
“Tharlemeley-angker-rnem rernem-then arrangkeyenh tawen ikwerew arrpemarl, iney-angker-rneman ingkerr-anemarl ipma aneyel. Nthakenh man iney-angenh-anem, arrangkw-anem.
Rernemap apateyelpeyenh, ayernerr-aynteyenh-anem, ‘Angwenhel-aneman anewantherr-itwew gold, thilp, man ilek-ilek mwerr-angker-then ineyenh? Angwenhel-anem anewantherr-itwew ineyenhan arnkwa mwerr-angker, arwerl mwerr-angker intenty-then? Angwenhel-anem anewantherr-itwew ineyenhan ilek-ilek arwerl-penh, apwert-penh, ayen-penh-akerr?
Angwenhel-anem anewantherr-itwew ineyenhan ilek-ilek mwerr intenty alyerremwey-then, ngkwarl wayn, anter olive, pelaw-akerr? Angwenhel-anem anewantherr-itwew ineyenhan pwelek-rnem, yep-yep-rnem, nantew-rnem, pakey-akerr? Angwenhel-anem anewantherr-itwew ineyenhan irrepern-rnem, anantherrarl pwerep-anthenh, arwa arrangkwew warrkerreyew? Nthakenh ingwerentyel ilek-ilek iney-angenh-anem anewantherr-itwew, arrangkw-anem!’ Alakenh iterr-aynteyenh tharlemeley-angker yanh-rnem.
Rernemap angkeyenh alakenh, ‘Tawen Babylon-ay! Arrangkw-anem! Ngan apmer ilkwetangkwel anenh. Aleyanap ilek-ilek mwerr-angker ngkwenh-rnem arrangkw-anem. Nga ilek-ilekek ahenty anenh, rernemap arrangkw-arem. Man ngkwenh arrangkw-anem irrew. Nthakenh inenhey-alpey-angenh, arrangkw.’ Alakenh-anyem rernem angkerl-aneyenh.
Rernemap man akngerr innga inenh, apmer ikwer-warlarl alhenh, ilek-ilek tharlemel-aynteyew. Arleng-they rernem arerl-aneyenh. Rernemap atererreyenh, nthakenh arrer-apeny alhey-angenh, Akngeyel renh-rnem arrtyewerr arrpemarl. Rernemap artneyenh artewenty inngey,
alakenh angkemel: “‘Pwertay! Irrepern Babylon areny-rnem! Arrangkw-anem ingkerrenh-antey! Tawen ikwer-rnem-wenh ilkwa inngarl anenh! Arnkwa arlkeny-arlkeny-warl rernem aylpenh! Arlkitwew ilek-ilek gold-penh arrernew apwert mwerr-angker-rnem-then!
Akngeyelanap ilek-ilek mwerr-angker anamerl-antey ywerrelhelew-anemarl!’ “Akngerr ingwer-rneman kwaty alayel artarnpenhew rtnwangkwarr, man ineyew apmer arrpanenhel. Rernemap arleng-they arerl-aneyenh warrkenh ikwer-rnem-wenh-thenel.
Kwert rernem arerl-aneyenh, arlwar anerl-aneyenh rwa ilkwa inngethey apmer ikwer-itwew. Rernemap angkerrerl-aneyenh alakenh, ‘Tawen ingwer-rneman tawen nhanyem-weny. Tawen nhenhan ilkwa ingwer-rnem-angkwarrarl.’
Rernemap akapwert-warl ahern arrerneyenh, rernemarl amperrngerreyenh apmer yanh-areny-rnemew, artewenty inngey artneyenh alakenh angkemel: “‘Pwertay! Irrepern Babylon areny-rnem! Arrangkw-anem ingkerrenh-antey! Akngerr ingwer-rneman apmer ikwer-warl alhenh, kwaty alayel artarnpenhemel rtnwangkwarr, ilek-ilek tharlemeleyew, man inaynteyew tawen ikwer-areny-rnem-they. Aleyan Akngeyel tawen renh ywerrelheleyelpew-anemarl!’
Irrwerl-areny-rnem arrantherran inkwerelhenh-arey-anem! Apmer apmwa yanh arrangkw-anem! Inkwerelhenh-arey-anem Akngey-wenh-rnemay! Inkwerelhenh-arey-anem kwertengerl Jesus-wenh-rnemay! Inkwerelhenh-arey-anem artwa angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnemay! Babylon areny-rnemelan arrenhantherrenh atwenh, pwarrk ilkwa anthemel. Aleyanap Akngeyel renh-rnem angkep atwew irrkaty-angkwarr.”
Ikwer-penhan antyerl ilkwel apwert ilkwa irrwerlelew, kwaty alay-warl-anem iwew. Rap angkew: “Athap apwert ilkwa iwew kwaty alay-warl, raw ywerrey-alhewarl. Kel alakenh Akngeyel tawen renh Babylon ahern-warl iweyenh, ran arrangkwerreyelpeyenh. Nthakenh arey-angenh-anem.
Angwenhel arreyn mwerr-angker aylelhey-angenh-anem apmer ikwer-itwew, arrangkw-anem. Angwenhel ketay-apeny inkwerelhemel pelayerrey-angenh-anemarl. Angwenhel terampet inkwerelhemel pelayerrey-angenh-anemarl. Arrangkw-anem, akeleyt-anem. Angwenhel ampwal mwerr-angker-rnem nthakenh mpwarey-angenh-anem ikwer-itwew. Angwenhel-anem ntang athey-angenh amernew, arrangkw-anem.
Tawen ikwer-itwew angwenhel-anem lyenenty arrtyey-angenh-anem. Artwernem-then arelh-rnem-then nthakenh itengerrey-angenh-anem. Apmer ikwer-areny-rnem tharlemeley-angker-rnem rernem tyak innga anenh. Ingwer-rnem apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem renh-rnem nakenh. Ngangker-akert-rnemel ingwer-rnem irrtywerl-ampernenh apmer yanh-itwew. Akngerr ingwer-rneman apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem awelhenh ikwer-rnemew.
Tawen Babylon-areny-rnemel ipmew renh-rnem atwenh artwa angkakert Akngey-wenh-rnem. Akngey-wenh-rnem ingkerrenh, akngerr ingwer-rnem-then rernem ipmew atwenh. Alakenh-anyem Akngeyel tawen Babylon ywerrelhelew-anem ikwer-areny-rnem-then.”
Antyerl ilkwan angkenty-penh, atha akngerr innga awew irrwerl-itwew, ingkerrenh atayel arlkenty alakenh: “Aleleweya! Akngey nakey anantherr! Rant anyentel anenhantherrenh itethelem ipmewety! Ranap mwerr-angker, ingwer-rnem-apeny-weny, itwern-apeny arrtyernemel! Rant anyent arawerrng ilkwakert!
Rant arraty-angkwarr ingkerrenhew apmelerr mpwarem, lipwel-antey ingkerrenh rnkernem ayernemel. Rap arelh apmwa renh arew, rarl ingwer-rnem ilanthenh apmwangkwarr, akngerr ahern-areny-rnem apmwelemel, ingwer-rnem-itwew ayntaynteyew apmer arrpanenhel. Arelh yanhel Akngey-wenh-rnem ipmew-antey atwew. Akngeyelanap renh awakelhemel atwew-anemarl.”
Irrwerl-areny-rnem arlkew arrpemarl alakenh: “Aleleweya! Akngey nakey anantherr! Rarl tawen yanh rwa ilkwel arrtyew. Kwert-rnem arlwar anayntem intem-antey.”
Ampwa alkenh weth-rnem 24 atnwenh iteth weth-rnem 4-then rernem ingkerrenh kwenerrew atnertel-ayeth, Akngey renh nakemel. Ran aleth anenh chair mwerr-angker ikwer-itwew. Rernemap arlkew alakenh: “Amen! Akngey nakey anantherr! Aleleweya!”
Ikwer-penhan atha awew, ingwerentyarl arlkenty, rarl rtnenh chair mwerr-angker arrerenty. Ra alakenh arlkew: “Akngey anewantherrenh nakey anantherr! Warrkenh ikwerenh-rnemel renh nakem, rernem ikwerarl mwanty awelhem, ikwer-warl-athek mwanty ilelhemel. Ilkwernem, akely-rnem, rlterrk-rnem, rlterrk-weny-rnem-akerr; Ikwerenh-rnemel ingkerrenhel renh nakeyew!”
Atha akngerr-anem awew, akngerr innga arlkalhelerrenh atayel innga. Awely-awely-apeny angkenh, kwaty anyerr anterreyel-apeny alyarnp inngey. Rernemap arlkalhelerrenh alakenh-anyem: “Aleleweya! Akngey nakey anantherr! Ingkart Akngey Atyetyart Ilkwa Ingkerrenhew ran alkenh aneyel ingkerrew!
Renh inkwerelhemel nakey anantherr! Anantherr angkem ikwer, ‘Ngan ilkwarl, ingwer-rneman akelyarl!’ Akngey-wenh yep-yep akely itengerreyel-anem. Anewikw ikwerenh kel arnwarnelhew, mpwelheyel-anem ikwer.
Akngeyel arnkwa mwerr-angker ngwampeny anthew, ra aylpeyew.” (Anantherr iterl-areyel, arnkwa yanh-rnemel warrk mwerr-angker anaynteleyel, Akngey-wenh-rnemelarl ikwer mpwarew.)
Antyerlan angkew atyeng, “Pip ngkwenh-warl angka nhenhan ingkwerna. ‘Akngey-wenh yep-yep akelyarl itengerreyenhel, akngerr ingwer-rneman akarrerreyenh, amern akngerr inkwerelhemel kwenty arlkweyew. Akngeyan ikwerenh-rnem yangkelhew, akarrerreyew ingkerrenh-antey. Rernemap inkwerelhem ikwerew.’” Antyerl angkew arrpemarl atyeng, “Angka yanhan inngarl, Akngeyel ikwerenh-rnemew ileyel.”
Athan awew, ayengap atnertel-ayeth kwenerrew arrwekel-ampeny antyerl-itwew. Ranap ayenh artwerelew, “Mentyaw! Alakenh kwenerrey-angenh! Ayenh nakey-angenh! Ayengan warrkenh Akngey-wenh ngapeny, ingwer-rnem angka Jesus-akertarl ileyel-rnem-apeny-then. Renhant nakaynteyew arrantherr!” Ingwerentyel angka Jesus-akert ilem, ra katy angkeyel Akngeyew arawerrng ilkwakert Inweng Mwerr-angker-wenh.
Ikwer-penhan atha altyerr-angkwarr arew alker altywererrenty. Nantew ntwarlker-anem anamerl-antey aremerrey-alhew. Artwa anyent anerl-anenh ikwer-itwew. Akngerrel renh itnewem Akngey-wenh Inngarl Arraty Ikwer Iterreyel. Ranap ingkerrenh areyel. Rernem mwerranty aneyel apek, arrangkw apek. Aheng-arey rap apmwernemant atwem.
Annga atherran lherrm-apenyarl ampenh, akapwert-itwew mwekart mwerr-angker atyetyart-wenh akngerr. Arlkitwew ingkwernew itna ingwer-lkwer. Ingwer-rnemel itna iterl-arey-angenh; rant anyentel iterl-areyel.
Artwa nantew-arenyel arnkwa arlpenty-akert. Ingwerentyel arnkwa renh arrkngewarl-tangkwel pwerlp-arrernew. Itna ingweran Angka Akngey-wenharl.
Artwa army irrwerl-areny-rnem akngerrel renh apentenh. Rerneman arnkwa ngwampeny arlter-akert-rnem.
Arrakert ikwerenh-they tyerrelhew nayp arplenty arreylp. Nayp ikwer-akertelan rap apmwernem athenemel atwem apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem. Ra atyetyart ikwer-rnem anerl-aneyenh. Awelhey-angenh-rneman ra atwem kerwep-akertelarl. Rap renh-rnem ipelipeleyenh, lthwenhemel grapes-apeny. Alakenh-anyem ra ingkerrenh ileyenh, “Akngey Atyetyart Ilkwa Ingkerrenhew ra ahelerreyel inngarl arrewantherr.”
Itna ingweran iyleper anyent-itwew ingkwernew arnkwitwew-then. Itna ra Atyetyart Ilkwa Ingkerrenhew.
Atha antyerl arew-anem, irrwerleng rtnenh ingkeny-itwew. Rap atayel arlkew thip-rnemew, alkererrenharl alker-itwew. “Apetyenh-arey arrantherr! Akarrerrenh-arey, aker-rnem arlkweyew, Akngeyelarl antheyel!
Apetyenh-arey, arlka ipmernem-wenh arlkweyew. Artwa nantew ntwarlker-arenyel renh-rnem ipmew-antey atweyenh; atyetyart-rnem, artwa ilkwernem army-areny-rnem, artwa ilkwa ingwer-rnem, nantew-rnem, nantew-artey-rnem-akerr. Rap ingkerr ingwer-rnem-then ipmew atweyenh arrpemarl; ingwer-rnem apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem, atyetyart-rnem, warrkenh-rnem, ilkwernem, akely-rnem-akerr. Arrantherrap renh-rnem arlkwem!” Alakenh antyerl angkew thip-rnemew, rarl irrwerleng rtnenh ingkeny-itwew.
Ikwer-penhan atha arraylenty renh arew arrpemarl. Rarl rtnenh atyetyart apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem-itwew. Artwa army-areny ikwer-rnem-wenh rernem rtnenherrenh arrpemarl. Rernemap artwa nantew ntwarlker-areny ikwer mpwelhenh ikwerenh-rnemew-then, ikwer-rnem-itwew atwerreyew.
Artwa nantew ntwarlker-areny ra arraylenty renh antwerrkew. Artwa angkakert wethan, rarl irrtywerremel ilenh, renhap antwerrkew arrpemarl. Rap ilek-ilek tyak katy arnwarnenh arraylenty ikwer arawerrng apmwakert. Alakenh-anyem ra akngerr irrtywerremel ilenh, renh-rnemarl ampernew rlwangkwarr. Rernemap kwenerrenh ampwal apwert-penhew arraylenty-apeny. Artwa nantew ntwarlker-arenyel ra arraylenty artwa angkakert-then iwew iteth-anteyarl rwa ilkwewarl, kwert ikwakengarl intenh-warl.
Rap army-areny ikwer-rnem-wenh ipmew atwew nayp arlpenty-akertel, arrakert-they tyerrelheyelel. Thip weth-rnemel kwenty arlkwenh, tyelk arlkwemel.
Ikwer-penhan atha altyerr-angkwarr arew antyerl anyent, irrwerl-theyarl kwenel-athek atwarrenty. Rap key antwerrkew irrka intwer ikwer. Itep ingwerel ra tyeyn awerr arlpenty antwerrkew.
Athap arew-anem rtnwem arrwekeleny weth. Ran arrenty atyetyart itnan Satan. Antyerlel renh antwerrkew, renhap arrertnew tyeyn wethel. Antyerlel Satan renh arerteyenh arlengew-alenty, aherrety 1,000-ew-atety.
Antyerl rap rtnwem-anem iwew irrka intwer ikwer-warl, akentemel key-akertel artewenty inngey. Akententy nthakenh ingwerentyel altywereley-angenh aherrety 1,000-ew-atety, rtnwem ra tyerrelhewerr, ra apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem irrtywerremel ilayntewerr arrpemarl. Irrkitwew renh antwerrkenty-penh aherrety 1,000-ew-atety, antyerlel ra renh tyarleweyenh-anem alerl-antey.
Ikwer-penhan atha chair ilkwa mwerr-angker-rnem akngerr arew. Chair ikwer-rnem-itwew akngerr anew-anenh. Akngeyel arrwekel-antey ikwer-rnem anthew arawerrng ilkwa, ingwer-rnem court-emelemel ayerneyew. Rernemarl iteth anenhel ahern-itwew, rernemap alhewer alhenh, angka Jesus-akert ilerl-apemel, angka Akngey-wenh-then awelhemel. Rernemap nthakenh kwenerrey-angenh arraylenty ikwer. Rernem kwenerrey-angenh ampwal ikwer-apeny mpwarewewarl. Nthakenh renh-rnem amperney-angenh rlwangkwarr itep-angkwarr-then. Ingwer-rneman arlkarerrenh ikwer-rnem-wety, angka ikwer-rnem-wenh awelhey-angenh, rernemap renh-rnem atwew ipmew-antey, akapwert akerl-alhemel. Akngeyelanap renh-rnem itetheleynew, rernemap ilkwa aney-alpew Jesus Christ-itwel aherrety 1,000-ew-atety.
Nhenh-rnem-mernt itetherrew. Ingwer-rneman awenng-itwewarl aynterl-aneyenh-antey aherrety 1,000-ew-atety. Akngeyelap renh-rnem itetheleyenh-anem.
Arrwekeleny weth-rneman ilwewarl-penh-rneman rernem arraty inngarl aneyel, iteth-anem, rernemap irrngerney innga. Nthakenh rernem ilwey-angenh arrpemarl. Nthakenh ingwer-rnemel renh-rnem iwey-angenh rwa ilkwewarl, arrangkw. Rernemap warrkerrerl-aneyenh Akngeyew Jesus Christ-ew-then aherrety 1,000-ew-atety, atyetyart-rnem anemel Jesus-itwel.
Jesus Christ ra atyetyart anerl-anenty-penh aherrety 1,000-ew-atety, antyerl rap arrenty Satan renh irrka intwer ikwer-they tyarleweyenh.
Rap irrkethey tyerrelheyenh, apmer arrpanenh-warl ingwer-rnem-anem irrtywerremel ilerlap-aynteyew ahern nhenh-itwew. Apmer yanh-rnemel itna atherr-akert, Gog-then Magog-akert-then. Arrenty Satan-el renh-rnem akarreleyenh ingkerrenh-antey artewenty atwerreyew, artwa army-areny akngerr inngey, alperr-apeny.
Rernemap alhew iwerr arrpanenh-angkwarr ahern nhenh-itwew, apmer Akngey-wenh-rnem-itwew aremerrey-alhemel, tawen ikwer-rnem-wenh-itwew-then. Apmer yanhewan Akngey artewenty ilkelheyel. Artwa army-areny-rnemap amperelew Akngey-wenh-rnem, rernemap tawen ikwer-rnem-wenh-then amperelew, atwerreyew ikwer-rnem-itwew. Akngeyelanap renh-rnem artwerelew, rap rwa thwenew irrwerl-they, renh-rnem ywerrelheleyew.
Antyerlel arrenty Satan iwew rwa ilkwewarl, kwert ikwangarl intenh-warl. Rwa irrkaty-warl arraylenty-thenarl artwa angkakert-then renh-atherrenhan iwew arrwekel-antey. Artwa angkakert wetharl irrtywerremel ilenh. Rernemap artewenty inngey kwarnelh-aynteyenh, arrangk-aynteyenh arlta arrpanenhel itwernew ankwarengel-then aleth-antey.
Ikwer-penhan atha altyerr-angkwarr arew chair mwerr-angker ilkwa atyetyart-wenh, ntwarlkerarlap ran. Akngey rarl anenh chair ikwer-itwew. Ikwer-wety ahern-then alker-then anterrew, ywerrenhemel aleth-antey.
Athap ingkerrenh-antey arew-anem, arrwekel-antey ilwewarl ahern-itwew; ilkwernem-then, akely-rnem-then, atyetyart-rnem-then warrkenh-rnem-then-akert. Rernemap itetherrenhey-alpew-anem. Ingwer-rneman ilwew kwaty alay-itwew arrwekel-antey, ingwer-rneman awenng-itwewarl ayntenharl, ingwer-rneman ayntenh apmer itnan Ipmernem-angketyarr-itwewarl. Rernemap rtnenherrenh arrwekel-ampeny-itwew chair ilkwitwew. Pwek akngerr ayntenh ikwer-itwew. Pwek ingwer-rneman akentewarlarl, rernemanap angka akngerr-akertarl ilew, rernemarl anenh-akertarl, ahern nhenh-itwew. Akngeyelap pwek ingwer-anemarl akentewew. Pwek ranap impen ikwerenh, itna ikwerenh-rnem-wenh-akertantarl. Rerneman iteth intemarl anerl-aneyenh. Pwek-rnem arenty-penh Akngeyel ingkerrenh ayernew court-emelemel. Rernemap ingkerrenh-antey arrwekel-itwew rtney-alhew chair ilkwitwew. Akngeyel renh-rnem-anem ayernew anyentarl-anyentarl, “Nthakenh ngan anenh ahern nhenh-itwew?”
<range>
Akngeyelap itna akngerr ingwer-rneman arey-angenh pwek impen ikwerenh-itwew. Renh-rnem ra iwew rwa ilkwewarl-anem. Alakenh-anyem rernem atherr-inger ilwew. Arrkwekel-antey rernem kel ilwew ahern-itwew. Ra apmer itna Ipmernem-angketyarr iwew rwa ilkwewarl. Rap apmer ikwerew-artey-then iwew rwewarl, ranap itna Ipma.
<range>
Ikwer-penhan atha arew altyerr-angkwarr alker-then ahern-then rlengkeny. Alker awankeny-then ahern awankeny-then ywerrew-anem. Kwaty alayan ywerrew arrpemarl.
Athap Akngey-wenh tawen arew, Jerusalem, rlengkeny-anem, amparrkenty-anem. Tawen ran irrwerl-they atwarrenhey-alpenh, mwerr-angkerarlap ran. Ranap arelh-malangk-apeny, yep-yep akely-itwewarl itengerrenh-apeny.
Ingwerenty-anem arlkew artewentyel inngey chair ilkwa ikwer-they, “Rlengkan Akngey aneyel artwernem-then arelh-rnem-then-akert aleth-antey. Rernemanap ikwerenh-rnem aneyel. Ran Akngey ikwer-rnem-wenh, rap renh-rnem arntarnt-areyel intem-antey.
Rap anngwelty iparem annga ikwer-rnem-wenh-they. Nthakenh rernem ilwey-angenh-anem, arrangkw-anem. Nthakenh rernem alpwely arrangkemel aney-angenh-anem, arrangkw-anem. Arlka kwarnelhey-angenh arntetyerrey-angenh, arrangkw-anem. Ingkerrenhan ingwer-lkwer-anem, mwerr-angker innga. Ilek-ilek apmwa arrangkw-anem irreyenh.”
Akngey ra anenh-antey chair arlter ilkwa ikwer-itwew, rap angkew, “Awelhenh-arey atyeng! Rlengkan atha ilek-ilek ngwampeny mpwarem, mwerr-angker-anem!” Rap angkew atyeng arrpemarl, “Angka nhenh ingkwerna pip-warl, arraty inngeyarlap ran. Ingkerrenh angka ikwer awelheyew.”
Ra atyeng angkew arrpemarl, “Kel-antey! Irreyel-anem, ayengarl angkew-angkwarr. Ayengan arrwekel anenh, ayengap iteth intemarl anaynteyenh. Ingwerenty angkethakw apek, athap alhewer antheyenh kwaty mwerr-angker atyenh, kwaty ngenty atyenh. Kwaty ranap itetheley-angker, athap alhewer antheman.
Ingwerenty rlterrk apek rtnem arrenty-wenh-angkwarr-wety, rap inem kwaty mwerr-angker renh atyenh. Ayengan Akngey ikwerenh aneyenh, ranap aleraty atyenharl aneyenh. Alakenh.”
Ingwer-rnemanap arrangkwarl. Rernemap rwa ilkwel anerl-aneyenh, aletharl ampaynteyenh-itwew, ikwakel kwert itntaynteyenh. Ingwer-rneman atererremelarl anenh. Rlterrkarl ayntenheng-arey rernem nyerrerrenh, ayenh apentewerr. Ingwer-rneman awelhey-angenharl angka atyenhew, ingwer-rneman apmwangkwarrarl anenh, ingwer-rnemelan akngerr ipmewarl atwenh. Ingwer-rneman apmwangkwarr ayntenh akngerr ingwer-rnem-itwel. Ingwer-rnemelan pwentyel aylenh, arntety mpwarenh. Ingwer-rneman kwenerrenharl ampwal apwert-penh-rnemew arwerl-penh-rnemew-then. Ingwer-rneman irrtywerl-amperney-angker-rnemarl. Athan ikwer-rnem-wenh-angkwarr irrwareyel. Nhenh-rnem ingkerrenh ilweyenh atherr-inger. Ahern-itwew-tangkwel rernem ilwew, rwa ilkwitwew-anem ilweyenh.
Ntwa apek antyerl weth-rnem 7 iterl-areyel irrkwernem 7-akert? Rernem thelew ilek-ilek apmwa ahern-warl. Antyerl anyentan angkew atyeng, “Mpa! Atha ngenh arelh anyent lwewarrerneyew. Ran Akngey-wenh yep-yep akely-itwew itengerreyenh.”
Inweng Akngey-wenhan atyeng-warl aylpenhey-alhew-anem. Antyerl rap ayenh akngew irrwerl apwert ilkwewarl. Rap ayenh tawen Akngey-wenh-antey Jerusalem lwewarrernew. Tawen rap atwarrenhey-alpenh Akngey-they irrwerl-they.
Tawen ra artewenty amparrkenh lyenenty Akngey-wenh-akert, glass-arl rlkeyel-apeny itwernel, alakenh.
Wall ilkwa irrwerl innga arlpenty apwert-penhel tawen renh amperelew, keyt-rnem 12-akert. Ingwerentyel itna ingwerek-ingwer ingkwernew keyt ingkerrenh-itwew. Itnerneman 12-akertarl, amentew-ament rernemanap artwamp anyent-wenh alerikw-rnem, ikwer-renh-wenh altyernem-then. Artwamp itnan ikwerenh Israel, awank-akerrarl anenh. Keyt ikwer-rnem-itwew anyentarl-anyentarl antyerl-rnem arntarnt-aremel rtnenh. Keyt-rneman alakenh rtnenh: akngerrakw-ampeny irrpety, antekerr-ampeny irrpety arrpemarl, ayerrerr-ampeny irrpety arrpemarl, altwerl-ampeny irrpety arrpemarl. Alakenh.
<range>
Rernem wall renh artew apwert ilperr-ilperr ilkwernem 12-itwew. Apwert-rnemel wall antwerrkenh, ra aytnewerr. Apwert-rnem-itwew itnernem 12 ingkwernew, kwertengerl Jesus-wenh-rnem-then.
Antyerl irrkaty weth rarl atyeng angkenh, ra ampwal arlpenty antwerrkenh gold-penh ruler-apeny, arraty measure-emeleyew-arelh. Rap iterl-areyew, nthakenh tawen ra rtnenh-angkwarrarl – ilkwa apek, akely apek. Keyt-rnem 12, wall arlpenty-then, ingkerrenh-antey ra measure-emeleyew.
Tawen ran square-apeny rtnenh, box ilkwapenyarlap ran. Antyerl ra ampwal measure-emeleyew-arelh akngerr-inger arrernew tawen ikwer-angkwarr. Alakenh ra akngerrakw-ampeny-tangkwel measure-emelew. Arlpentyarlap ran, 2,400 kilometres. Irrkaty-angkwarr ra antekerr-ampeny measure-emelew. Arlpentyarlap ran, 2,400 kilometres arrpemarl. Ayererr-ampeny arlpenty arrpemarl, 2,400 kilometres. Altwerl-ampeny arlpenty arrpemarl, 2,400 kilometres. Irrwerl-warl-athek-anem ra measure-emelew ahern-they irrkaty-angkwarr, 2,400 kilometres, irrwerl inngey.
Wall-anem ra ampep-itwew measure-emelew, arlpaw apek, tyet apekarl. 65 metres-arlap ran, arlpaw inngey.
Wall-an apwert mwerr-angker jasper-theyarl mpwarew. Tawen ranap mwerr-angker arrpemarl, gold-penh mpwarew, glass-apeny arrtyernenh.
Apwert ilperr-ilperr ilkwa 12 weth-rnem-itwew apwert akely ilek-ilek alkeny-alkeny ayntew, rainbow-apeny arrtyerneyel; atherrk-atherrk, alker-alker, arlter, rnter-rnter, arrkeyt-arrkeyt, irrpwerl-anem.
<range>
Keyt 12 weth-rneman rernem mwerr-angker arrpemarl, apwert arlwa ntwarlker-penh mpwarew. Apwert ranap kwart-apeny itnan pearl. Keyt ingkerrenh mpwarew apwert arlter arlwa ingwerek-ingwer-penh, ilkwarlap rerneman. Keyt-angkwarran atha arew kwen-warl iwerr arlpaw-anem. Mwerr-angker arrpemarlap ran, gold-penh mpwarew, glass-apeny arrtyernenh.
Apmer Akngey nakaynteyew-arelh atha arey-angenh-antey tawen ikwer-itwew, arrangkw. Ingkart Akngey, Atyetyart Ilkwa Ingkerrenhew rantey tawen ikwer-itwew aneyel, yep-yep akely ikwerenh-then. Ratherrap ikwer-itwew aneyel aleth-antey, ingwer-rnemel renh-atherr alhewer-they nakaynteyew.
Ingkeny-then alkent-then arrtyerney-angenh yanh-itwew. Akngey rantelap arrtyerneyelan, yep-yep akelyel-then arrtyerneyel rwel-apeny.
Alakenh-anyem akngerrel apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnemel areyenh anaynt inngey, arraty-angkwarr alheyew. Atyetyart apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnemel man akngetyeyenh, ilek-ilek mwerr-angker-rnem-then apmer ikwer-warl.
Itwernew-apeny aletharlap ran. Keyt 12 weth-rneman altywer aletharl ayntaynteyenh. Ingwer-rnemel nthakenh akentey-angenh. Apmer iIkwer-itwew nthakenh atemwengkerrey-angenh-anem.
Akngerr inngel apmer arrpanenh-arenyel ilek-ilek mwerr-angker akngetyeyenh apmer ikwer-warl, man-then arnkwethen.
Ampwal apmwerneman nthakenh akngetyey-angenh, arrangkw. Ilengem arrentyew perayerreyew-arelh nthakenh akngetyey-angenh, arrangkw. Apmwangkwarr aneyel-rnem-then irrtywerremel iley-angker-rnem-then rerneman nthakenh apmer ikwer-warl alhey-angenh, arrangkw. Akngey-wenh-rnemant alheyenh. Yep-yep akely ikwerenhel itnernem ingkwernew pwek ikwerenh-warl, itna ikwerenh-rnem-wenh-akertant. Rerneman iteth intemarl anerl-aneyenh.
Antyerlelan atyeng lwewarrernew-penh tawen rlengkeny Jerusalem, rap ilpay-anem lwewarrernew. Kwaty irlwartarlap ran, glass-apeny arrtyernenh. Kwaty ranap chair mwerr-angker Akngey-wenh-they anterrenh, yep-yep akely ikwerenh-they-then. Kwaty nhelan itethelem intem-antey.
Iwerr arlpaw ayntenh tawen ampep-itwew. Iwerr ampep-itwewan kwaty anterrenh. Arwerl amern-akert-rnem lyapenh impalth atherr-itwew. Arwerl rerneman itetheley-angker arrpemarl. Alkent arrpanenhel amern mwerr-angker-rnem ampengerrem arwerl ikwer-rnem-itwew, akngerrel arlkwaynteyew. Alperr arntety-penh mwerreleyew-arelh. Apmer arrpanenh-areny-rnem apetyew, alperr renh-rnem ineyew.
Apmwangkwarr aneyel-rneman nthakenh apmer ikwerel aney-angenh, arrangkw. Akngeyelan renh-rnem artwereleyenh, rernem ikwer-itwew aney-alpewerr. Akngey-wenh-rnemant aney-alpeyenh, ikwer kwenerremel mwerr antwemel. Chair mwerr-angker weth, Akngey-wenh-then yep-yep akely-wenh-then, ra rtnaynteyenh ikwer-itwew.
Akngey-wenh-rnemel renh areyenh-anem arrer-they. Itna ikwerenh rlwitwew ingkwerneyenh.
Nthakenh atemwengkerrey-angenh tawen ikwer-itwew, arrangkw. Ikwer-areny-rnemel nthakenh ayernerrey-angenh alakenh, “Ay! Ilenger ingkeny tyerrelheyenh? Rwa mpwarey, anantherr areyew-awaty.” Arrangkw, rernem alakenh ayernerrey-angenh. Akngey rant amentel arrtyerney-angker, lyenenty antheyenh aleth inngey. Ikwerenh-rneman ilkwa anerl-aneyenh ikwer-itwew intem-antey.
Antyerl ran angkew-anem atyeng, “Angka nhenhan ntwarl ngwangkant awew, arraty inngarlap ran. Angka ikwer awelh-aynteyew! Akngeyel awank-akerr artwa angkakert-rnem ilenh-apeny inweng ikwerenh-angkwarr, rernemaw arraty ingwer-rnem ilaynteyew-awaty. Kel alakenh-angkwarran atha ngenh-anem ileyel, ntwaw ikwerenh-rnem ileyew, nthakenharl arrwekelan aynteyenh.” Alakenh-anyem antyerl atyeng angkew.
Jesus ran angkew-anem, “Awelhenh-arey atyeng! Ayengan ahern-warl alerl-antey atwarrerneyenh. Angka pwek nhenh-arenyew iylpareth awelheyel-rnem rerneman irrngerneyarl anerl-aynteyenh. Angka Akngey-wenharlap ran!”
Ayengaw, John. Athap ingkerrenh ingkwernew, altyerr-angkwarrarl atha arew, angkernem-then atha awew. Ayeng atnertel-ayeth kwenerrew-anem, antyerl renh nakeyew, rarl ilek-ilek atyeng lwewarrernew.
Antyerl ranap angkew atyeng, “Mentyaw! Alakenh irrey-angenh! Nthakenh atyeng kwenerrey-angenh, arrangkw. Ayengan arwa warrkenh Akngey-wenh, ngapeny, artwa angkakert ikwerenh-rnem-apeny. Ayeng ikwerenh-rnem-apeny aneyel, angka pwek nhenh-arenyew awelheyelarl-apeny. Renhant nakaynteyew!”
Antyerlel ayenh ilew-anem alakenh, “Angka pwek nhenh-itwew Akngey-wenhan. Alakenh-anyem ra aynteyenh. Nthakenh angka renh irrtyert-akwerney-angenh, arrangkw. Angka alhewer ilerl-apaynteyew, ingwer-rnemel awaynteyew anaynt-antey. Arlta arrer-anemerreyel.
Akngerran apmwangkwarr-antey anayntem. Kel menty renh-rnem tyarleweyew, apmwangkwarr-antey anayntem. Akngerran apmwangkwarr ayntayntem ingwer-rnem-itwew, nyerrerrey-angenharl. Kel menty renh-rnem tyarleweyew, alakenh irraynteyew arrpemarl. Ingwer-rneman mwerr-rnemarl anayntemarl. Kel mwerr, menty rernem anayntey alakenh. Ingwer-rnemelan Akngey apent-ayntem arraty-angkwarrarl. Kel menty rernem anayntey alakenh arrpemarl.”
Jesus ranem angkew, “Ayenh aweyew! Ayengarl atwarreyneyenharl ahern-warl alerl-anteyarl. Atha ingkerrenh-antey rnkerneyew, renh-rnem ayerneyew-anem. Athap mwanty-antey ayerneyew, nthakenharl rernem anenh ahern-itwew. Ingwer-rnemelan ayenh arraty-angkwarr apentenh, mwerr-angker mpwaremel. Kel ikwer-rnem atha mwerr-angker antheyew. Ingwer-rnemanap atyeng awelhey-angenharl, apmwangkwarrarl anenh. Kel ikwer-rnem atha apmwa antheyew.
Ayengan arrwekel anenh. Awank ayeng anenh, ahern nhenhan arnwarney-angenhel-antey. Ahern nhenh-then alker nhenh-then aleth-antey ywerrenheyenharl, ayengan iteth intemarl anaynteyenh.” Alakenh Jesus-an atyeng angkew.
Arnkwa mwerr-angker ikwer-rnem-wenh lhewenty-penh-apeny, Jesus-ewarl awelheyel-rneman irrngerney aneyel. Rernemap arraty-anem aneyel ikwer-angkwarr. Ra renh-rnem tyarleweyenh, keyt-angkwarr tawen Jerusalem-warl aylpenheyew, intem-antey ikwer-itwew aney-alpeyew. Rernemap alhewer alhem arwerl itetheley-angker-warl, amern ikwer-they arlkwaynteyew.
Ingwer-rnemanap arrangkwarl, arengk-rnem-apenyarl. Ingwer-rnemelan pwentyel aylenh, arntety mpwarenharl. Ingwer-rneman apmwangkwarr ayntenh akngerr-itwewarl. Ingwer-rnemelan atwenh ipmew-anteyarl. Ingwer-rneman kwenerrenharl ilengem apmwamwam-rnemew apwert-penhew arwerl-penhew. Ingwer-rneman irrtywerl-amperney-angker-rnemarl. Apmwa yanh-rneman nthakenh aylpenhey-angenh tawen ikwer-warl. Rernemap aketh-itwew anerl-aneyenh intem-antey.
“Ayengan Jesus, athap antyerl atyenh thwenew Christian arrewantherr-warl, angka nhenhan ilaynteyew. Arrantherr apmer 7 weth-rnem-itwew aneyel. Ayengan atyetyart David-wenh-anteyarl. Ayengap arenpeng, antyarr ilkwapeny, ingwepenharl tyerrelhem.”
Inweng Mwerr-angker-then yep-yep akely-wenh anewikw-then ratherr angkem-anem, “Apetyenh-arey!” Angka nhenh aweyel-rneman angkem, “Apetyenh-arey!” Ingwerenty apek angkethakwerrem, ra alhewer apetyeyew, kwaty itetheley-angker antyweyew.
Mwanty-antey awelhenh-arey! Angka nhenhan Akngey-wenharl. Ran angka ingwer-wenh-wenyarl, arrangkw. Impenarlap ran. Nthakenh ingwerentyel angka nhenh ingwer-lkwereley-angenh. Nthakenh ingwerentyel angka ingwer-anem ikwer-itwew pweyteley-angenh, arrangkw. Ingwerentyel apek arrkernem, angka nhenhan ingwer-lkwereleyew, Akngeyelanap arntety anthem, pwek nhenh-itwewarl atha ingkwernew-apeny.
Nthakenh ingwerentyel angkernem iparey-angenh, arrangkw. Angka ingkerr-antey ilaynteyew. Ingwerentyel apek angkernem iparem, Akngeyelanap renh artwerelem, ra tawen mwerr-angker ikwer-warl alhewerr. Athan angka tawen ikwer-akert ilew pwek nhenh-angkwarr. Nthakenh ra alhey-angenh arwerl itetheley-angker-warl, amern arlkweyew, arrangkw.
Jesus ranem angkew, “Angka nhenhan inngarl.” Rap angkew arrpemarl, “Ya, inngarl ayeng atwarrerneyenh ahern-warl alerl-antey.” Atharl John-el renh awew, alakenh angkenty, ayengap angkew, “Ya wenh, arratyarlap ran! Atyetyart Jesus-ay! Alerl apetya!”
Atha Atyetyart Jesus Christ ayern-ayntem, Akngey-wenh-rnem arntarnt-araynteyew intem-antey mwanty. Kel-antey.
